description.hltext_display: Asistencia Sekeru, noc bez Haláka a Budaja
description.content:
Dnes 07:03 - BUFFALO
Zdroj: Šport.sk,mač,nhl.com,SITA, Foto: nhl.com, Video: nhl.com
článok bude aktualizovaný
Zámorská profesionálna súťaž mala v noci z utorka na stredu na programe sedem stretnutí.
Zo Slovákov si bodové štatistiky vylepšil len obranca Buffala Andrej Sekera, ktorý si pripísal jednu asistenciu. Buffalo zvíťazilo na domácom ľade nad Anaheimom 5:2. Hráči "Sabres" doslova zostrelili brankára hostí Curtisa McElhinneyho- celkovo totiž čelil až 42 strelám.
St.Louis Blues si poradilo s Atlantou 4:2 aj bez Jaroslava Haláka, v bráne ho dokonale zastúpil Ty Conklin ("odolal" až 37 strelám a inkasoval dva góly). V domácom zápase sa však nedarilo hráčom Colorada Avalanche, ktoré prehralo s Los Angeles vysoko 0:5. V drese "Avalanche" odchytal celý zápas brankár Craig Anderson.

description.hltext_display: Prep Basketball: West Iredell 82, South ...
description.content:
LANDIS — Prior to Tuesday’s NPC game, free-spirited West Iredell scoring machine Zach Follrod pointed at his pride and joy — an amazing blonde Afro as thick and deep as the rough at any British Open.
“Jackie Moon,” said a smiling Follrod, referencing a Will Ferrell movie role.
Follrod who completed his unique look with a green headband and green Nikes, appeared to be the perfect victim for South Rowan’s vocal student section, but he played a nearly perfect basketball game.
He dumped 41 points on the Raiders.
The 6-foot-4 senior scored half his team’s points as West Iredell beat South 82-72 for an NPC victory.
“We’ve been losing tough games,” said Follrod, whose previous career high was 25. “We really needed to get this one.”
South lost despite brilliance by sophomore Josh Medlin, who scored 29 points, and a spectacular second half by Johnathan Gaddy, who got 17 of his 22 after the break.
West Iredell coach Benjamin Johnson has seen Follrod’s act — lot of body control, lots of follow shots, lots of free throws — dozens of times. Not that’s he’s tired of it.
“The kids you see now, everyone wants to be LeBron James, but Zach plays like he’s in some 40-year-old backyard league,” Johnson said. “All he does is make smart basketball plays.”
Follrod shot it, passed it, handled it and rebounded it. Defense isn’t necessarily his forte, but he even blocked a few shots.
West Iredell (5-4, 2-2) has a more experienced team than South (2-7, 0-2), and that was the difference. That and South’s lack of size and defense.
“Medlin is really starting to show just how special he’s going to be,” South coach John Davis said. “But defensively, we were just a sieve out there. We preach not letting the other team get into the middle of the floor and into the lane, and all they did all night was get into the lane and to the foul line.”
When 6-6 West Iredell center Matt Harris, foul-plagued in the first half, followed up a missed shot with the first dunk of his career and encored with a three-point play, the Warriors led 55-42 late in the third quarter.
A four-point play by Gaddy — he drilled a corner 3 as he was fouled — cut the lead back to single digits, and South challenged the rest of the way.
A technical foul against Johnson with 2:15 left— he got upset over a call that was reversed — gave South its final chance, and a jump hook by Medlin cut West Iredell’s lead to 71-67.
South had several opportunities to get a defensive board on West Iredell’s next possession. Instead, Harris out-fought everyone for the ball, and the Warriors put the game away with free throws.
West Iredell didn’t make a single 3-pointer.
“Everyone says the 3-point line’s changed the game,” Davis said. “What they showed tonight is you can score a bunch of points without the 3.”
WEST IREDELL (82) — Follrod 41, J. Gray 13, Harris 12, Blohm 7, Ellis 4, Phifer 2, Daniels 2, Stevenson 1.
SOUTH ROWAN (72) — Medlin 29, Gaddy 22, Neal 10, McDaniel 4, Miller 3, Boulware 2, Lambert 2, Sharpe, Tyler, Spry, Hubbard.
W. Iredell 15 20 24 23 — 82
S. Rowan 15 11 25 21 — 72

description.hltext_display: In vielen Ämtern Vertrauen der Menschen erworben
description.content:
NEUENKRUGE, 22. Dezember 2010
Ehrung Neuenkruger Horst- August Meyer ist seit 40 Jahren Feuerwehrmann – „Bringst Dich gerne ein“
Der Jubilar bekleidete und bekleidet viele Ämter. Das wurde bei der Ehrung deutlich. „Du bringst Dich gerne ein“, betonte denn auch Bürgermeister Helmut Völkers.
Neuenkruge - „Du bringst Dich gerne ein“, meinte Wiefelstedes Bürgermeister Helmut Völkers an die Adresse von Oberfeuerwehrmann Horst-August Meyer. Und in der Tat konnte und kann sich der 75-Jährige, der jetzt bei der Weihnachtsfeier der Freiwilligen Feuerwehr Neuenkruge-Borbeck im Landgasthof „Zur Mühle“ für seine 40-jährige Treue zur Feuerwehr geehrt wurde, über einen Mangel an Ämtern und Aufgaben nicht beklagen – auch außerhalb seiner Feuerwehr, wie der Bürgermeister hervorhob, als er im Namen von Rat und Verwaltung Dank sagte für den ehrenamtlichen Einsatz Meyers für die Allgemeinheit.
Im Alter von 33 Jahren war Meyer in die Feuerwehr eingetreten, hatte 28 Jahre lang seinen aktiven Dienst in der Einheit Neuenkruge-Borbeck versehen und war im Jahr 1997 in die Altersabteilung gewechselt, zeichnete Völkers die Laufbahn Meyers nach – was Meyer bei Erhalt seiner Urkunde und der entsprechenden Abzeichen scherzhaft mit „War alles halb so schlimm“ kommentierte.
Viel Zeit verwandte Völkers darauf, auch die anderen Tätigkeiten Meyers in Erinnerung zu rufen, der noch im vergangenen Jahr auch von der Gemeinde Wiefelstede im Rathaus für sein ehrenamtliches Engagement für die Allgemeinheit geehrt worden war (die NWZ berichtete). So begründete Meyer den Shantychor Neuenkruge-Borbeck mit, der bekanntlich seinen Ursprung in der Feuerwehr hat und dessen 2. Vorsitzender er noch heute ist. Er war unter anderem auch 25 Jahre Kassenwart des Ortsbürgervereins Neuenkruge und Umgebung, Aufsichtsrat der Molkerei, Sprecher der Dorfgemeinschaft bei den Wettbewerben, die damals noch „Unser Dorf soll schöner werden“ hießen – Aufgaben, bei denen sich Meyer das Vertrauen der Bevölkerung erworben habe, wie Völkers erklärte. Für Meyer sei es einfach ein gewisses Maß an Lebensqualität, sich für andere einzubringen.
Dem konnten stellvertretender Kreisbrandmeister Michael Rohlfs, Gemeindebrandmeister Heiko Bruns und auch Ortsbrandmeister Gerriet Meyer – Sohn des Jubilars – nicht mehr hinzufügen als Meyer ebenfalls Dank auszusprechen für seinen jahrzehntelangen Einsatz.

description.hltext_display: 不给钱？法足球裁判威胁要抵制耐克
Myriad Launches Panexia - Analyst Blog
description.content:
Myriad Genetics (MYGN) has launched its ninth molecular diagnostic product - Panexia, a predictive medicine product for hereditary pancreatic and related cancers. The test assesses a person’s probability of developing pancreatic cancer later in life by analyzing PALB2 and BRCA2 genes.
There are about 43,000 pancreatic cancer patients who are diagnosed each year and it is the fourth leading cause of cancer-related deaths in the US, after lung, colon and breast cancer. It is believed that up to 20% of pancreatic cancer is caused by inherited factors. The test, with a list price of $3,025, will be targeted at those patients whose family has had history of pancreatic cancer.
A patient having a family history of other than pancreatic cancer will need to analyze additional genes. The significance of Panexia lies in the fact that it helps to analyze the hereditary conditions that led to pancreatic cancer, which might increase the probability of other preventable cancers.
At present, Myriad derives 88% of its revenues from Bracanalysis, which provides a comprehensive analysis of BRCA1 and BRCA2 genes for assessing woman's risk of hereditary breast and ovarian cancers. Although the company has other tests in its portfolio such as the Colaris franchise, Melaris, OnDose among others, they have yet to make any significant contribution to the top line.
Although it will be a while before Panexia starts contributing to Myriad’s top line, diversification of revenues beyond Bracanalysis is a necessity for long-term growth of the company. In order to further strengthen its portfolio beyond Bracanalysis, earlier this month, Myriad had decided to acquire proprietary technology to detect malignant melanoma from California based Melanoma Diagnostics.
Recommendation
We consider Myriad’s Bracanalysis as a valuable asset for top line growth as it has the potential to tap a widely unexplored market. Although the company’s molecular diagnostics business is performing well, we remain concerned about the overall weakness in the economy and the tough competitive scenario in the biotechnology and genetics-testing field. However, with a strong cash balance, the company is well placed to expand its product portfolio and target new territories.
We have a Neutral recommendation on the stock which also corresponds to a Zacks #3 Rank (Hold) in the short-term.

description.hltext_display: Manualul teroristilor din decembrie �89
description.content:
Luptatorii din "Rezistenta", activati la sfarsitul anului 1989 pentru a salva Romania socialista aflata in primejdie, au fost preluati cu tot cu misiunile lor de noua putere instalata dupa fuga lui Nicolae Ceausescu.
Cele patru cincinale de dupa 1990 aveau sa aduca desavarsirea omului nou, dupa un proiect intocmit cu sase luni inainte de prabusirea comunismului. Mai erau 173 de zile pana la fuga cu elicopterul, timp suficient pentru planuri mari.
Astazi, 22 decembrie, la 20 de ani de la Revolutie, istoricul Alex Mihai Stoenescu ofera o alta viziune asupra acelor evenimente şi asupra mecanismelor de formare a noii Romanii. Poporul a fost mintit ca ar fi făcut singur istorie, iar Revolutia s-a intamplat fara ca multimea sa stie, sustine Stoenescu.
Presedintele Traian Basescu a declarat ieri, in Parlament, dupa depunerea juramantului, ca a fost ales pe 6 decembrie pentru un nou mandat deoarece a fost „perceput cel mai credibil vector al apararii interesului national“, si nu pentru ca ar fi promis liniste.
Pe 22 decembrie 1989 "Epoca de Aur" se prabusea in timp ce Nicolae Ceausescu se ridica cu elicopterul de pe sediul CC. Un analist american, consultat de CIA, explica faptul ca tocmai iluzia dictatorului, aceea ca era invincibil, a dus la imposibilitatea regimului de a restabili controlul.
Membrii noului Cabinet Boc vor fi audiati astazi in Comisiile de specialitate, urmand ca plenul celor doua Camere sa acorde maine votul de incredere Guvernului format de PDL, UDMR si independenti. Prezentam o sinteza a prioritatilor asumate in programul de guvernare de noul Executiv.
Fara doar si poate, anul acesta, Cupidon le-a intors spatele unora dintre artisti. Cele mai surprinzatoare despartiri s-au produs in råndul cåntaretilor, Catalin Crisan fiind un punct de referinta in acest sens. Dupa 14 ani de casnicie, aparent fericita, acesta a anuntat ca divorteaza, lucru care de altfel s-a si produs in aceasta toamna.

description.hltext_display: China replaces top Foreign Ministry official
description.content:
China has replaced its top Foreign Ministry official amid a trend toward greater assertiveness in handling territorial disputes and participating in global organizations.
Vice Foreign Minister Zhang Zhijun took over recently as the ministry's Communist Party secretary, state media reports said Wednesday, meaning he outranks Foreign Minister Yang Jiechi. Yang was accused of being caught off guard when U.S. Secretary of State Hillary Clinton announced at a security conference in Vietnam this year that Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
Zhang, 57, had served almost his entire career in the party's International Liaison Department, a type of shadow Foreign Ministry focussing on contacts with foreign political parties, until he became deputy to Yang last year.
That party background may mean he has more of a say in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world. The country's rising economic clout amid the global economic downturn that has battered traditional powers such as the United States has emboldened Chinese leaders to demand a bigger say in global affairs such as climate change and at international organizations, including the United Nations.
China's aggressive assertion of its territorial claims in the South China and East China seas have, meanwhile, sparked a backlash from other countries in the region, drawing them closer to Washington.
The powerful People's Liberation Army is believed to be leading the calls for a tougher line in such disputes, while other cabinet officials have emphasized quietly advancing China's interests in economic, media and cultural spheres.
China's most senior diplomat, State Counselor Dai Bingguo, is seen as balancing the different arguments, although the country's opaque political system ensures that such debates almost never make it into the public arena.
Little is known about Zhang's personal style, although his party background and relative lack of experience working abroad suggest he will closely reflect the tone set by the party leadership.
Zhang's appointment was announced on official websites, including that of the party's People's Daily newspaper, but no exact date was given.
He takes over from Wang Guangya, a courtly career diplomat who was ambassador to the U.N. from 2003-2008, during which China took advantage of the U.S. preoccupation with Iraq to quietly expand its diplomatic space.

event_or_fact.property: Washington considered the peaceful resolution of South China Sea disputes as part of the American national interest.
in policymaking than his predecessor, as China increasingly abandons its former low-key approach to dealing with the outside world

description.hltext_display: Gala Inspired 2010 4 ani de creativitate si ...
description.content:
Vineri, 17 decembrie, in Kulturhaus din Bucuresti, cei 27 de castigatori ai concursurilor de idei Inspired Fashion, Architecture, Graphic Design, Illustration, Product Design, Interior Design, Accessories, Dramaturgy si Photography au fost premiati in cadrul Galei Inspired 2010.
Inspired 2010 a insemnat 9 sectiuni de concurs, 2 luni de creatie, 444 de mape depuse, 108 membri de juriu, 27 de castigatori, 85 de premii. Sectiunea Inspired Photography a fost cea mai populara, cu 71 de lucrari predate. Competitia din acest an s-a dovedit a avea cel mai ridicat grad de dificultate din cei 4 ani de Inspired: din cei 724 de concurenti inscrisi, 444 s-au incadrat in deadline-ul de trimitere a mapelor.
Invitatii Galei - fotografi, arhitecti, designeri, creatori de accesorii, jurnalisti, reprezentanti ai mediului academic romanesc, dar si tineri pasionati de arte vizuale s-au reunit al patrulea an consecutiv pentru a sarbatori arta in forma sa cea mai fresh.
Cei prezenti au avut posibilitatea de a vedea in premiera ce a produs si premiat anul acesta cel mai important concurs de creatie pentru tinerii artisti din Romania. Evenimentul din Kulturhaus a inclus un vernisaj al celor 10 finalisti de la fiecare sectiune de concurs (cele 80 de lucrari au fost printate in format A3, cu sprijinul Mons Medius Investments).
Gala Inspired 2010 a sarbatorit totodata implinirea a 4 ani de concursuri Inspired, in acest an competitia aducand 3 noi sectiuni de concurs, mai multi membri de juriu, smart ca masina oficiala si o noua identitate vizuala. Caracatita Inspired - creata de Radu Pop (Noper) si declinata artistic in media de catre Iulia Tomescu, locul 2 la Inspired - Accessories 2009 si cooptata in echipa Inspired ca director artistic al concursului - a venit sa marcheze lansarea sectiunii Inspired Illustration.
Inspired 2010 sustine si in acest an dezvoltarea profesionala a castigatorilor. Dovada sunt premiile obtinute:

Tema Childish de la sectiunea Inspired Fashion Design a reprezentat pentru cele 3 castigatoare o placuta intoarcere la vremurile copilariei: Am lucrat cu drag amintindu-mi de copilarie, de nori, de zambete si de bomboane. Am incercat sa recompun intr-o lume a oamenilor mari un univers paralel al ludicului, al inocentei si al lucrurilor mici, povesteste Irina Anghel, clasata pe locul al II-lea. Si pentru Sandra Celia Chira (locul al III-lea) participarea in sine a fost un motiv de bucurie: Inspired este sansa de a crea, alaturi de cei care au ales asta ca exprimare de sine. E bucuria de a apasa "vizualizare lucrari", e bucuria de a citi pe spatele diplomei cine ti-a apreciat lucrarile. Premiile au venit ca o completare a acestei bucurii, oferind participantilor increderea de a continua: Concursul a reprezentat o ocazie de a-mi afla intr-o anumita masura pozitia la nivel national. In materie de organizare concursul a fost bine structurat, instructiunile clar mentionate. Premiile sunt un mare ajutor si o incurajare spre a lucra cu perseverenta si cu cat mai mult profesionalism in domeniul ales. E linistitor sa vezi ca exista si aici oameni interesati de viitorul tinerilor aflati la inceput de drum, a declarat Marcela Baltarete (locul I Inspired Fashion Design).
In opozitie cu numele temei Inspired Accessories, (Con)fusion, experienta Inspired a oferit castigatoarelor confirmarea drumului artistic ales si o posibilitate clara de evaluare. Faptul ca am castigat este o confirmare a ceea ce am ales sa fac in continuare pentru ca, de curand am hotarat sa iau o pauza de arhitectura si sa urmez o facultate de arte., a declarat Ana Maria Marchetanu (locul I). Pentru Lidia Puica, situata pe locul al II-lea, tema concursului a fost o mare provocare, oferind posibilitatea de evaluare a cunostintelor practice, precum si de explorare a creativitatii.
Madalina Raileanu (locul al III-lea Inspired Accessories) a vazut in Inspired atat o experienta emotionanta, pentru ca tema concursului a oferit ocazia de a explora ideatico-estetic universul postmodern al lui Samuel Beckett, cat si una educativa, pentru ca m-a pus in situatia de a aborda tema impusa intr-un mod ordonat, cumulativ, iar la final esentializat
Tema concursului a fost un stimulent si pentru castigatorii Inspired Architecture. Consider ca premiul consta chiar in faptul ca am participat la acest concurs, a afirmat George Adam (locul al II-lea), continuand: concursul a fost interesant, cu o tema destul de libera pentru sectiunea de arhitectura la care am participat. Am incercat sa raspund cat mai punctual la probleme reale legate de conceptul proiectului meu. Tema a fost apreciata si de castigatorul locului al III-lea, Mihai Gheorghe Lupse deoarece exista posibilitatea de a relationa cu un context existent si promovarea acestuia prin proiectul realizat. Totodata, castigatorii au subliniat importanta elementelor de noutate pe care Inspired le aduce in fiecare an: Ma bucur ca in acest an au fost mai multe sectiuni in cadrul competitiei Inspired, implicand astfel mai multi tineri din diverse domenii artistice, incurajand si stimuland creativitatea si imaginatia., a afirmat Cristina Matei castigatoarea Inspired Architecture si finalista Inspired Interior Design.
Realizarea identitatii vizuale pentru un lant de cafenele traditionale a constituit pentru castigatorii sectiunii Inspired Graphic Design un brief solicitant, realist si mai dificil ca cele din anii anteriori. Locul obtinut reprezinta in egala masura recunoasterea ideilor inspirate, cat si o rampa de lansare: Concursul ofera tuturor tinerilor care incearca sa intre in industrie sansa de a fi remarcati., a afirmat Irina Moraru, clasata a doua in concurs. Castigatorului locului I, Balazs Szabo, continua: Am incercat crearea unei identitati care sa invite utilizatorul la un mic joc creativ. Sper ca acest concurs, premiile si recunoasterea din partea profesionistilor va deschide noi posibilitati de cunoaștere - atat pentru mine cat si pentru ceilalti participanti - ceea ce se va reflecta in viitor printr-o prelucrare lejera si jucausa chiar si a celor mai rigide teme.
Aflata la al doilea an de existenta, sectiunea Inspired Dramaturgy a reunit in 2010 mai multi tineri pasionati de scris, iar clasarea pe podium a oferit castigatorilor (Camelia Cuibus locul I, Silviu Maxim locul al II-lea, Maria Galea locul al III-lea) incurajarea de a continua. Inspired mi-a dat incredere in mine si m-a determinat sa particip si la editiile urmatoare. Mi-a dat impulsul de care aveam nevoie pentru a scrie mai mult, mai bine., a afirmat Maria Galea.
Sectiunea Inspired Photography, aflata la al patrulea an de competitie a fost si in 2010 una dintre cele mai populare, chiar daca tema pop art romanesc a fost pentru unii concurenti, mai complexa ca in anii precendenti. Tematica a creat o provocare deoarece a permis folosirea unor elemente care puteau sa duca lucrarea spre banal sau dimpotriva, catre spectaculos. Abordarea mea vizuala in general se bazeaza pe elemente adaugate-decupate, acest lucru facilitand integrarea ideilor in tema data. Sunt mandru ca lucrarile mele au fost notate de un juriu format din persoane pe care le admir, a explicat Bogdan Iorgovan castigatorul sectiunii. Si ceilalti doi castigatori (Sergiu Mihaescu locul al II-lea, Roxana Enache locul al III-lea) au considerat tema a fi in primul rand o provocare. "Tema de anul acesta a fost foarte interesanta si m-a motivat sa creez un concept. Inspired este un concurs care te provoaca. Imi pare bine ca se intampla si la noi asa ceva.", a declarat Sergiu Mihaescu (www.sergiumihaescu.com).
Cele 3 sectiuni noi de concurs Inspired Illustration, Interior Design si Product Design au fost primite foarte bine, reunind in competitie 68, 50 si respectiv 44 de concurenti.
Tema Inspired Illustration, Eu caut Omul a fost pentru Diana Butucariu, castigatoarea locului al II-lea, o tema cu o deschidere larga ce iti ofera multe posibilitati si variatii. Acelasi lucru l-a apreciat si castigatorul locului I, Daniel Costin Miron: Tema de anul acesta a fost extrem de ofertanta, mi-a dat libertate in actul creativ si in tehnica aleasa. Am lucrat cu placere si acest lucru se vede in mapa cu care am participat. Jurizarea a fost fair-play. O gala cinstita cu premii pe care chiar mi le doream si de care aveam nevoie, targetate conform cerintelor artistilor de la fiecare categorie. Raluca Ciubotariu (locul al III-lea) a completat: Mi-a placut foarte mult faptul ca juriul a fost compus din persoane diferite ca experienta si varsta, notarea dupa parerea mea fiind una corecta, tinandu-se cont atat de concept cat si de aspect.
Alexandra Ghioc, castigatoarea Inspired Product Design, a gasit in participarea la concurs o sansa de a aduce inovatii pentru un produs precum comoda audio video: insuficient exploatat pana la ora actuala din punct de vedere estetic si mai ales functional, avand in vedere ca acest obiect a devenit astazi un bun de uz comun. Am incercat sa realizez un produs de design care sa se preteze la nevoile consumatorului, sa se potriveasca in orice locuinta la nivel estetic, dar in acelasi timp sa foloseasca minimum de materiale si sa atinga un pret cat mai mic. Clasat pe locul al III-lea, Silviu Teodor-Stanciu a subliniat importanta juriului in evaluarea acestor produse: alcatuirea juriilor de specialitate din profesori de la cele mai mari universitati de profil din tara, reprezentanti ai unor companii de succes romanesti ori straine reprezinta un mare avantaj pentru evaluarea candidatilor, iar libertatea acestora de a participa la mai multe sectiuni simultan presupune un plus considerabil.
Tema cea mai apropiata si mai apreciata de participanti a fost insa amenajarea unei locuinte pentru un cuplu de studenti. Amenajarea spatiilor de mici dimensiuni, constrangerile care vin odata cu aceasta, dar mai ales problemele cheie care trebuie abordate pentru a gasi solutiile potrivite au facut din munca pentru acest proiect o adevarata placere., e explicat Alina Turdean (locul al II-lea).
Luand contact in timp real cu viata de student si locuintele destinate acestora, castigatorii au vazut in rezolvarea temei o provocare placuta: Locuind intr-un complex studentesc , tema concursului mi-a suras din prima clipa , tot ce a trebuit sa fac a fost inchid ochii si sa ma conectez la "masina de vis" . Cerintele temei mi-au placut si totodata le-am considerat constructive, au fost ca un punct de plecare din care fiecare concurent isi dezvolta firul gandirii., povesteste Calin Radu Costin (clasat pe primul loc), in timp ce Andrei Vlas (locul al III-lea) completeaza: sunt student si stiu ce insemna stilul acesta de viata, mai ales in Romania, unde conditiile nu sunt ca in alte tari. Asa ca am incercat sa imi imaginez cum ar fi daca s-ar schimba anumite lucruri, un concept nou de locuinte pentru studenti, privit dintr-o alta perspectiva, cu totul noua. Si,cine stie, poate intr-o zi vom vedea proiecte ca la Inspired si in centrele noastre studentesti.
Referitor la participarea la Concursul INSPIRED, Alina Turdean a afirmat: Particip pentru a doua oara la Concursul Inspired, dupa editia 2008, iar acum sunt onorata pentru prezenta pe podium, locul al II-lea. Nu pot sa nu constat amploarea pe care a luat-o Concursul Inspired, devenind un punct de reper al sfarsitului de an in lumea artistilor, a arhitectilor sau, pur si simplu, a oamenilor inspirati.
Decernarea premiilor a fost urmata de un party sustinut de Pepsi, Red Bull, Bombay Sapphire si The Famous Grouse.
Alaturi de vernisajul lucrarilor finaliste in concursul INSPIRED, evenimentul a inclus si o proiectie cu cele mai bune 50 de fotografii din competitia internationala Red Bull Illume o poveste in imagini despre sporturile de aventura si actiune, fotografi si atletii care le sunt sursa de inspiratie.
Creativitatea si inspiratia au fost sarbatorite si impreuna cu Bombay Sapphire, care in acest an a lansat competitia globala Project Your Imagination. Folosind o tehnologie de proiectie de ultima ora ce creeaza impresia ca o cladire se transforma in fata privitorilor, concurentii vor lucra cu cei mai buni creatori din lume pentru a transforma imaginatia in realitate printr-o proiectie pe o cladire iconica la nivel mondial.
Concursul national de idei INSPIRED 2010 a fost lansat pe 1 octombrie, cand temele celor 9 sectiuni ale competitiei au fost anuntate online, pe pagina oficiala www.concurs-inspired.ro.
Pana in 21 noiembrie, tinerii si-au inscris si predat lucrarile, tot online. Juriul, format din membri de elita ai domeniilor-tema si din castigatorii din 2009 ai fiecarei sectiuni, a folosit aceeasi platforma online pentru notarea lucrarilor, in conditii de maxima confidentialitate, in perioada 26 noiembrie 5 decembrie 2010.
Masina oficiala INSPIRED 2010: SMART
Sponsori INSPIRED 2010: Dornbracht, E-On
Parteneri INSPIRED 2010: Wagner, ACME, LiterNet, Anaid Art Gallery, Carturesti, Brother, Dynaphos, Emidale, Extins, Gemini CAD Systems, Visual Candy, Wunderman, Musafir by Amarjit, Kufner, Asociatia Romconf, Teatrul Studentesc Podul, iStyle, hlsta studio, Mons Medius Investments, Novartex, Hansen, Mobexpert, Atelier 13, Editura Art, Academia Cisco Credis, Crumpler, icut.ro, Alternative Film Studio.
Zburam cu Blue Air
Parteneri media INSPIRED 2010: UTV, Crisana, Tribuna, Monitorul de Cluj, Ziarul de Iasi, 7 Seri, ArtClue, Elle, Elle Decoration, Elevate, The Kite, Metropotam, Good Homes, Dialog Textil, Igloo, Constructiv, Tataia, OOPS Media, Photo Magazine, Shopping Report, Ambition!, Fotografa.ro, Calendar Evenimente, 4Arte.ro, stiridebine.ro, Avantaje, comunicatedepresa.ro, Fashion&Beauty, Dilema Veche.
Sustinut de Radio Guerrilla
Organizator: Asociatia INSPIRED

description.hltext_display: Cauza probabilă a exploziei de la Bacău - scurgeri de gaze din reţeaua de transport.
description.author: redactia@romanialibera.ro (Victor Turșan
description.content:
Cauza probabilă a exploziei de la Bacău - scurgeri de gaze din reţeaua de transport
Cauza probabilă a exploziei de la Bacău - scurgeri de gaze din reţeaua de transport (Mediafax)
Cauza probabilă a exploziei de la Bacău - scurgeri de gaze din reţeaua de transport (Mediafax)
E-MAIL PRINT RSS MĂRIME TEXT
de VICTOR TURȘAN
2 VIZUALIZARI | COMENTARII 0
Cauza probabilă a exploziei produse, marţi, într-un bloc din municipiul Bacău este o acumulare de gaze de la reţeaua de transport a E. ON Gaz, indică primele concluzii ale anchetei declanşate în acest caz, potrivit Mediafax.
Prefectul judeţului Bacău, Constantin Scripăţ, a declarat, miercuri dimineaţă că în acest caz nu există o concluzie finală privind cauzele producerii exploziei, cercetările fiind încă în curs, însă cel mai probabil este vorba despre scurgeri de gaze din reţeaua de transport.
Prefectul de Bacău a spus că specialiştii au avut două ipoteze în acest caz: defecţiuni la centrala termică din apartamentul în care s-a produs deflagraţia sau manipulare defectuoasă a centralei şi scurgeri de la reţeaua de gaze. El a precizat că prima dintre ipoteze "a căzut".
Prefectul a precizat că la faţa locului se află trei echipe de experţi care adună în continuare probe şi fac măsurători pentru a stabili cauza exactă a deflagraţiei.
Într-un comunicat de presă transmis marţi seară, E ON Gaz arată că primele investigaţii arată că "scenariul cel mai probabil al exploziei îl constituie o acumulare de gaze naturale, însă la acest moment nu există nicio certitudine privind sursa acestei acumulări".
"Cu toate că în acest stadiu incipient al anchetei nu se poate vorbi de o cauză certă a acumulării de gaze naturale, E.ON a decis să se implice în ajutorarea persoanelor afectate prin sprijinirea demersurilor medicale de urgenţă pentru cei afectaţi. Totodată, compania va acorda un sprijin financiar de urgenţă pentru a acoperi nevoile imediate ale persoanelor evacuate, acesta fiind un act umanitar şi fără vreo legătură cu rezultatele anchetei în curs", se precizează în comunicat.
La rândul său, purtătorul de cuvânt al Inspectoratului pentru Situaţii de Urgenţă Bacău, Andrei Grecu, a declarat că reprezentanţii companiei de gaz fac în continuare săpături şi verificări la reţeaua de gaze pentru a vedea dacă există fisuri, iar din această cauză a fost mărită presiunea gazului în reţea. Astfel, din cauza gazelor acumulate sub dărâmături marţi seară în afara blocului afectat a reizbucnit un mic incendiu, care a fost lichidat în scurt timp de către pompieri.
Totodată, miercuri dimineaţă, specialişti în construcţii vor face verificări la blocul afectat pentru a stabili dacă a fost afectată structura de rezistenţă a acestuia.
În ceea ce îi priveşte pe cei 25 de locatari din blocul respectiv, aceştia şi-au petrecut noaptea la rude şi cunoştinţe, refuzând să fie cazaţi la internatul unui liceu unde le-au fost puse la dispoziţie locuri de către autorităţi.
O explozie puternică urmată de un incendiu s-a produs, marţi dimineaţă, la parterul unui bloc de patru etaje din municipiul Bacău, din cauza unei acumulări de gaze, în urma deflagraţiei fiind avariate mai multe apartamente şi fiind afectate autoturisme aflate în apropiere.
În urma exploziei, planşeul dintre parter şi etajul întâi al scării A a blocului s-a prăbuşit, cinci apartamente fiind avariate, dintre care două fiind distruse în totalitate.
În urma deflagraţiei au fost rănite trei persoane, una dintre ele - un bărbat - fiind adusă cu un elicopter la Spitalul Floreasca din Capitală, starea lui fiind critică, potrivit subsecretarul de stat Raed Arafat. Bărbatul are arsuri pe 25 la sută din corp şi multiple fracturi, fiind supus unor intervenţii chirurgicale la spitalul din Bacău.
Alte două persoane rănite sunt tratate la spitalul din Bacău.
În blocul în care a avut loc deflagraţia locuiau 28 de persoane.
Premierul Emil Boc a solicitat, în şedinţa de marţi seară a Guvernului, evaluarea situaţiei de la Bacău, astfel încât să poată fi deblocat un ajutor de urgenţă atât pentru persoanele afectate, cât şi pentru refacerea locuinţelor.

description.hltext_display: 皇马主帅经理曝八矛盾 穆帅巴尔达诺水火不容
description.content:
穆里尼奥和巴尔达诺之间，到底有没有问题甚至矛盾？相信所有皇马球迷心中都有这样一个问号。这几天来关于穆里尼奥不满巴尔达诺的报道不少，但全都来自于敌对阵营的加泰罗尼亚媒体。不过今天被视为弗洛伦蒂诺传声筒的《马卡报》正式确认，穆里尼奥和巴尔达诺之间的确已经水火不容。尽管弗洛伦蒂诺希望两大巨头和为贵，但狂人对皇马总经理一肚子怨言和火气。在执教皇马半年后，穆里尼奥就八次与巴尔达诺形成了直接矛盾。
NO.1 在八月份，穆里尼奥希望皇马再买一名中锋，他公开呼吁光靠伊瓜因和本泽马绝对不行。但巴尔达诺拒绝了狂人的建议，穆里尼奥因此认为总经理并不支持他。
NO.2 在国家德比惨败后，穆里尼奥向拉莫斯下达了48小时封口令。但在巴尔达诺的支持下，拉莫斯在赛后第二天就参加了新闻发布会，狂人认为他在球队内的权威受损。
NO.3 在被希洪竞技主帅普雷西亚多骂为地痞流氓之后，穆里尼奥本期待巴尔达诺能公开维护自己。但直到西班牙反暴力委员会一周后开始调查此事时，巴尔达诺才勉强为狂人说了几句好话。
NO.4 在上周皇马高层与队长们商谈赛季奖金时，按照惯例应该有4名队长出席，但最终只有卡西和拉莫斯这两名西班牙人出席，默罕默德-迪亚拉和马塞洛并未出席。穆里尼奥认为巴尔达诺有意打压葡语帮，而马塞洛正是他的心腹之一。
NO.5 在伊瓜因受伤后，穆里尼奥本向他推荐了一名自己很信赖的葡萄牙医生，但被巴尔达诺拒绝，最终伊瓜因奔赴巴塞罗那求医。
NO.6 穆里尼奥希望在伯纳乌草皮下加装地热系统，但遭到了巴尔达诺拒绝。
NO.7 皇马俱乐部为穆里尼奥和所有球员都发放了一台3D电视作为圣诞礼物，但却没有发给卡兰卡、洛洛、法利亚等助教，同时也没给队医任何礼物。穆里尼奥希望巴尔达诺能公平对待每一名球队成员，而不是搞特殊化。
NO.8 皇马跟队厨师和后勤主管都没有被邀请参加俱乐部圣诞宴会，他们的表现将直接决定球队备战水准的高下，穆里尼奥认为巴尔达诺组织不力。

description.hltext_display: IT기업들, 데이터센터 효율화 전략 공개
description.content: IT 대표 기업들의 그린 IT 실현을 위한 데이터센터 효율화 � �략이 공개됐다.한국IT서비스산업협회(회장 김� 배)는 지식경� �부와 공동으로 `그린 컴퓨팅 서밋 2010(Green Computing Summit 2010)을 22일 개최했다.이번 행사는 `차세대 그린IT 기� 과 데이터센터 효율화 � �략`을 주� �로 산학연 관계자 300명이 참석해 의견을 나눴다. 특히 그린 IT � 기� 을 통한 데이터센터의 � �기� �감, 그린화 방안, � 기� 에 대한 사례가 소개돼 눈길을 끌었다.이� 인텔, 오라클, IBM, EMC, 데이터크래프트, 롯데� �보통� , 팔콘스� 어, 디디에스 등 IT 기업들은 자사의 그린 IT구현 방안을 소개하� 성공 사례를 공� 했다.가장 먼� � 인텔코리아의 백남기 이사는 `스마트워크 구현을 위한 인텔의 그린IT � �략`을 주� �로 스마트한 IT 인프라 구축에 대한 방안을 발표했다.백남기 이사는 "다양한 기업 업무에 맞춘 최� �화된 컴퓨팅 디바이스와 기존 인프라 환경의 컨버� �스가 본격 궤도에 오를 것"이라며 "기존 IT 자산을 최대한 활용하면서 미래 비즈니스를 위한 스마트한 IT 인프라 구축이 필요하다"� 말했다.이어진 순서에서는 한국오라클의 김상현 상무가 `오라클의 데이터센터를 통해서 바라본 그린 컴퓨팅 � �략을 발표했으며, 한국IBM 김연광 차장은 `데이터센터 에너지 효율화 방안`에서 서버룸 상면 사용 및 � �� �밀도 현황, � �� �효율지수, 직류사용 등을 통해 � �기/냉각 부문의 에너지 효율화를 높일 수 있다� 강조했다.이와 함께 IBM이 운영 중인 데이터센터의 � �기/냉각 에너지의 효율화 사례를 통해 이를 � 대로 그린 데이터센터 구축 과� �을 설명했다.데이터크래프트 문규영 이사는 "클라우드 환경에서 데이터센터는 더 이상 부동산으로서의 가치나 멋진 환경을 � �공하는 장소가 아닌 쉽� � 르게 구축하� , 안� �� �인 서비스를 � �공� 수 있도록 하는 기반 인프라로서 역� 을 해야한다"며 "클라우드 컴퓨팅의 등장으로 변화되는 데이터센터의 역� 과 � 효율 데이터센터 구성을 위해 클라우드 컴퓨팅 환경에 � �합한 요소(Power System, Space, Cooling System)를 � 민해야 한다"� 말했다.이 밖에도 EMC 황� �식 이사는 `클라우드 컴퓨팅 가속화를 위한 비즈니스 및 기� � �인 � �근`을 주� �로 클라우드 컴퓨팅을 통한 비용투자 효율성을 � �시했으며 롯데� �보통� 윤덕상 센터장은 롯데대� �연구소의 � �용기� 및 에너지 관리 체계를 통해 `차세대 그린 데이터센터 구현 사례`를 설명했다./� �명화기자 some@inews24.comIT는 아이뉴스24 (Copyright ⓒ 아이뉴스24. 무단� �재 및 재배포 금지)

description.hltext_display: FASTER grants to fund 30 transit projects across state
description.author: Jeffrey Leib
description.content:
Colorado transportation officials on Tuesday announced grants totaling about $21 million for about 30 transit projects across the state through 2012.
The money was generated by the FASTER transportation legislation that Colorado lawmakers approved in 2009.
FASTER, which stands for Funding Advancement for Surface Transportation & Economic Recovery, raised money for bridge reconstruction, highway safety projects and transit primarily through an increase in vehicle-registration fees in Colorado.
The law specifies that $10 million a year will be forwarded by CDOT to statewide transit projects.
The awards announced Tuesday include $4 million for the Regional Transportation District's managed lanes/bus rapid-transit project in the U.S. 36 corridor that aims to extend HOV/HOT lanes along that highway.
The FASTER transit awards also include a total of $4 million in 2011 and 2012 for the renovation of Denver's historic Union Station, and a $1 million grant in 2012 for the construction of a pedestrian bridge linking RTD's Alameda light-rail station with an RTD property at 350 S. Santa Fe Drive that is slated for private transit-oriented development.
The Greyhound intercity bus line is looking at locating a new terminal in the Santa Fe development. The total cost of the pedestrian bridge is pegged at about $5 million, so RTD, the city and county of Denver, and developers will need to secure other money to blend with the FASTER grant.
The FASTER funds also are going to transit projects in Trinidad, Colorado Springs, Lamar, Loveland, Avon and other cities. At least nine of the grants are for park-and-ride lots.
For a full list of the FASTER grants, go to www .coloradodot.info/projects/faster/DRAFTFinalScoringFASTER121510.pdf.
The projects. See a list of what got funded. denverpost.com/extras

description.hltext_display: Julien Groß kocht auf der Astor"
description.content:
Julien Groß kocht auf der „Astor“
Weltreise Westersteder bis April an Bord des Luxusliners – Viel Kontakt zu Gästen
Julien Groß aus Westerstede hat für fünf Monate als Koch auf dem Kreuzfahrtschiff „Astor“ angeheuert. In dieser Zeit geht es für ihn einmal rund um die Welt.
Westerstede - Wenn Westerstedes Bürgermeister Klaus Groß in diesen Tagen mit seinem Sohn Julien (25) sprechen möchte, dann muss er abwarten, bis das Kreuzfahrtschiff „MS Astor“ den nächsten Hafen anläuft. An Bord des 1987 in Kiel gebauten Luxusliners arbeitet Julien Groß seit einigen Wochen als Koch. Eigentlich sollte der Ammerländer die Crew versorgen, doch tatsächlich ist Groß im Übersee-Restaurant tätig, achtet auf die perfekte Ausstattung des sehr reichhaltigen Buffets und die Besetzung der verschiedenen Stationen, wo Wokgerichte oder Tatars vor dem Gast zubereitet werden.
Am Dienstag erreichte die NWZ -Redaktion Westerstede eine Mail von Groß, der inzwischen auf dem Weg von Guatemala nach Acapulco ist. Darin schreibt Groß, dass ihm die Atlantiküberquerung trotz hohen Seegangs nichts ausgemacht habe. „Da war schon manchmal Ausnahmezustand. Vieles musste festgebunden werden. Aber das gehört in der Seefahrt dazu“, schrieb der Westersteder.
Verlangt wird vom Personal höchster Einsatz. Es gibt nur wenige Freiräume. „Die kann man aber gut nutzen, um einmal etwas von der Welt zu sehen. Wann kommt man schon mal nach Casablanca, Nizza oder Istanbul. Bin mal gespannt auf Manila und Hongkong“, so Groß. „Auf Bonaire in der Karibik war ich schon schnorcheln. Da fühlt man sich fast wie ein Urlauber“. Aber eben nur fast. An Bord geht der Dienst meist gleich weiter. So fährt Julien Groß nun einmal rund um die Welt. Anfang April steigt er wieder aus. Ob er noch einmal wieder anheuern würde? Groß: „Mal sehen. Vorstellen könnte ich mir das schon“.

description.hltext_display: Agentie de stiri on-line
description.content:
Incepand din decembrie 2010 Fundatia Diaspsora din Timisoara in parteneriat cu MORANET din Morahalom, Ungaria, colaboreaza in vederea crearii unei agentii de stiri online comuna, in vederea consolidarii programelor de stiri transfrontaliere.
Relatia activa cu un trecut indelungat ale judetelor infratite Csongrd si Timis s-a manifestat si in anii trecuti prin elaborarea strategiilor comune de dezvoltare, organizarea sedintelor reprezentantilor, precum si a programelor culturale. Si pana in prezent s-a acordat atentie deosebita identificarii problemelor regiunii transfrontaliere precum si rezolvarii acestora. Ambele judete considera de importanta deosebita ca eforturile comune in cadrul Uniunii Europene sa fie cunoscute, vizibile si simtite pentru locuitorii regiunii.
Pentru atingerea acestor obiective este nevoie printre altele de intarirea surselor de informatii deja cunoscute in randurile locuitorilor judetelor Csongrd si Timis, care sunt accesibile pe scara larga (canale de stiri online).
Cele doua asezari (Morahalom si Timisoara) considera ocazia infiintarii unui post de tv si radio fiind patrunzatorare, care cu ajutorul cooperarii comune poate genera o opinie publica comuna.
Cei doi parteneri vor dezvolta o agentie de stiri on-line transfrontalier, cu caracter regional. Accentul punandu-se pe stirile locale, respectiv regionale.
La Timisoara sub egida Fundatiei Diaspora, se va infiinta un post de radio, respectiv la Morahalom vor functiona posturi de televiziune si radio.
Agentia de stiri va functiona in ambele limbi ale regiunii, respectiv emisiunile radio si TV, vor contine emisiuni si in limba vecinului, respectiv vor fi realizate subtitrari.
Proiectul este finantad de Uniunea Europeana, prin Programul de Cooperare Transfrontaliera Ungaria-Romania 2007 - 2013.
fundatia diaspora timisoara, agentie de presa, ungaria, parteneriat, programe de stiri transfrontaliere

description.hltext_display: La balanza comercial cerraría el año con fuerte superávit
description.content:
El 2010 cerrará con un superávit comercial de alrededor de 13.000 millones de dólares, según las proyecciones realizadas por el Centro de Economía Internacional de la Cancillería. La estimación fue adelantada por el secretario de Comercio y Relaciones Económicas Internacionales, Luis María Kreckler, en el marco de la presentación del Programa Integrado de Promoción Comercial, Inversiones y Desarrollo de Mercados Externos 2011 que realizó el canciller Héctor Timerman.
Las exportaciones argentinas totalizarán este año alrededor de 68.400 millones de dólares, con un crecimiento estimado del 23% respecto al 2009, mientras que las importaciones sumarían 54.700 millones.
"De esta manera, el saldo comercial rondaría los 13.000 millones de dólares", recalcó Kreckler.
El año pasado, en plena crisis internacional, la balanza comercial marcó un superávit de 16.980 millones de dólares, con una mejora del 35% respecto a 2008.
Uno de los aspectos diferenciales entre un año y otro pasa por los volúmenes de intercambio, ya que en 2009 el total exportado fue de 55.750 millones de dólares contra 38.771 millones de dólares desembolsados en concepto de importaciones, en el marco de una política de defensa de la industria local de parte del Gobierno nacional.
En lo que respecta a las perspectivas para el 2011, el Centro de Economía Internacional proyectó que las exportaciones crecerán al menos un 12,5% y marcarán un nuevo récord histórico al trepar hasta 77.000 millones de dólares.
El embajador señaló que ese 12,5% "es un piso para 2011" y agregó que este año los envios cerrarán en 68.400 millones de dólares.
De concretarse las exportaciones proyectadas para 2011, dejarán atrás la anterior marca máxima anterior alcanzada en 2008, cuando bordearon los 71.000 millones de dólares.
Con estos números en la mano, Kreckler consideró que "nos espera un 2011 muy auspicioso en 2011" y no dudó en calificarlo como "el año de Latinoamérica en comercio e inversiones".
"Las manufacturas de origen industrial han tenido un crecimiento importante, no obstante la crisis financiera internacional", agregó.
Por otra parte, sostuvo que "va a haber una mejora sustancial en inversión extranjera directa productiva".
Destacó la importancia de los países del BRIC (Brasil-Rusia-India-China) como socios estratégicos y resaltó la decisión del Gobierno de "diversificar mercados, llegar a mercados donde tenemos que posicionarnos más".

description.hltext_display: Cortei a sorpresa, c'è attesa a Roma
description.content: 9.13 Oggi è il giorno dei cortei degli studenti contro la riforma Gelmini. A Roma c'è molta attesa perché non è stata chiesta alcuna autorizzazione. Punto di partenza dei cortei a sorpresa sarà l' Università La Sapienza, alle 9,30. La zona rossa è presidiata da 2mila agenti Anche nelle altre città manifestazioni in tempi diversi: a Torino alle 10,30 a Palazzo Campana; a Genova in piazza San Lorenzo alle 15; a Milano presidio itinerante partendo da piazza Duomo; a Napoli,alle 14 a Piazza del Gesù.Proteste anche a Salerno,Bari,Cosenza e Palermo.

description.hltext_display: Sacramento toys for troops drive faces more demand, fewer donations
description.author: Brandon Atchison
description.content:
SACRAMENTO, CA - For five years Rodney Stanhope, retired from the U.S. Navy, has camped in a shack at Arden Fair Mall for 12 days in December to gather gifts for local military families in need as part of Operation Christmas for Our Troops.
"The request for families in need is about three times more than normal, and this year donations are about 50 percent," Stanhope said.
Donations of gifts, cash or home supplies can be dropped off at Stanhope's shack until 5 p.m. Wednesday, Dec. 22. He's located in the mall parking lot near Best Buy and Toys R Us.
For more information on Operation Christmas for Our Troops, click here. By Brandon Atchison, batchison@news10.net

event_or_fact.property: The request for families in need is about three times more than normal, and this year donations are about 50 percent

description.hltext_display: AXN SI CRUCEA ROSIE ROMANA AJUTA 200 DE ...
description.content:
AXN – reteaua internationala de televiziune de actiune si aventura apartinand concernului Sony Pictures Television International, impreuna cu Crucea Rosie Romana, vor organiza in preajma sarbatorilor de iarna, o campanie pentru colecta de rechizite pentru copiii proveniti din familii nevoiase - “Fii generos! Ajuta o familie de sarbatori! “.
AXN si Crucea Rosie Romana, cu sprijinul real,- hypermarket, organizeaza campania umanitara “Fii generos! Ajuta o familie de sarbatori!“ in intervalul 27 noiembrie - 30 decembrie. Scopul campaniei consta in oferirea de articole de imbracaminte si rechizite unui numar de 200 de adolescenti din judetele Arad si Bacau, 2 judete situate in zone sarace si afectate de inundatii precum si in implicarea oamenilor in vederea sprijinirii campaniei umanitare prin donatii de rechizite.
Astfel, au fost achizitionate jachete de iarna si rechizite pentru tineri din Bacau, Comanesti, Margineni si Rachitoasa si din localitatile Pecica si Nadlac din judetul Arad. Aceste jachete si rechizite au fost daruite, intr-o prima faza, adolescentilor si familiilor lor in din judetul Arad in prima parte a lunii decembrie 2010, urmand ca beneficiarii din judetul Bacau sa le primeasca in a doua parte a lunii. Beneficiarii sunt familii care traiesc intr-o stare de saracie extrema, cauzata de inundatiile din vara acestui an, precum si de agravarea crizei economice.
Pentru a creste numarul de beneficiari, AXN si Crucea Rosie cu ajutorul real,- hypermarket, incurajeaza publicul larg ca pana pe 30 decembrie 2010 sa se alature campaniei pentru colectarea de rechizite - “Fii generos! Ajuta o familie de sarbatori!“.
Oricine doreste sa ajute copiii proveniti din familii nevoiase cu rechizite, pot face donatii in hypermarket-urile real,- din Bucuresti, Bacau si Arad, in recipiente special amenajate, amplasate dupa linia caselor de marcat din magazine.
In perioada 10-20 decembrie, pachetele cu imbracaminte si rechizite vor fi distribuite de catre filialele Crucii Rosii Romane din Arad si Bacau impreuna cu AXN in cadrul unor serbari de Craciun organizate in comunitatile in care locuiesc familiile selectate.
Mai multe detalii puteti gasi pe site-urile www.axn.ro si www.crucearosie.ro.
Colecta de rechizite continua pana la sfarsitul lunii decembrie, urmand ca rechizitele stranse in perioada urmatoare sa fie daruite adolescentilor la inceputul lunii ianuarie 2011.
Fii generos! Ajuta o familie de sarbatori!

description.hltext_display: VIP, file din povestea de dupa Gala 2010
description.content:
Asociatia studenteasca Voluntari pentru Idei si Proiecte a sarbatorit 12 ani de activitate in domeniul educational, printr-o Gala ce a avut loc la Centrul Tinerimea Romana. La acest eveniment a luat parte fiecare student si fiecare partener care, prin contributia sa, a dus la dezvoltarea VIP.
Cu aceasta ocazie, a avut loc premierea Project Managerilor care au incercat prin proiectele pe care le-au coordonat sa transforme potentialul in exceptional, asa cum si-au propus. Momentele artistice ale serii au fost sustinute de trupa de new jazz, Cuantune, de chitarisul Alexandru Chifu, pianista Cezara Suman si solista Ada Barbu. Printre invitatii speciali care au lasat pe scena o parte din povestea interactiunii lor cu VIP Romania s-au numarat: Anca Haiduc- HR Manager Danone Romania, Alice Barb si Ecaterina Andronescu.
Volutari pentru Idei si Proiecte este o organizatie studenteasca ce activeaza in domeniul educational si care cu ajutorul experientei de 12-a ani reuseste prin proiectele sale sa produca o schimbare pozitiva in societate.
asociatie studenteasca, voluntari, idei, proiecte

description.hltext_display: العراق: موازنة عاجزة وبطالة فاقت 50 في المئة
description.content: لذا تواصلت الدعوات الى ترشيد الإنفاق، للعام الثالث على التوالي، حكومياً وبرلمانياً، كما راهنت الحكومة على رفد الموازنة بمزيد من الأموال اعتماداً على افتراضين: الأول ارتفاع أسعار النفط، والثاني مباشرة شركات أجنبية في تطوير حقول النفط بما يسمح بزيادة حجم الصادرات إلى 8 ملايين برميل خلال خمس سنوات. غير أن حجم الصادرات النفطية بقي يراوح بين مليون و900 ألف برميل ومليوني برميل يومياً، بينما سجل حجم الإنتاج نحو مليوني برميل، يذهب الفرق بينهما الى الاستهلاك المحلي.ولجأت الحكومة، في إطار سعيها الى زيادة الموارد المالية، إلى توقيع عقود خدمة مع شركات نفطية عالمية بينها �شل، �إكسون موبيل، �توتال، �بريتش بتروليوم، ضمن 3 جولات تراخيص لتطوير حقول النفط وتأهيلها وزيادة إنتاجها. وهيمنت النفقات التشغيلية على موازنة هذا العام أيضاً، فبلغت 70 في المئة في مقابل 29 في المئة فقط للنفقات الاستثمارية. ويقول خبراء اقتصاد ان الازدهار الاقتصادي والمعيشي في العراق لا يزال وربما سيبقى وقتاً طويلاً، رهناً بعاملين: الأول رفع سقف الصادرات النفطية باعتبارها عماد الواردات المالية، وثانيها استتباب الوضع الأمني لتشجيع الاستثمار. وعلى رغم الوعود التي أطلقها رئيس الوزراء نوري المالكي خلال ولايته الأولى (نحو أربع سنوات) بانطلاق نهضة الاعمار والاستثمار، إلا أن شيئاً من ذلك لم يتحقق بسبب غياب هذين العاملين. لذلك استمرت معاناة العراقيين من نقص خدمات الكهرباء وتدني مستوى المعيشة والبطالة وفقدان الأمن وتردي الخدمات الصحية والتعليمية، مع توقف شبه تام للنشاط الزراعي والصناعي، ما أدى إلى انخفاض الناتج المحلي الإجمالي والاعتماد في شكل شبه كلّي على مردود النفط من العملات الصعبة. وانعكس هذا التدهور على حياة العراقيين ومداخيلهم، وبيّنت إحصاءات غير رسمية أن نسبة البطالة ارتفعت إلى أكثر من 50 في المئة من قوة العمل البالغة 7 ملايين نسمة. وفيما تقدر الدراسات الاقتصادية كلفة إعمار العراق بـ 187 بليون دولار، فإن نسبة التمويل المحلي فيه لا تتجاوز 42 في المئة. وقال المسؤول العراقي النفطي السابق محمد عبوش: �من دون تسوية الخلافات السياسية واستقرار الأوضاع الأمنية وإقرار قانون النفط والغاز، فإن العراق لن يتمكن من تحقيق أهدافه الاقتصادية، بخاصة النفطية. وتقدر وزارة النفط المخزون الخام بـ 505 بلايين برميل، فيما يبلغ الاحتياط القابل للاستخراج نحو 143 بليون برميل، من 66 حقل نفط. وترجح توقعات تحقيق فائض مالي أكبر خلال عام 2011، في ظل ارتفاع الأسعار إلى أكثر من 80 دولاراً للبرميل وزيادة صادرات العراق إلى نحو مليونين و250 ألف برميل يومياً. لكن النشاط الاستثماري بقي طوال العام يراوح مكانه بسبب استمرار عزوف المستثمرين الأجانب عن توظيف أموالهم خوفاً من الوضع الأمني الهش، فيما اقتصرت نسبة المستثمر المحلي على 2 في المئة فقط، ووصلت نسبة المستثمر الأجنبي إلى 89 في المئة فيما حافظ الاستثمار الحكومي على نحو 9 في المئة.ووصف مستشار البنك المركزي العراقي مظهر صالح هذه الاستثمارات بـ �الهشة لأن معظمها صناعات تجميعية، مشيراً إلى معوقات تحول دون تدفق الاستثمارات الحقيقية، مثل المصاعب الكبيرة التي تقف أمام تملك المستثمرين من أراضٍ وعقارات عائدة الى الدولة. وأعلنت هيئة الاستثمار أنها تدرس 600 مشروع بقيمة 600 بليون دينار، ستكون الأولوية فيها لقطاعي التعليم والسكن، وأنها تدرس عروضاً لإنشاء مليون وحدة سكنية سيتم اختيار 35 شركة لتنفيذها. وقال الخبير الاقتصادي الحكومي سلام القريشي: �الشركات الاستثمارية التركية تعد الأكثر تواجداً في العراق وبلغ عددها 270، معظمها متخصص في بناء المجمعات السكنية والطاقة الكهربائية، تليها الشركات الفرنسية وعددها 123.وبلغ حجم التبادل التجاري بين العراق وتركيا 8 بلايين دولار هذا العام، ويسعى البلدان إلى مضاعفته في العام المقبل، لا سيما في مجالات الطاقة والزراعة والصناعة.واستقر سعر صرف الدينار العراقي طوال العام الجاري على نحو 1180 ديناراً لكل دولار، وعزز قيمة الدينار إعلان البنك المركزي أخيراً ارتفاع حجم احتياطاته من العملات الصعبة إلى أكثر من 50 بليون دولار. ورأى مستشار البنك المركزي مظهر محمد صالح أن �هذه الزيادة أتت من ارتفاع أسعار النفط خلال النصف الثاني من العام الجاري، ما انعكس إيجاباً على احتياطات البنك من العملة الأجنبية.وفيما رأى الخبير الاقتصادي عبدالرحمن المشهداني أن �زيادة قوة الدينار ستساهم في زيادة وثوق المستثمر الأجنبي والمحلي بالاقتصاد عموماً وبمتانة العملة العراقية خصوصاً، استبعد الخبير الاقتصادي سالم الجبوري أن �يكون لارتفاع حجم احتياطات البنك المركزي من العملات الأجنبية على رغم مزاياه، أي انعكاسات ايجابية على الاقتصاد في ظل غياب آلية واضحة لاستغلال هذه الزيادة في عملية التنمية واستراتيجية معالجة مشكلة الديون المستحقة على العراق. وأقرت الحكومة في 30 تشرين الثاني (نوفمبر) الماضي موازنة عام 2011 البالغة 92.98 تريليون دينار عراقي (نحو 79.60 بليون دولار) بعجز يبلغ 14 تريليون دينار (11.99 بليون دولار). ويبلغ حجم الإنفاق التشغيلي في مشروع قانون الموازنة العامة لعام 2011، الذي صادق عليه مجلس الوزراء أخيراً بانتظار مصادقة البرلمان، 64 تريليون دينار، بينما لا يزيد حجم الإنفاق الاستثماري على 29 تريليون دينار. ورصدت الحكومة أكثر من 24 تريليوناً لدعم نفقات البطاقة التموينية والأمن والدفاع والكهرباء والأدوية. من جهة أخرى، وافق البنك المركزي على منح تراخيص لأربعة مصارف جديدة، يبلغ رأس مال كل منها 250 بليون دينار (212 مليون دولار) ما يرفع عدد المصارف الأهلية العاملة إلى 35 مصرفاً، اضافة الى مصرفي الرشيد والرافدين الحكوميين، بينما بلغ عدد فروع المصارف العربية والأجنبية العاملة 7، تعود لشركات بحرينية وتركية ولبنانية وإيرانية وإماراتية. بغداد - يو بي آي

description.hltext_display: Executiile in scadere. S-a terminat injectia letala
description.content:
Autoritatile din SUA au aplicat mai putine pedepse cu moartea deoarece au ramas fara obiectul muncii, injectia letala. Cei condamnati la pedeapsa capitala, pot sta linistiti inca o vreme, pana cand le va veni randul, deoarece substanta folosita pentru injectie nu se gaseste pe toate gardurile dar si datorita crizei economice. In vremurile in care traim costurile pe care le implica executia unui om sunt foarte mari si greu de suportat, relateaza Yahoo News.
Autoritatea din SUA , responsabila cu buna desfasurare si respectarea bunelor practici atunci cand vine vorba de pedeapsa capitala, a spus in raportul sau anual ca rata pedepselor capitale care au fost duse la bun sfarsit a scazut cu 12% fata de anul trecut. De asemenea si numarul pedepselor capitale s-a mentinut la unul dintre cele mai scazte niveluri de reintroducerea acestei pedepse, in 1976.
Texas este statul american cu cele mai multe pedepse capitale executate, 17 din totalul de 49 realizate la nivelul tarii. Numarul total de executii este in scadere, in 2009, realizandu-se 52 de executii, aproape jumatate din pedepsele capitale indeplinite in 1999.
Din 1976, in SUA s-au realizat 1.234 de executii, mai mult de jumatate s-au produs in Texas si Virginia.

description.hltext_display: 瑞银集团12月22日汇市评论:欧债问题仍将是年末汇市的推动因素
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
美元兑欧元亚市小幅走低，但兑其他G10货币总体上维持区间内窄幅波动。欧元/美元交投区间位于1.3074-1.3143，美元/日元交投区间位于83.71-83.91。
后市即将公布美国第三季度GDP以及成屋销售数据。我们的美国经济学家们预计，美国第三季度GDP年化季率终值将上升2.8%，前值为上升2.5%。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 自今年夏季以来，美国经济数据已经出现改善，美国GDP数据的上修将反映这一情况。
欧元区债务问题在年末仍将成为汇市最主要的推动因素，这应该会对欧元/美元造成进一步的下行压力。
考虑到欧元区债务危机的不断加剧，美联储已批准将与加拿大央行(BOC)、英国央行(BOE)、欧洲央行(ECB)、日本央行(BOJ)和瑞士央行(SNB)的美元流动性互换协议延长至2011年8月1日。于2010年5月份制定的流动性互换协议原定于2011年1月到期。
2

description.hltext_display: Prep Basketball: South Rowan girls 51, W ...
description.content:
LANDIS — On a night when many girls qualified for frequent-fouler mileage, South Rowan senior Sam Goins took the hardest shot.
When Goins went up in the lane for a jumper early in the fourth quarter, she was inadvertently clobbered by West Iredell’s Kelli Bolick. Goins went down and stayed down, finally leaving the court with tears in her eyes and South clinging to a three-point lead.
Nicole Barringer came off the bench and converted one of the free throws Goins was awarded, and Goins was able to return once her head cleared. She led the Raiders to a 51-36 NPC victory with 15 points and 12 rebounds.
“I did get beat up a little bit, but we really got it done when we had to tonight,” Goins said with a smile. “We were all tired of losing.”
South broke a four-game skid against a team that logged an NPC victory against East Rowan.
The Raiders (4-5, 1-1) shot 22 percent in the first half but still led 19-15 because the Warriors also struggled.
West Iredell guard Tess Sigmon, who could play for anyone, hit two 3s in the third quarter to keep her team in it, and the Warriors (1-8, 1-1) trailed just 28-25 heading to the final eight minutes. That’s when Goins got accidentally decked, and that’s when the Raiders started playing with a lot more fire and energy.
A flurry on the boards by Maria Gaddy, who scored all nine of her points in the final quarter, finally gave South some separation, and the Raiders’ defensive pressure caused enough turnovers to maintain a lead.
“We were able to rotate defensive and offensive players in and out, and our depth made the difference in the fourth quarter,” Smith said. “Gaddy’s defense was huge — she can guard any position on the floor — and we played pretty good man-to-man as a team.”
WEST IREDELL (36) — Sigmon 14, Gatton 8, Ellis 4, Moose 2,Gaines 2, Marshall 2, Ijames 2, Bolick 2, Lucas, Riddle, Scott.
SOUTH ROWAN (51) — Goins 15, Gaddy 9, Miller 7, McManus 6, Barringer 5, Swartz 5, Jones 4, Allison, K. Corriher, L. Corriher, Register.
W. Iredell 6 9 10 11 — 36
S. Rowan 9 10 9 23 — 51

description.hltext_display: 四川渝遂高速连环追尾延绵数公里 已致6人死亡
description.content:
华龙网12月22日14时报道 今日上午8时左右，渝遂高速公路青木关隧道往重庆方向发生一起多车连环相撞事故。截至发稿时，记者从相关部门获悉，事故已造成6人死亡，受伤人数不详。
来自交通部门的信息显示，事故发生后，渝遂高速公路青木关收费站入口进行了管制。同时，进城方向的车通过绕城高速到重庆主城区，车辆分流造成中梁山入城隧道通行缓慢。(本文来源：华龙网 作者：庞可)

description.hltext_display: Inter, tutto dice Leo
description.content:
20:02 del 21 dicembre
20:00 del 21 dicembre
09:15 del 22 dicembre
Moratti deciso a puntare sull'ex tecnico del Milan che ha sempre stimato. Se arrivasse potrebbe proporre un modulo fantasia. Proposta sino al 2012. Tramonta l'idea Spalletti per non fare sgarbi allo Zenit.
Lo scontro: mail e telefono, come è complicato lasciarsi con Rafa. L'Inter non vuole pagargli il secondo anno. Benitez replica: "Mi presento il 29". E Branca media.
(La Gazzetta dello Sport)

description.hltext_display: Ruotsin akatemia palkitsi elokuvaohjaaja Jan Troellin
description.content:
Elokuvaohjaaja Jan Troell on saanut Ruotsin akatemian suuren palkinnon, kertoo Dagens Nyheter. Aikaisemmin vain yksi elokuvaohjaaja on palkittu samalla palkinnolla. Sen sai Ingmar Bergman vuonna 1977.
Jan Troell on työskennellyt elokuvaohjaajana 1960-luvulta lähtien. Tällä hetkellä hän tekee elokuvaa natsien vastaisesta mediavaikuttajasta Torgny Segerstedtistä.

description.content: Ágyúkat, helikoptereket és hadihajókat vonultat fel Dél-Korea a szerdán kezdődött újabb hadgyakorlatán, Phenjan egyelőre nem reagált, de egyre feszültebb a helyzet.

description.hltext_display: 하종선 현대그룹 사장 문답
description.content: 하종� 현대그룹 � �략기획본부 사장은 22일 그동안 논란을 불러일으킨 프랑스 나티시스은행 대출금 1조2천억원에 대해 "일종의 브릿지� (Bridge loan)"이라� 밝혔다. 현대건설 인수합병(M&A)을 주도해온 하 사장은 현대건설 매각과 관� �해 서울중앙지법에서 열린 '양해각서(MOU) 해지 금지 가처분 � 청' 첫 심리에 참석했다가 기자들과 만나 이같이 밝혔다. 채권단이 요구한 나티시스은행 대출계약서 � �출을 거부했다가 최근 현대건설 인수 우� 협상대상자 지위를 박탈당한 현대그룹이 대출경위를 공개� �으로 밝힌 것은 이번이 처음이다. 다음은 하 사장과의 문답. --현대차 측에서 드러나지 않는 대출형태('스리� 션'으로 표현) 의혹을 � �기했는데. ▲스리� 션 한 � � 없다. 자산을 담보로 하거나 자산을 활용한 파생상품을 만들거나 한 � � 없다는 � �을 분명히 밝힌다. --채권단으로부터 현대건설 주식매각 양해각서(MOU)를 해지 당한 소감은. ▲슈퍼스타 K2의 '허각'이 음대를 나오지 않았다� 자격을 박탈당했을 때 어떤 심� �이� 느냐? 그와 같은 심� �이다. 현� �은 회장이 그간 숱한 � 난과 역경을 겪어왔다. 이번 어� �움도 법원의 공� �한 판단으로 극복하� � �주영 회장, � �몽헌 회장께서 생� �에 가졌던 � 지, 북방사업, 대북사업을 위해 현대건설을 크게 쓰실 그런 � 이 올 것이라� 믿는다. --법원 심리에서 '짜인 각본'이라� 했는데 그게 무엇인지. ▲오늘 자 모 � 문에 보도된 � 재한 � �책금융공사 사장 인터뷰 내용에 계획과 의도가 나타나 있다� 생각한다. 우리 나름대로 법과 입찰규� �에 따라 나티시스은행 자금 의혹을 해명하기 위해 노� �했다. 세 차례에 걸친 확인서를 통해 � �법한 자금임을 해명했� 의혹을 확실히 해소했다� 생각한다. 법원의 공� �한 판단이 있을 것으로 믿는다. --법� � 분위기는 어� 나. ▲변호인이 그간 비공개의무조항 때문에 하지 못했던 말을 속 시원히 얘기했다� 생각한다. --대출 경위를 밝힐 의향이 있나. ▲이미 일찍이 채권단에 공문으로 설명했다. � 초 넥스� 이 투자에 참여하� �다가 입찰규� �상 다른 컨소시엄 멤버가 인수대금을 못 낼 경우에 대한 연대책임을 부담해야 하는 문� �로 넥스� 투자위원회가 투자를 � � � 보류하게 됐다. 이때 넥스� 이 자� 의 100% 모회사인 나티시스은행에 상황을 잘 설명해 대출이 이뤄지게 된 것이다. 언� 에 보도됐� 증권가에서도 말하는 브릿지� 과 � 사한 대출이 이뤄졌던 것이다. 대형 글로벌 M&A 경우에 일단 브릿지� 을 얻은 후 재무� �투자자(FI)나 � �략� �투자자(SI)의 협의가 완결되면 대출 대� 투자의 형태로 대체하는 것이 널리 행해지는 방법의 하나다. '승자의 � �주'는 누구보다도 우리가 � �일 우� �한다. 차입금을 인수대금으로 쓰는 걸 줄이� �� 지난 11월18일 창우동 � 영에서 현 회장이 투자자 � �촉을 계속하� 있다� 말했다. 한두 달이면 대금을 완납하는 스케줄인데 그걸 못 기다리� 채권단이 MOU를 해지했다. 채권단이 � �시한 주식매매계약(SPA)에서 현대건설의 주식 등을 담보로 안 쓴다는 조항의 위배에 대비해 거액의 현금보증금을 내도록 하게 돼 있다. 이� �듯 안� �장치들이 많은데도 채권단이 한두 달을 못 기다리� MOU를 해지한 것은 참으로 부당하다. --� �3의 자금이 있는지. ▲넥스� 등 7개 � �도의 투자자가 있다. --대출과 � 상증자는 별개인가. ▲대출을 받아 놓았지만 FI, SI를 � 치해 대체함으로써 대출금을 인수대금에 사용하는 규모를 줄이� �는 것이다. 이번 M&A의 특이� �은 컨소시엄 멤버 변경에 대해 채권단의 사� � 동의가 필요하다는 것이었다.다른 M&A에서는 우� 협상대상자 � � � 이후 FI나 SI를 � 치해도 그 추가가 자� 로운데 이번 입찰에는 채권단이 현대그룹이 FI나 SI를 추가하� �� 해도 동의를 안 해주� 다� 사이드로 말하는 상황이었다. 그래서 현대상� 프랑스법인을 컨소시엄 멤버로 넣은 것도 향후 � 치되는 FI, SI가 현대상� 프랑스법인의 � 상증자를 통해 인수� �에 채권단 동의 없이도 참여하는 방안이었다. 현대상� 프랑스법인을 사실상 특수목� �법인(SPC)으로 활용하는 방안을 처음부터 추진 중이었다. 예� � 창우동 � 영에서도 말했듯이 하� 싶은 말이 많았지만 비공개의무 입찰규� � 때문에 이런 내용은 SPA 체결 이후 밝히� � 했다. --추가 소송 계획은. ▲24일 가처분 � 청 심리를 보� 나서 결� �하� 다. --채권단 중재안에 대한 생각은. ▲현대건설 이사회, 소액주주, 주요주주를 무시하는 법 위에 있는 것과 같은 � �안이라� 생각한다. 현대그룹은 그런 위법한 방안에 공범이 � 수 없다. --이런 소송 진행은 현 회장의 뜻인가. ▲그� �다. --추가 국내투자자 있는지. ▲동양종금증권 외에는 없다. (연합뉴스)

description.hltext_display: Kreative Pause hinterm Vorhang
description.content:
RASTEDE, 22. Dezember 2010
Kultur Theater Orlando präsentiert in dieser Spielzeit keine neue Produktion
Für das Jahr 2011 sei aber inzwischen ein Stück ausgewählt worden. Jetzt wird beantragt, dieses aufführen zu dürfen, berichtet Theaterleiterin Sylvia Meining.
Rastede - Das Theater Orlando gönnt sich eine kreative Pause. „In diesem Jahr wird es leider keine neue Produktion geben“, berichtet Theaterleiterin Sylvia Meining. Die erste positive Nachricht für die kommende Spielzeit gibt es aber inzwischen: „Wir haben bereits ein Stück ausgewählt und beantragen jetzt, es aufführen zu dürfen“, erzählt die Theaterleiterin. Voraussichtlich Mitte kommenden Jahres soll endgültig feststehen, ob es Ende 2011 eine Produktion des Theaters geben wird.
Bei dem Zimmertheater, das einmal als kleinstes Theater Niedersachsens beschrieben wurde und sich längst zu einem Kleinod der Rasteder Theaterkultur entwickelt hat, sind in den vergangenen Wochen viele Anfragen eingegangen, wann es denn wieder losgeht. „Nach über 20 Jahren intensiver Theaterarbeit, die immer auch mit viel Ringen verbunden ist, um ein Stück überhaupt erst möglich zu machen, macht das Theater Orlando in dieser Saison eine kreative Pause“, teilt Sylvia Meining mit.
Ein Aspekt ist offenbar auch die Finanzierung. Mittel fließen unter anderem von der Gemeinde, dem Landkreis, der Oldenburgischen Landschaft, Stiftungen und Sponsoren sowie fördernden Mitgliedern.
Geld bekommt das Theater allerdings stets projektbezogen. Für ein neues Stück müssen neue Anträge gestellt werden. Grundsätzlich seien es aber verschiedene Aspekte, die zusammenkommen und nun zu der kreativen Pause geführt haben, betont Sylvia Meining.
„Kunst und Kultur stehen stets vor der Herausforderung, sich mit der Wirklichkeit auseinanderzusetzen, dem Zeitgeist gerecht zu werden und ihn gleichzeitig zu hinterfragen. Diesem Anspruch wollen wir auch in Zukunft gerecht werden“, versichert die Theaterleiterin und fügt an: „Dabei ist es allerdings nicht immer ganz einfach, den Spagat zwischen künstlerischem Anspruch und den immer knapper werdenden Kassen hinzubekommen.“
Feststeht, dass das Theater Orlando auch weiterhin mit Tatkraft voranschreiten will und glaubt, dass es im kommenden Jahr wieder heißen wird: „Vorhang auf“ im Palais. Sylvia Meining: „Wir freuen uns mit Ihnen auf eine neue Inszenierung.“
Das Theater Orlando wurde von Sylvia Meining gegründet. Das erste Stück war „Die Zofen“ von Jean Genet im Jahr 1988/1989.
Die erfolgreichsten Stücke waren den Aufführungszahlen nach „Gretchen 89ff“ von Lutz Hübner und „Fräulein Julie“ von August Strindberg. Insgesamt lockten die Stücke des Theaters Orlando inzwischen mehr als 25 000 Besucher aus der gesamten Region.
Die Aufführungen finden nicht nur in Rastede statt. Auch im Museumsdorf in Cloppenburg, im Schloss zu Jever und in der Oldenburger Kulturetage gastierte das Theater bereits.
Mit dem Stück „Fräulein Julie“ wurde das Theater Orlando aus Rastede im Jahr 1997 als einzige deutsche Produktion zum internationalen Strindberg Festival in Stockholm eingeladen.

description.hltext_display: 火箭远离虎头蛇尾 客场击退勇士
银行理财产品坚持短期稳健
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } 接近年尾，市场上银行理财产品走俏的依然是短期 (一年期以内)、稳健型。 “因为如果要博取很高的收益，一般市民都会选择涉股的基金产品或者索性自己炒股票，买银行理财还是主要为了抵御通胀，而现在大多数银行的理财产品三个月期的都能达到银行一年期定存利率水平。 ”光大银行黄浦支行的一位客户经理告诉记者。他同时透露，估计各大银行都会对客户投入资金量的多少给予一些区别对待。工行南京西路支行的理财师也预计：“由于加息预期仍然在，银行明年主推的产品应该仍然是短期稳健型的。 ”
金融界网站的统计数据也印证了市场人士的判断，在上周发行的181只银行理财产品中，组合投资类理财产品发行数量占总发行量的37.02%，共发行67只，发行数量仍居首位；处在第二位的是债券投资类理财产品，发行数量为50只，占总体发行数量的27.62%；处于发行数量第三位的是票据类理财产品，发行数量43只，占总体发行数量的23.76%。稳健型投资产品占据主体地位的发行格局未见改变。
而从投资期限的分布来看，上周发行的理财产品中，1个月以下的理财产品，发行数量为60只，占总发行量的33.15%；1-3个月理财产品，发行数量为44只，占总发行量的24.31%；3-6个月的理财产品，发行数量为 35只，占总发行量的19.34%；6-12个月理财产品，本周发行41只，占总发行量的22.65%；24个月以上理财产品本周发行1只。本周3个月以内的短期理财产品占比仍将近六成，短期理财产品继续占据发行主体地位。
值得注意的是，从发行机构来看，上周北京银行发行数量最多，取代了一直排在首位的交通银行，北京银行发行产品31只，占总体发行数量的17.13%；发行数量第二位的是交通银行，本周发行产品30只，占总体发行量的16.57%；排在第三名的是中国银行，发行产品27只，占总体发行数量的14.92%；兴业银行、华夏银行和汇丰银行发行数量较少，分别发行1只产品。
从本周到期产品的收益率来看，南京银行发行的“聚喜(1004期IV)”人民币6个月期银行间市场投资理财产品到期收益率为2.8%，排在首位。(崔烨)
（责任编辑：张元缘）

description.hltext_display: El Banco Mundial le dará créditos a la Argentina por u$s 1.061 M.
description.content:
El Directorio Ejecutivo del Banco Mundial (BM) aprobó tres proyectos para la Argentina por un monto total de $1.061 millones de dólares, anunció el organismo multilateral.
Los dos proyectos Norte Grande, el de Agua y el de Infraestructura, generarán oportunidades para todos para acceder a servicios de agua y saneamiento así como a una mejor infraestructura vial, que mejore la integración y potencie la competitividad de esa región del país, indicó el Banco Mundial.
El tercer proyecto "Funciones Esenciales de Salud Publica II", beneficiará a más de cuatro millones de personas que participan en siete programas de salud.
"El Gobierno de Argentina fortalece su estrategia de promover un desarrollo inclusivo, expandiendo los servicios sociales para los más vulnerables y consolidando programas de salud, con la aprobación de estos nuevos proyectos con el Banco Mundial", sostuvo el ministro de Economía, Amado Boudou.
Los u$s600 millones de los dos proyectos Norte Grande van a generar una inyección de recursos en la infraestructura de las provincias más pobres de Argentina, fortaleciendo la infraestructura regional.
Penélope Brook, directora del Banco Mundial para Argentina, Paraguay y Uruguay, sostuvo que "el año termina con un renovado apoyo del Banco Mundial a la Argentina. Hemos trabajado junto al gobierno en la preparación de 8 proyectos por un total de $1.595 millones en nuevas aprobaciones, incluyendo las tres de hoy".
"El eje del apoyo -agregó- se centra en generar oportunidades para todos los argentinos en las áreas de salud, infraestructura y medio ambiente".

description.hltext_display: Taiteilijaeläkkeiden määrä kasvaa
description.content:
Valtion myöntämien taiteilijaeläkkeiden määrä kasvaa vuodenvaihteessa. Opetusministeriön mukaan taiteilijaeläkkeitä hakeneiden määrä on kasvanut 2000-luvulla jatkuvasti.
Harkinnanvaraisia taiteilijaeläkkeitä myönnettiin tänä vuonna 35 täyttä eläkettä vastaava määrä. Ensi vuonna niitä jaetaan 51.
Taiteilijaeläkkeitä myönnetään sekä osa-aikaisena että täytenä eläkkeenä.
Taiteilijaeläkkeiden lukumäärä nousi nyt ensimmäistä kertaa sen jälkeen kun sen määrä laski asteittain 1990-luvun alussa 65 täydestä eläkkeestä nykyiselle tasolleen. Samalla eläkkeiden määräraha siirtyy valtion talousarviossa opetus- ja kulttuuriministeriön pääluokkaan.
Vuonna 2010 täyden tai osaeläkkeen sai 42 hakijaa, mikä teki alle kymmenen prosenttia hakijoista. Vuonna 2011 taiteilijaeläkettä hakee 480 henkilöä. Kymmenen vuotta aiemmin hakijoita oli runsaat 300, joten hakijamäärä on kasvanut yli 50 prosenttia 1990-luvun lopusta.

description.hltext_display: Ogboru Moves to Garner Anioma Votes
description.content:
The Democratic Peoples Party, DPP, candidate in the Re-run gubernatorial election in Delta State, Chief Great Ogboru, and his deputy, Chief Okenmor Tilije, have met with Anioma National Council, ANC, seeking the group's support to actualise their ambition.
This is coming after the DPP guber hopeful visited the Asagba of Asaba, Prof. Chike Edozien, to seek his royal blessings and make promises to address all the wrongs in the state, if voted into power.
The meeting, weekend, attracted such influential Anioma indigenes as John Edozien, a former Deputy Governor of the defunct Bendel State and a respected former Permanent Secretary at the Ministry of National Planning Chief, Terry Otuya President of Oganihu Anioma, Joe Obuseh, a former Director General of the State Security Service, SSS, among others.
Addressing the gathering, Ogboru said he will work to ensure credible, free and fair elections in Delta State and ensure unity and harmony in the state, a move he said will make Deltans see themselves as one family and de-emphasize tribal sentiments that divide them.
On the critical issue of power shift to Delta North, Ogboru said he believed in power shift, adding that for all Deltans to have a sense of belonging and for governments to achieve cohesion, there was need for power to shift from one part of Delta State to the other.
For this reason, Ogboru said he had to choose a deputy, Fidelis Tilije, from Delta North, adding that he will hand over power to Delta North as long as the candidate was popular and respected by people of Delta North and Deltans in general.
At the Asagba's Palace, Ogboru said his mission was to effect positive change in Delta State and unite all Deltans through equal treatment of its indigenes. He promised to address issues of infrastructure, youth employment, health and development strategy for all the local government areas in the state.
He pledged to make Asaba a model state capital through provision of necessary infrastructure, reiterating his opposition to the huge sum of money spent on the state's airport project so far.
"I have nothing against the airport initiative. Wouldn't I like to fly down to Asaba here, as governor, instead of landing at Benin and driving down here? I like the idea.
"But what I hate and which I condemn totally is a situation where the airport is used as a conduit to siphon money that belongs to the good people of Delta State. Now they are telling us that they need another N10 million to deal with some issues of topography. That is unbelievable.
"So what they are saying is that the government did not carry out some investigation or research on the site before starting the construction? That is ridiculous and the parties to this fraud should better start confessing now and tell Deltans the truth.
"We will not encourage criminality. We will pay due attention to the airport, we will give Deltans even a better airport but it will not be at that bloated cost," he said.
Earlier in his remark, he royal father, Prof. Edozien, told Ogboru and his entourage in clear language that his vision for Delta State was commendable and hope-inspiring.
"I pray God, therefore, to help you realize the object of your visit to my palace, and I pray that you will not stumble in your quest to realize your dreams," said the monarch.
The Asagba, through one of his chiefs, read out some of the expectations of the people of Asaba for Ogboru's consideration if he eventually became the governor of Delta State.

description.hltext_display: Nyúlnak öltözve lázad az ukrán riporter
description.content: Roman Vintoniv szerint a parlament kész cirkusz. A képviselők menekültek előle, de volt, aki nyilatkozott.

description.hltext_display: 宗教局:中国天主教选领导人无需梵蒂冈"恩准"
description.content:
新华网北京12月22日电 国家宗教事务局发言人22日就梵蒂冈发表声明指责中国天主教第八次代表会议一事发表谈话。
发言人说，12月17日，梵蒂冈新闻室公开发表声明，指责前不久召开的中国天主教第八次代表会议，攻击中国宗教信仰自由政策。梵蒂冈的这一行为不仅非常冒失，而且十分无理。
中国天主教代表会议是团结全国天主教徒、民主讨论教会发展途径、共商服务社会大计的重要组织形式。50多年来，中国天主教先后召开了八次全国代表会议，为推动中国天主教健康发展，服务祖国现代化建设，都发挥了重要作用。
中国天主教爱国会、中国天主教主教团是依法登记的合法社会团体，依据《社会团体登记管理条例》规定，每5年召开代表会议，修改章程，选举产生领导机构，确定工作任务和行动目标。中国天主教代表会议制度不涉及天主教教义问题，不违背天主教基本信仰，不存在其他国家或外国组织承认与否的问题。
中国宪法规定，中国公民享有宗教信仰自由权利，同时宗教团体和宗教事务不受外国势力支配。按照这一规定，中国各宗教包括天主教坚持独立自主自办的原则。中国天主教第八次代表会议审议通过的《中国天主教爱国会章程》和《中国天主教主教团章程》规定：中国天主教会“在政治、经济和教会事务上坚持独立自主自办原则，维护国家主权和教会事务自主权，与社会主义社会相适应”，在《中国天主教主教团章程》中还规定：“在信仰及福传事业上，依据主耶稣基督对宗徒们的派遣和圣神赋予宗徒们的权力，履行牧职使命，在当信当行的教义教规上，与宗徒之长伯多禄的继承人保持共融。”但在梵蒂冈新闻室发表的声明中声称，“独立自主自办教会及民主办教原则与天主教教义是无法调和的”，这是对中国天主教现状的误解，不知是他们根本没有看到章程规定，还是故意混淆政治与信仰的界限。梵蒂冈的政治立场是尽人皆知的，试图借宗教信仰推行政治理念，这是十分危险的，将对中国天主教在中国的健康发展带来严重危害。
代表会议制度是中国天主教在探索民主办教实践中形成的，中国政府予以充分尊重。近两三年来，梵蒂冈通过各种方式阻止中国天主教代表会议的召开，对参加会议的神职人员代表以“惩罚”进行威胁。到底是谁用强制手段对待宗教信仰，是谁要求天主教徒违背自己的“良心”，难道不是十分清楚吗？这让我们想起新中国刚建立时的那一幕，梵蒂冈驻华代表发出“指令”，要求中国天主教拒绝与新生政权合作。历史是那么相似，但时代毕竟进步了，固守旧思维已经办不成什么事情了。
中国天主教第八次代表会议选举产生了中国天主教爱国会和中国天主教主教团新一届领导机构，主要负责人都是高票当选，体现了与会代表的意愿和期盼，可谓众望所归。梵蒂冈新闻室声明却对他们进行谴责，这是对中国天主教会广大神长教友民主意愿的粗暴践踏和蔑视，是极其蛮横和无礼的行径。难道中国的宗教社会团体选举领导人，还要外国组织“钦定”或者“恩准”吗？近年来，为了改善中梵关系，中方以极大诚意与梵方进行坦诚、建设性对话，寻求改善关系的途径和方式。但梵蒂冈总有一些人在关键时刻出来干扰，无休止地提出无理要求，阻挠双方改善关系的进程，此次破坏中国天主教代表会议，就是最新的典型例子。梵蒂冈还在接触商谈的同时，以公开和秘密方式干涉中国天主教内部事务，试图重新控制中国天主教会。中梵关系出现当前这种令人遗憾的局面，责任完全在梵方。
发言人说，中国政府改善中梵关系的原则是明确的，态度是真诚的。近年来，中方为改善中梵关系，在言论上一直保持克制，希望营造一个良好环境。但梵蒂冈的媒体以及有关人员，不断发表攻击性言论。我们的克制不等于可以放弃原则和底线，希望梵蒂冈谨言慎行，自我约束，不要再恶化双方关系，回到对话的正确轨道上来。

description.hltext_display: Tuvalu PM toppled after three months in power
description.content:
WELLINGTON, (AFP) - The prime minister of Tuvalu has been ousted just three months after winning power in the tiny Pacific nation, a government spokesman said Wednesday.
Outgoing prime minister Maatia Toafa lost a motion of no-confidence in the 15-seat parliament on Tuesday, the spokesman said.
"There are negotiations to select a new prime minister. We're hoping they will be complete by the end of the week," he told AFP, declining to reveal the reasons for the no-confidence vote.
"It will be up to the new government when parliament reconvenes."
Tuvalu, one of the world's smallest independent nations, with just 12,000 residents, held elections in September. The spokesman said a new poll would not be necessary in the wake of the no-confidence vote.
The former British colony does not have political parties and instead forms a government from alliances of MPs from the country's eight inhabited islands.
Toafa told Radio New Zealand International that his opponents objected to his cost cutting measures and raised allegations about a debt he had once owed to the government for machinery hire.
"(It was) very much personal, trivial matters which are unfounded," he said.

event_or_fact.property: It was)very much personal, trivial matters which are unfounded
his opponents objected to his cost cutting measures and raised allegationsabout a debt he had once owed to the government for machinery hire.

description.hltext_display: Community Health on Tenet Board - Analyst Blog
description.content:
In an attempt to press forward the take over bid, Community Health Systems Inc. (CYH) plans to nominate directors on the board of Tenet Healthcare Corporation (THC) at the 2011 annual meeting.
Tenet's board has agreed for re-election, though Community Health has not decided upon the number of directors who would join Tenet’s board.
Community Health had proposed an offer to Tenet on December 9, according to which Community Health will offer to acquire all the outstanding shares of Tenet for $6.00 per share, including $5 a share in cash and $1 per share in its common stock. The offer is also a premium of 40% over Tenet’s closing price of December 9.
Further, the deal was valued at $7.3 billion and Community Health stated that it will make an equity offer of $3.3 billion and would take about $4 billion of debt to finance the acquisition.
This was the second attempt for Community Health to bid for Tenet. Earlier on November 12, Community Health made an identical offer but Tenet’s board rejected the same as the price offered by Community Health was inadequate, owing to weak industry stock valuations; and was not in favor of Tenet’s shareholders.
Moreover, Tenet had doubts whether Community Health will be able to manage and integrate the operations of its businesses, as Tenet believes that Community Health is incapable of meeting its own 2011 guidance given slowing growth.
In addition, the hospitals of Tenet and Community Health overlap in 10 states, most notably in Texas, where Community Health has 18 hospitals and Tenet has 10. The only state where Tenet has its presence and Community Health does not is Nebraska.
But Community Health is determined to buy Tenet despite rejections, and believes in its strong management ability and skill to manage the hospitals.
It is also likely that there will be other potential buyers for Tenet and if the company is sold, the price would range around $7.25 to $8.25 per share.
If Community Health bags Tenet, it is expected to create the second largest hospital chain in the U.S., generating $22 billion in annual revenue, with 176 hospitals operating in 30 U.S. states. Moreover, the deal would bring cost savings and other benefits, and would add to earnings in the full year of 2010.
According to analysts, there have been 315 acquisitions in the U.S. hospital industry in the past five years with an average purchase price of $589 million and an average premium of 8%.
One of the reasons for such acquisitions is that hospital operators are frantically trying to contain costs and bad debts, as their operations have been badly hit by high unemployment levels and a weak economy. In addition, speculation over the delays in healthcare reform and its impact has triggered the acquisition growth in the sector.

description.hltext_display: İnegöl'de Otomobil Yayaya Çarptı
description.content: Bursa'nın İnegöl ilçesinde, geri manevra yapan otomobilin çarptığı kadın, ağır yaralandı. Alınan bilgiye göre, Mesudiye Mahallesi İnegöl Caddesi'nde Hüseyin Emek'in kullandığı 16 F 3030 plakalı otomobil, geri manevra yaparken Fatma Acar'a (36) çarptı. Kazada ağır yaralanan Fatma Acar, İnegöl Devlet Hastanesine kaldırıldı. Beyin kanaması geçirdiği belirlenen Acar, burada yapılan müdahalenin ardından Özel Medical Park Hastanesine sevk edildi. description.hltext_display: Shark regulations defied
description.author: Staff Reporter
description.content: The controversial practice of shark baiting in the Western Cape is back in the headlines after a number of new videos recently appeared on YouTube.Although luring sharks towards tour boats with baited rope is legal in South Africa, officials say there are certain regulations governing the practice.Local tour operators, who sell the great white shark cage diving "experience", are pictured on the videos breaking regulations by allowing the sharks to grab the baited rope and thrash against tourist-filled cages. According to the law, bait handlers must either snatch the bait away from the shark before it bites or release the rope if the shark manages to grab ahold of the bait. This, according to experts, prevents the shark from injuring itself by thrashing against the side of the boat. "We don't condone this, but it does happen," Environmental Affairs scientist Mike Meyer told the Cape Times. "The rule is that the operator must release the line immediately so the animal is not pulled into the cage and it can swim away," Meyer added.A member of the Great White Shark Protection Foundation, Mariette Hopley, criticised the current regulations, saying that the rules "leave room for error"."We want to keep (the sharks) wild. We don't want to condition sharks," she told the Cape Times.

description.hltext_display: Stieg Larsson oli myydyin kirjailija Euroopassa vuonna 2010
description.content:
Stieg Larsson kohosi vuoden myydyimpien kirjalistojen kärkeen Euroopassa, kertoo Svenska Dagbladet. Thebookseller.com -sivuston tekemän mittauksen mukaan Larsson ohitti tänä vuonna Dan Brownin, joka piti johtopaikkaa viime vuonna.
Larssonin Millenium-trilogia myi hyvin. Myyntilistoja on tutkittu erityisesti Britanniassa, Ranskassa, Saksassa, Alankomaissa, Espanjassa ja Ruotsissa. Muualla verkossa:
