description.hltext_display: 嘉盛集团12月22日亚洲时段外汇市场名家点评
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
嘉盛集团：临近年末，市场窄幅波动
市场仍处于有克制的模式中，原因是本周因假期缩短加上年末环境，令许多交易商持币观望。我们确实目睹一些经济数据，首先登场的有意思的数据是香港综合消费物价指数：年率上升2.9%，符合预期。另外，日本商品贸易帐为盈余1628亿日元，远低于盈余4817亿日元的预期值。尽管该数据不及预期，美元/日元仍守住83.85/75的窄幅波动区间。我们好奇地想知道，该货币对最近地修正性反弹势头能否延续到新的一年，因为近期情绪看似已从逢高沽出转为逢低买进。只要守住中期趋势线支撑(目前在83.20)，我们就愿意继续保持逢低买进的立场。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 亚洲时段主要货币对中波动最大的是欧元/美元 ? 成功守住昨天1.3070区域低点，虽然收盘价就在200天均线上。当无法出现有效的下破，脆弱的空头在相当清淡的市况中迅疾回补头寸，从而推高该货币对70点。主权债务忧虑可能将继续打压欧元，我们也仍预测，逢高沽出将是年终前的主流。我们预计第一阻力来自100小时均线，目前在1.3170。
年终前成交量可能将继续减少，从而导致市场窄幅波动，但正因流动性奇缺，某一意外事件可导致过度波动。
1

description.hltext_display: 百度携傲游开拓移动互联网 用户获方案
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } .h1 } .h2 } .h3 } .union } .union TD } 移动互联网的迅速崛起，吸引了各个行业巨头的强烈关注。继12月初百度移动开放平台官网(http://open.shouji.baidu.com)正式上线以来，近日又传出新消息，傲游浏览器于12月14日在京举行新闻发布会，宣布“我无所不在的移动生活――暨傲游手机浏览器全球同步发布”。与此同时，百度与傲游也正式在移动领域达成合作协议。百度移动开放平台将为傲游手机浏览器提供全面的移动转码解决方案，通过双方技术优势上的整合，为用户提供完美的移动浏览解决方案。
据悉，此次合作的具体方式是，百度为傲游手机浏览器提供移动转码服务（简称为TC服务），网络数据通过中转后，会更加符合手机显示模式，并且在流量和速度方面均有大幅优化，从而为用户提供便捷的移动互联网浏览服务。此次合作突破了传统的技术和商业合作模式，为未来移动互联网领域的类似合作提供了一次成功案例。在整个行业倍加重视开放、合作理念的今天，此次合作无疑具有极强的示范意义。
傲游手机浏览器相关负责人表示，百度是中国互联网行业的佼佼者，其搜索工具是国内网民最喜欢使用的网络工具之一。而傲游浏览器则是国内浏览器行业的技术领航者，具有接近十年的浏览器研发经验，是最了解用户使用习惯，功能最全的浏览器，在全世界范围内拥有几千万的活跃用户。在移动互联网领域，傲游手机浏览器同样保持着领先的技术优势和巨大的发展潜力。相信通过和百度的合作，双方在技术优势上进行深度整合，一定能够为用户提供更加完美的移动浏览解决方案。
百度移动开放平台相关负责人表示，移动互联网搜索是百度在未来的一个主流应用，百度将继续关注移动搜索业务，持续加大在移动开放平台的布局和投入。当前提供的移动开放服务仅仅是一个开始，下一步百度还将继续向合作伙伴提供页面修订、数据统计、移动中转适配、无线框计算、掌百开放、移动行为分析、手机地图LBS等诸多服务。百度希望和更多与傲游一样的优秀行业伙伴进行深度合作，构建良性的移动互联网产业链和生态圈，共同推动行业的健康发展。
近年来，随着3G的蓬勃发展，国内移动互联网的发展也成燎原之势。易观国际最新统计数据显示，到2010年底，中国移动互联网市场用户规模将达到3亿，全年市场收入规模将达633亿元。前景的看好，也吸引了众多互联网企业的加入。百度移动开放平台官网正式上线以来，已经有大量站点逐步采用百度的转码服务作为其移动网站的支持，实现自身PC站点的移动化。此次，百度与傲游浏览器的合作，为广大站点打通了一条通往用户的新捷径，同时对整个移动互联网领域，也产生了深远的影响力。
业内观察家指出，开放、合作、共赢已经是互联网的大趋势。通过网站转码、移动建站、框计算、掌百开放服务、移动行为分析平台以及手机地图LBS服务等形式，百度正在复制其在PC互联网的优势，占据移动领域竞争的战略制高点。傲游手机浏览器加入百度移动开放平台可谓“强强联合”，随着浏览器和移动互联网的重要性日益提高，此举必将对行业现状和未来技术走向造成巨大影响。
（责任编辑：张元缘）

description.hltext_display: Александр Тихонов: «Неплохо было бы выгнать Слепцову и Чудова из сборной»»
El 85% del empleo doméstico es informal
description.content:
El 85% del personal doméstico que se desempeña en casas particulares se encuentra trabajando en la informalidad, según indica un informe elaborado por el Centro de Estudios Mujeres y Trabajo de la Argentina (CEMyT). El documento, titulado Trabajo en casas particulares: hacia el reconocimiento de los derechos laborales, indica que el servicio doméstico es una ocupación donde, prácticamente, la totalidad de quienes desarrollan esta actividad son mujeres, generalmente provenientes de familias pobres, mujeres migrantes, mujeres indígenas y afrodescendientes.
Durante el acto de presentación, Marita Perceval, actual subsecretaria de Promoción de los Derechos Humanos, destacó la necesidad de sancionar una nueva ley para el sector: “Hay más de 1,2 millón de mujeres con un altísimo porcentaje de jefas de hogar que no tienen derecho a vacaciones pagas, al aguinaldo, a enfermarse, a tener un hijo porque no pueden pedir licencias. Es decir, no tienen derechos”, indicó.
El gobierno presentó un proyecto de ley que ya tienen dictamen para ser tratado en Diputados. El objetivo es regular la actividad, que hoy se rige con una ley del año 1956. <

description.hltext_display: Breite Zustimmung für Entwurf
description.content:
EDEWECHT, 22. Dezember 2010
Haushalt Rat sieht keine Alternative zur Erhöhung der Steuerhebesätze für 2011
Kämmerer Rolf Torkel bezeichnete die Mehrbelastungen als „moderat“. Einsparungen könnten so vermieden werden.
Edewecht - Breite Zustimmung fand der von Kämmerer Rolf Torkel vorgestellte Haushaltsentwurf für das Jahr 2011 bei der Sitzung des Edewechter Gemeinderates am Montagabend. Und das, obwohl Torkel vorweg schicken musste: „Uns sollte allen klar sein, dass der Ergebnishaushalt ein Sparhaushalt ist.“
Da es aber kaum Spielraum für Einschnitte bei den Ausgaben geben würde, führe laut Aussage des Gemeindekämmerers kein Weg an einer Erhöhung der Steuerhebesätze (siehe Infokasten) vorbei. „Dieser Schritt ist einfach unvermeidbar“, betonte Torkel, der zugleich die Frage in den Raum warf: „Wo sollen wir sonst sparen, ohne die Strukturen in unserer Gemeinde dauerhaft zu gefährden?“
Torkel erinnerte in diesem Zusammenhang auch an die unbedingt notwendigen Sanierungsmaßnahmen mit einem Gesamtvolumen von rund 573 000 Euro. Außerdem gab er zu bedenken, dass mit der Ganztagsschule und der Einrichtung von Krippenplätzen neue gesetzliche Pflichtaufgaben auf die Gemeinde zukommen würden. So müssten allein für die Kinderkrippe in Friedrichsfehn rund 70 000 Euro im Haushalt veranschlagt werden. Immerhin: Nach aktuellem Planungsstand sieht der Entwurf des Haushaltsplanes im Ergebnishaushalt einen – wenn auch sehr geringen – Überschuss von 2100 Euro vor.
Die Erhöhung der Hebesätze, durch die der Haushalt überhaupt erst ausgeglichen werden kann, bezeichnete Torkel als „moderat“. So bedeute etwa eine Anhebung der Grundsteuer B auf 300 Prozent für ein durchschnittliches Einfamiliengrundstück knapp 20 Euro mehr im Jahr, wie er vorrechnete.
Seine Argumente sollten die Ratsmitglieder überzeugen. Im Namen der CDU dankte Wolfgang Seeger dem Kämmerer für seine Arbeit. Stellvertretend für die SPD-Ratsfraktion erklärte Dr. Hans Fittje: „Hier wird verantwortungsvoll mit dem Geld der Bürger umgegangen. Zur Steuererhöhung sehen auch wir momentan keine Alternative.“
Rolf Kaptein (FDP) sagte: „Eine Erhöhung kommt die Bürger günstiger zu stehen als spätere Einschnitte.“ Thomas Apitzsch von der UWG lobte, dass keine neuen Schulden gemacht werden müssten. Und Uwe Heiderich-Willmer (Gründe) erklärte: „Eigentlich war ich im vergangenen Jahr schon für Steuererhöhungen, dann habe ich nun damit natürlich auch kein Problem.“ Als einziges Ratsmitglied stimmte Rüdiger Gleba (CDU) nicht für den Haushalt. Er enthielt sich.
Die Steuerhebesätze werden auf 300 Prozent bei der Grundsteuer A, auf 300 Prozent bei der Grundsteuer B und auf 320 Prozent bei der Gewerbesteuer erhöht. Die Sätze liegen damit um jeweils 20 Prozentpunkte höher als noch im Vorjahr.
Ohne die Erhöhung der Sätze würden im Gemeindehaushalt etwa 430 000 Euro fehlen, wie Kämmerer Rolf Torkel darlegte.

description.hltext_display: 지경부, 독거노인 2만6000명에게 내복 전달
description.content: [최경환 장관 "� � 국민의 내복입기 생활화 나서야"]지식경� �부가 연말을 맞아 독거노인 2만6000명에게 `사랑의 내복`을 � �달한다.최경환 지경부 장관은 22일 서울중앙우체국에서 지역난방공사, 에너지관리공단 등 에너지 공기업 기관장들과 `사랑의 내복` � 페인 발대식을 열� , � �국의 불우 독거노인 2만6000명에게 내복을 직� � � �달하기로 했다.내복은 지경부, 우� �사업본부 및 산하 공공기관의 � � 임직원들이 총 3억2400만원의 성금을 모금해 마� �했다. 지경부는 우체국 집배원 등 � �국 네트워크를 활용해 노인들에게 내복을 � �달� 계획이다.최 장관은 이� 발대식에서 "내복을 입으면 약 3도 가량 체온이 올라가 20% 가량의 연료비를 줄일 수 있는 효과가 있다"며 "� � 국민의 내복입기 생활화에 나서야 한다"� 밝혔다.최 장관은 발대식 이후 인근 독거노인 가구와 노인복지시설을 방문, 쌀과 내복을 � �달했다.▲지식경� �부 최경환 장관(왼쪽에서 두 번째)이 집배원들과 함께 22일 서울 중앙우체국 앞 광장에서 독거노인을 위한 사랑의 내복 3천벌을 우편 차량에 싣� 있다. 이� 행사는 지식경� �부와 우� �사업본부, 지식경� �부 산하 기관들이 준비한 것으로 � �국� �으로 2만 6천벌의 내복이 집배원을 통해 � �국 독거노인들에게 � �달된다.[임동욱기자 dwlim@]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: Τιθορέα: Στον εισαγγελέα ο Δήμαρχος για τον βράχο που ισοπέδωσε σπίτια
description.content: Οι κάτοικοι της περιοχής φοβούνται να κοιμηθούν στα σπίτια τους καθώς ο εφιάλτης ξυπνά και πάλι μετά από 11 χρόνια.

description.hltext_display: Más empresas acceden al crédito internacional
description.content:
Las empresas nacionales volvieron a ser bien consideradas en los mercados internacionales de crédito. Prueba de ello es la reciente colocación de un bono por U$S 300 millones por parte de Aeropuertos Argentina 2000, principal operador aeroportuario del país, cuyo fin es financiar las obras de operación, mantenimiento y construcción en Ezeiza y Aeroparque. “El canje de deuda y la posterior gestión con el Club de París generó un mejor ambiente para la operación”, explicó ayer Raúl Francos, director de Administración y Finanzas de la compañía que preside Ernesto Gutiérrez. Tras una intensa búsqueda de inversores –gestionada por Crédit Suisse y Morgan Stanley– en Londres, Singapur, Ginebra, Hong Kong, Nueva York, Boston y Buenos Aires, AA 2000 emitió con éxito el bono a diez años con una tasa del 10,75% anual.
“Los inversores saben todo respecto a la política y la economía argentina, y reconocen que hay un fuerte crecimiento con un alto potencial para seguir avanzando”, contó Gustavo Lupetti, director de Legales de AA 2000, y agregó que, “en Singapur, se asombran de cómo salió la Argentina de la crisis de 2001”. Las primeras gestiones para la operación se realizaron en mayo, con el mundo inmerso en un enigma económico. Además, el efecto Irlanda demoró diez días la salida de la oferta. Con el capital se refuerza el plan de inversiones por U$S 1000 millones hasta el año 2028, cuando vence el contrato de concesión.
Las obras de la nueva terminal de Ezeiza se llevan U$S 250 millones.Gutiérrez explicó que “este caso podría ser un ejemplo a copiar por otras empresas nacionales”. En octubre pasado, la alimenticia Arcor colocó un bono por U$S 200 millones a siete años con una tasa del 7,25%. YPF ya anotó en la CNV su prospecto para un bono por U$S 300 millones, ampliable a 600 millones. <

description.hltext_display: 火箭或得低位震慑力球员 将与太阳竞争进季后赛
description.content:
北京时间12月22日凌晨，《休斯顿纪事报》专栏作家理查德－贾斯提斯发表一篇文章，对火箭队的近况进行了简评：
在最近一段时间的比赛里，火箭队很好地向外界证明了一点，那就是这支球队并没有垮掉，他们已经以正确的方式登上航船，自从赛季之初5胜12负之后，最近他们已经是11战取得8胜3负的战绩，现在的他们正在逐步回到季后赛球队的竞争球队行列当中，目前火箭队的战绩为13胜15负，距离西部排名第八的开拓者队（15胜14负）已经越来越近。
火箭队在两个客场接连取得胜利之后，他们在1月29日晚回到主场迎战强大的热火队之前还有一场客场比赛对阵胜率低于五成的球队。火箭队在1月份的赛程会比较艰难，也许有可能到最后会是由火箭队与太阳队争夺最后一个西部联盟的季后赛名额。
火箭队在12月份的比赛当中除了赛程相对比较轻松之外，他们还碰到的一个有利因素是他们的好多对手都出现了伤病情况而有重要球员缺席比赛，这使得他们的比赛更加好打一些。不过，火箭队自己的阵容深度也在很大程度上帮助了他们自己，现在的火箭队经常在比赛当中使用两套完全不一样的阵容迎战对手，火箭队经常在比赛当中采取先发五人在一起配合，然后换上五个完全不一样的人员打第二阵容，与对手展开周旋。
火箭主帅阿德尔曼在调教年轻球员方面确实有一套，他此前一直把这项工作排在比较重要的位置，正是这一做法让火箭队受益，他们正在进入一个全新的时代，乔丹－希尔最近一段时间里的迅速成长进步就是一个典型例子。
火箭总经理达利尔－莫雷希望在未来几周时间里获得一名能够在低位有一定威慑力的球员，这一点是值得大家关注的。另外，再看看阿德尔曼如何在洛瑞和布鲁克斯之间分配角色和出场时间也会是很有意思的一个看点，还有一点值得我们关注的是，阿德尔曼如何在现有阵容的轮换当中挤出时间让特伦斯－威廉姆斯获得出场表现的机会。
不管怎么说，火箭队最近打得不错总归是令人高兴的，虽然火箭队现在在比赛当中也有出现断电的现象，但是这种断电现象持续的时间已经不像赛季之初那么长了，而且在暂时断电之后，火箭队经常会很快醒悟过来，火箭队的球迷们现在可以不用像赛季之初那样提心吊胆地看比赛了。

description.hltext_display: Großes Werk mit kleinen Karten
description.content:
OFEN, 22. Dezember 2010
Engagement Grundschüler aus Ofen spenden 400 Euro für NWZ -Weihnachtsaktion
Im Unterricht gemalte Bilder wurden abfotografiert. Als Grußkarten wurden sie dann vom Schülerrat verkauft.
Ofen - Die Grundschule Ofen hat fleißige, kreative und hilfsbereite Kinder: Denn beim Verkauf von selbst gestalteten Weihnachtskarten sind knapp 400 Euro für die NWZ -Weihnachtsaktion „Neue Kraft für schwache Kinder“ zusammengekommen.
Besonders aktiv war der Schülerrat der Grundschule Ofen. Denn Bilder, die von den Kindern der Schule im Unterricht hergestellt worden waren, wurden abfotografiert und diese Miniaturen dann auf Karten geklebt. Diese neuen Kunstwerke wurden schließlich als Postkarten samt Umschlag verkauft. „Die Kinder waren mächtig stolz, ihre selbst gemalten Bilder im Kleinformat zu entdecken“, sagt Lehrerin Ute Becker.
Insgesamt 480 Karten verkauften die Kinder des Schülerrats in den Pausen und auf vorweihnachtlichen Veranstaltungen. Sie seien sehr stolz, dass sie einen Reinerlös in Höhe von 397 Euro€ für die NWZ -Weihnachtsaktion erzielt haben, so Becker. Und: „Außerdem hat ihnen der Verkauf auch noch richtig Spaß gemacht.“

description.hltext_display: 需要教育启动项目全国落地样板城市布局(组图)
description.content:
.h1 } .h2 } .h3 } DIV.union } DIV.union TD } 积极相应党和国家“引进优质教育资源。吸引境外知名学校、教育和科研机构以及企业，合作设立教育教学、实训、研究机构或项目”。致力于打造中国素质教育“沃尔玛”的需要教育，继今年9月在安徽马鞍山与该市教育局合作探索如何贯彻中央“鼓励各地积极探索，勇于创新，创造性地实施《教育规划纲要》”取得成功后，经过两个多月的精心组织，充分准备，拉开了周密部署需要教育项目落地全国的帷幕。日前，记者从需要教育在北京举办的“需要教育项目样板城市洽谈会”上获悉，为能将需要教育整合的境外优质教育资源带来的素质教育项目更好地推向全国，需要教育确立了精心组织、稳妥推进、分阶段、分步骤组织实施的策略，首先在全国挑选10个城市落地，为下一阶段各地落地运营树立示范样板。 12月21日在北京召开的“需要教育项目样板城市洽谈会”在报名申请加盟的100多个投资机构和项目投资者中，邀请了拟在北京、上海、天津、重庆、广州、长春、哈尔滨、呼和浩特、西安、合肥等城市推广需要教育项目的投资合作者参加此次洽谈会。 会议由需要教育项目办公室主任孙天群主持，他首先带领与参会者重点重温了《国家中长期教育改革和发展规划纲要》(2010-2020年)(以下简称《纲要》)中指出的：“我国教育还不完全适应国家经济社会发展和人民群众接受良好教育的要求。教育观念相对落后，内容方法比较陈旧，中小学生课业负担过重，素质教育推进困难；学生适应社会和就业创业能力不强，创新型、实用型、复合型人才紧缺；深化教育改革成为全社会共同心声”的内容。重点领会了《纲要》提出的要“鼓励公平竞争，引导社会资金以多种方式进入教育领域”。要“促进社会力量以独立举办、共同举办等多种形式兴办教育”。“积极发挥行业协会、专业学会、基金会等各类社会组织在教育公共治理中的作用”以及要“加强国际交流与合作。坚持以开放促改革、促发展。开展多层次、宽领域的教育交流与合作，提高我国教育国际化水平。借鉴国际上先进的教育理念和教育经验，促进我国教育改革发展，提升我国教育的国际地位、影响力和竞争力”。“引进优质教育资源。吸引境外知名学校、教育和科研机构以及企业，合作设立教育教学、实训、研究机构或项目。鼓励各级各类学校开展多种形式的国际交流与合作，办好若干所示范性中外合作学校和一批中外合作办学项目。探索多种方式利用国外优质教育资源”的举措。让与会者更加深刻地意识到“国运兴衰，系于教育；教育振兴，全民有责”的紧迫感和投资教育，参与教改的社会价值和人生价值。 会上，来自台湾的需要教育项目总监们各自还生动地向与会者介绍了幼儿教育、儿童教育、青少年教育、职能教育、总裁教育等在发达国家和地区风行，已融入大量中国元素的素质教育项目和国内尚属空白的素质教育课程。记者注意到，其中展示的曾在国内短期试点开课的青少年教育项目及课程的教学效果，以及参加过试点课程学生发生的巨大变化，还让有的参会者落泪动容。会议期间，记者还听到一位参会者在电话中激动地对与他通话的人说：“这个项目我投定了！”
（责任编辑：张元缘）

description.hltext_display: Japan 7.4 seabed quake sparks tsunami scare
description.content:
TOKYO, (AFP) - Scores of villagers on a remote Japanese island chain in the Pacific scrambled for higher ground early Wednesday after a major 7.4-magnitude offshore quake sparked a tsunami alert.
The seabed tremor struck at 2:19 am local time (1719 GMT Tuesday), jolting people out of bed as loudspeakers blared across the Ogasawara islands and authorities warned of the risk of a two-metre (six-foot) high local tsunami.
The tsunami alert was later downgraded and all warnings were lifted five hours after the quake hit near the islands, some 1,000 kilometres (600 miles) south of Tokyo. No injuries or damage were reported.
But about 120 people temporarily evacuated to higher ground on Chichi-shima island and some 50 people on Haha-shima island, Koji Watanabe, a village official on Chichi-shima, said overnight.
"It was the biggest earthquake I have ever felt," said Masae Nagai, a hotel owner on Chichi-shima, part of the remote archipelago also called the Bonin islands, which has a population of about 2,300.
"We were awakened by the quake. It was scary," she told AFP by telephone around sunrise, but she added that the walls of her hotel were not cracked and that "things have returned to normal".
Local authorities on the Ogasawara islands, near Iwo Jima, said they had set up five shelters for residents but had closed them before sunrise in the absence of damage reports.
"The jolts were relatively stronger than those we have felt in the past," Kenichi Mochida, another Chichi-shima official, told AFP. "But there was no panic as people acted in an orderly manner."
Yoshihiro Ikeda, vice principal of the Ogasawara Elementary School with 123 pupils in Chichi-shima, said: "We were worried about our students as the jolt was quite strong and lasted very long.
"But we were relieved to confirm that none of our students were injured and no facilities were damaged. I guess we were quite lucky, considering the size of the quake."
The quake hit at a shallow depth of 14 kilometres, 153 kilometres (95 miles) east of Chichi-shima, and was followed by a series of aftershocks measuring between 5.3 and 5.6 which continued into the morning.
About three hours after the quake, a 60 centimetre (two feet) wave was monitored 700 kilometres away at Hachijo-jima, part of the Izu island chain that runs south of Tokyo, the meteorological agency said.
Waves of up to 20 centimetres also reached the southwestern Japanese main islands, the agency said.
The Ogasawara chain, made up of more than 30 subtropical and tropical islets some 240 kilometres north of Iwo Jima, were put under the control of the United States after World War II, and returned to Japan in 1968.
The remote islands have preserved their unique biological habitats and have been dubbed the "Galapagos of the Orient".
The Hawaii-based Pacific Tsunami Warning Center said after sounding the initial alert there was no threat of a destructive widespread tsunami and no nearby islands were thought to be in the tsunami danger zone.
But it warned in a bulletin shortly after the quake: "Earthquakes of this size sometimes generate local tsunamis that can be destructive along coasts located within 100 kilometres of the earthquake epicentre."
When a massive 8.8-magnitude quake, one of the most powerful on record, struck off Chile's coast in February, Japan issued its top tsunami alert and ordered more than half a million people to evacuate seaside areas.
Authorities later apologised after a wave of 120 centimetres hit and caused no injuries.
Around 20 percent of the world's most powerful earthquakes strike Japan, which sits on the "Ring of Fire" surrounding the Pacific Ocean.
In 1995 a magnitude-7.2 quake in the port city of Kobe killed 6,400 people. But high building standards, regular drills and a sophisticated tsunami warning system mean that casualties are often minimal.

description.hltext_display: 《寄生前夜3》阿雅性感淋浴视频曝光
description.content:
SQUARE ENIX制作，预定12月22日推出的PSP动作角色扮演游戏《寄生前夜：第3个生日》是1998年3月推出的《寄生前夜(Parasite Eve)》系列最新作，以2012年的纽约为背景，叙述具备特异功能的女主角阿雅·布雷亚(Aya Brea)为了对抗神秘噬人生物“扭曲者(Twister)”所展开的壮烈战斗。
随着《寄生前夜：第3个生日》的偷跑发售，近日也有提前拿到游戏的玩家从游戏中提取了一段女主角阿雅淋浴的游戏视频上传至网络供大家解馋。游戏采用即时操控的第三人称枪战动作玩法，玩家所扮演的CTI干练女特务阿雅，将通过只有自己有办法使用的“跨时潜行(Overdive)”系统，让自己的精神在遍布战场的士兵之间转移，通过灵巧的迴避行动与强大的火力攻击，来完成歼灭扭曲者的任务。
游戏中替阿雅准备了各式各样的造型可以更换，包括招牌的小可爱牛仔裤劲装，剽悍的《最终幻想XIII》雷霆战斗装，充满成熟韵味的OL套装，俏丽可爱的女仆装等。战斗中服装会因为遭受伤害而逐渐破损，衣服破损防御力也会降低，必须特别留意。
身批染血白纱的阿雅
PSP《寄生前夜：第3个生日》12月22日推出。(本文来源：网易游戏频道 ) 生化奇兵上榜 | 质量效应系列 | 上古卷轴3：晨风 | 杀出重围
2010年 陈冠希 | 2008年 杨千嬅 | 2005年 古巨基 | 2003年 陈慧琳

description.hltext_display: 中 어선 침몰사고, 한·중 외교문제 비화
description.content: 서해에서 발생한 중국 어� 침몰 사� 가 한국과 중국의 외교 갈등으로 비화� 조짐을 보이� 있다. 최근 대북 조치를 놓� 불편한 관계에 놓인 한중 양국이 또다시 대형 외교 악재를 만났다는 지� �이다. 지난 18일 � �북 군산시 옥도면 어청도 북서방 72마일 해상에서 중국 어� 요영호(63t급)가 우리 해경 경비함(3000t급)과 충돌하는 사� 가 발생, 중국 � 원 1명이 사망하� 1명이 실종됐다. 이 과� �에서 우리 경찰관 4명도 중국 � 원이 휘두른 둔기에 맞아 팔 골� �상 등 부상을 입었다. 사건 발생 직후 한국과 중국은 서울에서 사건 수습을 위한 당국간 교섭을 벌였지만 책임 소재를 놓� 양 측의 이견이 좁혀지지 않았다. 이에 중국은 지난 21일 장위 외교부 대변인의 � �례브리핑을 통해 한국을 공격하면서 배상과 책임자 처벌, 재발방지를 요구하� 나섰다. 장 대변인은 "한국은 � �� �을 다해 실종 � 원 구조에 나서� 사� 책임자를 엄중히 처벌해야 한다"면서 "한국이 중국 � 원들의 인명 및 재산 피해를 배상하는 것은 물� 앞으로 � 사한 사건의 재발을 근� �해야 한다"� 밝혔다. 그러나 이같은 발언에 대해 한국 � �부는 불편함 심기를 감추지 않� 있다. 중국 어� 이 불법 조업을 단속하던 해경 경비함을 들이받았다는 한국 해경의 조사 결과와 � �면 배치된다는 것. � �부 당국자는 "(해경의 조사 결과를 뒷받침� )증거가 다 있다"며 "중국 � �부와 합동조사를 진행� 용의가 있다"� 밝혔다. 문� �는 한국과 중국이 공동으로 관리하도록 하는 수역을 뜻하는 `� � �조치수역`에서의 단속권과 범위를 양국의 견해가 다르다는 � �이다. 외교부의 따르면 해경은 한국 측 배타� �경� �수역(EEZ) 내 15해리 안에서 불법조업을 하는 것으로 의심되던 15척 가량의 중국 � 단에 � �� 명� �을 내� �지만 중국 어� 들은 이를 무시하� `� � �조치수역`으로 도주했다. 이후 해경이 `� � �조치수역`에서 한 중국 어� 에 승� 해 조사를 하� �� 하는 과� �에서 옆에 있던 요영호가 경비함의 측면을 들이받� � �복됐다. 중국 측은 한중 어업협� �에 따라 양국 어� 은 모두 � � �조치수역에 들어갈 수 있� 양국은 자국 어� 에 대한 법 집행만을 � 수 있도록 돼 있다는 주장이다. 반면 한국 � �부는 � �� 명� �을 어기� 도주한 중국 어� 을 `� � �조치수역`까지 추� �한 것은 국� �법상 � �당한 권리라� 밝혔다. 아울러 � 박 � �복사� 는 해경의 물리� � 때문이 아니라 해당 중국 어� 이 경비함을 들이받는 과� �에서 일어났음을 강조하� 있다. � �부는 이번 사� 가 자칫 외교� � 마찰로 이어질 것을 우� �하면서 추가로 확대되는 것을 우� �하� 있다. 외교부 당국자는 "이 문� �가 외교문� �로 비화되는 것은 한국과 중국 양국에 바람직하지 않다"며 "한중간 협� �사업이 와해되는 것을 원하지 않는다"� 말했다. 한편 � �치권에서도 중국 어� � �복사� 가 이슈로 � 올랐다. 이회창 자� � 진당 대표는 22일 최� 위원회의에서 "매 맞는 해경은 국가의 수치"라며 "해상에서의 불법 폭� �에 대해� 무기를 사용해서라도 � �압해야 한다"� 주장했다. 김충환 한나라당 의원도 � �� 외교통상통일위원회 � �체회의에서 "중국 � �부가 � 압� �인 자세로 나오니까 중국 어� 들까지 경찰관들 폭행하� 과격한 행동을 한 것"이라며 "강� �한 입장을 중국 � �부에 표시해야 한다"� 촉구했다.[양영권기자 indepen@]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: Tips for surviving holiday travel
description.content:
Denver International Airport officials expect 1.11 million passengers will use the airport for the week that ends Monday, making it the busiest Christmas week in DIA's 15-year history.
The week's passenger volume is expected to be 6 percent higher than the comparable period a year ago.
Officials expect passenger totals to hit about 170,000 today and again Thursday.
DIA spokesman Jeff Green noted that the airport is forecasting a surprisingly high volume of 144,038 passengers on Christmas Day.
Of record-breaking travel for the week, he said, "I think this is the result of really good airfare deals the last few months and a gain in consumer confidence."
Parking
DIA has about 40,000 parking spaces of its own, and private parking operators have thousands more spaces at lots near the airport.
Green said DIA expects its economy lots near the terminal and the Pikes Peak satellite parking lot along Pea Boulevard will fill up during the holiday travel period. When that happens, travelers will be steered to the airport's Mount Elbert satellite lot, he said. Mount Elbert typically handles overflow demand.
Travelers can get information on DIA parking at flydenver.com or by calling 303-DIA-PARK (303-342-7275).
For people picking up passengers at the airport, DIA suggests motorists consider parking in the garages next to the terminal for $2 an hour. Those garages usually have plenty of spaces at holiday time.
Green said too many motorists are illegally parking along the roadway near the terminal as they wait to communicate with arriving passengers by cellphone.
Police will be patrolling the approaches to the airport and writing tickets for parking violations such as stopping on the shoulder, he said. "We would advise just taking advantage of the $2-an-hour parking in the garage versus risking a $25 ticket."
Air travel tips
(Denver Post file photo)
Airlines ask passengers to check their websites or call the toll-free numbers to confirm flight status. Officials advise travelers to get to the airport early enough to deal with the expected heavy traffic of passengers.
And remember, don't bring wrapped presents through security checkpoints as carry-on items. Screeners may require you to unwrap them as part of the security process. Check the Transportation Security Administration website at www.tsa.gov to see lists of food items that cannot come through the checkpoints because they fall into the category of being liquids or gels.
Security screening
To get information on how long it is taking to get through security screening, travelers can check flydenver.com or call 303-DIA-TIPS (303-342-8477).
"TSA is fully staffed and prepared for this busy holiday season," said agency spokeswoman Carrie Harmon. "We are committed to maintaining the flow of passenger traffic while properly screening travelers. We also ask the public to remain vigilant and report any suspicious activity to law enforcement authorities."
AAA Colorado forecast
AAA predicts a 2.4 percent increase in holiday travel for its Mountain region this year, and the organization notes that nationally, more than nine out of 10 of those people on the move will drive to their holiday destinations.
To get the latest on Colorado driving conditions, check the state Department of Transportation travel website, cotrip.org.

description.hltext_display: PKP: W całym kraju jeździmy normalnie
description.content: - Tam o godzinie pierwszej w nocy pociąg wjechał w sieć, która została zniszczona przez złodziei. Naprawa w tym miejscu jeszcze trwa. Pociągi jeżdżą jednym torem - mówi Łańcucki.POSŁUCHAJ KRZYSZTOFA ŁAŃCUCKIEGO: // var mp3_swf = } UFO.create(mp3_swf,"mp3player126281") // - Do awarii doszło też w nocy na Śląsku - dodaje Łańcucki. - Tam doszło do wycieku ropy z cysterny. Uruchomiliśmy skład zastępczy dla pasażerów, a ropa została przepompowana z przeciekającej cysterny. Można już tamtędy jeździć bezpiecznie - mówi rzecznik.POSŁUCHAJ KRZYSZTOFA ŁAŃCUCKIEGO: // var mp3_swf = } UFO.create(mp3_swf,"mp3player77196") // Na trasie Warszawa-Łódź przywrócono ruch pociągów po obu torach. Wieczorem jeden z pociągów w okolicy stacji Gałkówek uszkodził sieć trakcyjną i połamał pantograf. Pociągi, kursujące na tej trasie, mają kilkunastominutowe opóźnienia.

description.hltext_display: [快讯]基金开户数创逾两月新低新基金发行量锐减
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
全景网12月22日讯 尽管中国股市上周止跌反弹，但新基金发行量锐减仍令基金市场人气连续第三周下降。中登公司最新公布的数据显示，上周新增基金开户数环比小幅下降，再创两个多月来新低。
数据显示，上周基金开户数为6.05万户，较前一周下降3.25%，为2010年10月11日当周以来新低。其中新增封闭式基金开户数1303户；TA系统配号产生的基金开户数为5.92万户。截止12月17日，基金帐户总数为3393.59万户。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ A股市场上周显著反弹，基金净值全线回暖。中金公司统计数据显示，上周248只股票型基金周净值有241只上涨，平均上涨2.58%；150只混合型基金周净值有147只上涨，平均上涨2.35%；85只指数型基金周净值有82只上涨，平均上涨1.7%；56只封基有54只基金净值上涨，平均上涨1.63%。
新基金发行量在上周迎来低谷期。截止上周末，仅有3只基金处于募集阶段，其中股票型基金2只，QDII基金1只；上周也仅有2只新基金成立，指数型基金和QDII基金各1只，本周新基金发行6只，其中指数型基金和股票型基金各2只，保本型基金以及QDII基金各1只。
上周A股市场结束连续五周以来的跌势，上证指数全周上涨1.85%，重新收复备受关注的年线支撑。因中国央行此前宣布上调存款准备金率而不是加息，加上中央经济工作会议确定明年宏观经济政策的基本取向要积极稳健，大大舒缓了市场对于政策收紧的担忧。（全景网/雷鸣）

description.hltext_display: Raptor´s e Increíbles, a la final
description.content:
LOS RAPTOR´S ahora van por el título. Fotos: Luis Luévanos./El Sol de San Juan del Río.
El Sol de San Juan del Río
Rodolfo Valencia
San Juan del Río, Qro.- Ya surgieron los dos equipos que protagonizarán la gran final por el título de la Categoría 1ª Intermedia Varonil del I Torneo NA del Circuito Amateur de Basketbol de SJR y los contendientes serán las quintetas de Raptor´s e Increíbles luego de ganar sus respectivas semifinales.
La quinteta escarlata de Raptor´s opacó y venció a Phoenix Suns al derrotarlos por marcador de 34-26, triunfo que se le estaba complicando en los últimos minutos del partido sin embargo los "Soles" cometieron costosos errores.
Los Soles llevaron la batuta en el marcador en el primer tiempo y consiguieron una ventaja de 7-5, pero a partir del segundo periodo los Raptor´s tomaron la iniciativa del partido y esto los llevó a tomar el mando del marcador al imponer parcial de 10-3, por lo que el marcador al irse al descanso del medio tiempo favorecía a Raptor´s por 15-10. El tercer cuarto estuvo parejo sin embargo Raptor´s apuntaló su ventaja al ganarlo por 8-7 y vino a sellar su ventaja y triunfo al imponer 11-9 en el cuarto periodo, que contabilizados a los resultados parciales de los periodos anteriores escribieron el triunfo por 34-26 para los Raptor´s.
En la otra semifinal el equipo de Increíbles conquistaron importante victoria al derrotar 53-41 a Kansas. A pesar de que estos dos equipos dividieron triunfos en los cuatro periodos, las ventajas que sacaron los Increíbles fueron por mayor diferencia y al final esto se reflejó en el marcador final. Los Increíbles se apuntaron la victoria parcial en el primer cuarto por 20-14, la respuesta no se dejó esperar por parte de Kansas en el segundo periodo en donde salieron con la ventaja a su favor por 12-7 y esto hizo que al término de la primera mitad los Increíbles tomaran ventaja mínima en el marcador general por 27-26.
Esta semifinal tuvo un momento de relax en el tercer periodo, donde Increíbles se dieron otro respiro en el marcador al ganar el parcial por 8-4 y consolidar su ventaja general 35-30. Kansas hizo todo lo que tuvo a su alcance en el cuarto periodo, pero los Increíbles supieron manejar la ventaja y no obstante perder 10-11 en este periodo el marcador general les favoreció por 53-41.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: La AEA calienta la interna de la UIA y busca imponer al nuevo presidente
description.content:
Presentó un candidato propio para competir con José Ignacio de Mendiguren en la sucesión de Héctor Méndez. Apuesta a un giro hacia la derecha en la política de la entidad empresaria.
La Asociación Empresaria Argentina (AEA), encabezada por el Grupo Clarín y Techint, quiere aprovechar la elección interna de la Unión Industrial Argentina (UIA) para colocar al ejecutivo de Arcor, Adrián Kaufmann Brea y hacerse con el control de la entidad fabril.
En la UIA conviven dos corrientes políticas internas que tienen un acuerdo de alternancia en el poder: la línea Blanca y Celeste, cuyo titular, Héctor Méndez, es el actual presidente de la entidad; y la corriente Industriales, que deberá determinar en abril a quien coloca como sucesor de Méndez.
El martes próximo comenzará a definirse la pelea entre el moderado José Ignacio de Mendiguren y Adrián Kaufmann, ambos de Industriales, pero con perfiles e historiales bien diferentes. Kaufmann es la persona que eligió el ala gurka de AEA para colocar los dos pies en la UIA y aprovechar esta plataforma con el fin de atizar un cambio en la política económica hacia una vertiente neoliberal. Detrás del posicionamiento de Kaufmann se encuentra la sórdida pelea que el CEO de Clarín, Héctor Magnetto, mantiene con el gobierno.
En cambio, José de Mendiguren fue ministro de la Producción en la presidencia corta de Eduardo Duhalde, pero siempre tuvo buena muñeca política y sostiene una relación cordial con el Poder Ejecutivo. Además, De Mendiguren cuenta con el apoyo de aquellos sectores industrialistas en los que predomina la pequeña y mediana empresa. El tercer candidato, que podría proponerse como una salida negociada dentro de la misma corriente interna, sería Osvaldo Rial, el titular de la influyente Unión Industrial de la Provincia de Buenos Aires (UIPBA).
Es una pelea desigual que enfrenta en un mismo ring a las compañías más grandes y propensas a forzar un giro a la derecha, capitaneadas por el trío Clarín-Techint-Arcor, con los sectores pymes, que se fundieron en la convertibilidad y resucitaron por las políticas industrialistas oficiales.
El nombre del sucesor de Méndez podría conocerse el próximo martes o, si las cosas se ponen muy ásperas, recién a principios de marzo. “Jamás los vi tan desesperados, quieren quedarse con la UIA a toda costa” reconoció a Tiempo Argentino un industrialista que relató el celo excesivo de los halcones de AEA por obtener el sillón mayor de la entidad fabril. <

description.hltext_display: [중국마감]소비·은행株 부진, 상하이 0.9%↓

description.hltext_display: Первым фигурантом дела о беспорядках в Минске стал Михалевич
莫雷不排除提前与姚明续约 巨人还值800万年薪
description.content:
北京时间12月22日消息，美国《体育画报》的专家克里斯-马尼克斯今天表示，虽然姚明本赛季报销，不过他仍然是莫雷未来重建的一部分。
上赛季没有姚明的情况下，休斯敦火箭队取得42胜40负的成绩，他们自2006年以来首次无缘季后赛，本赛季他们计划姚明回归，肯定能在10-11赛季重返季后赛，但现在这种希望消失了，姚明再一次错过整个赛季，医生发现他的左脚踝出现应力性骨折，姚明将会对脚踝进行第三次手术。
火箭队失去了姚明，这让火箭不用再去考虑他的上场时间了，本赛季姚明上场时间一直不能超过24分钟，医生对他进行了严格的限制，背靠背的比赛也不能出场，火箭在姚明身上医疗设备就花了数十万美元。在莫雷看来，姚明仍然有机率完全康复，他相信这位身高7尺6寸体重310磅的巨人会重新回到赛场上。
“对待姚明的问题上我们不会很天真的，”莫雷说。斯科拉上赛季场均得16.2分，火箭内线高度不够，马丁在外线的攻击力还不足以帮助火箭打击季后赛，火箭现在的阵容还需要姚明。今年夏天布鲁克斯曾经要求续约但遭到拒色，他们同样没有给巴蒂尔续约，一切都在等姚明的情况，火箭队实际上在为重建做准备，下赛季他们的工资将会从7200万美元下降到4000万美元，因此他们可以有很多选择。
这是不是意味着火箭不想留下姚明呢，“我真不知道我们将来会做什么。”莫雷说。他认为即使没有姚明火箭也可以进入西部季后赛。“我们的目标是总冠军，”莫雷说。“我们需要一位全明星级的球员，姚明一直是最棒的，我们需要球员发挥出最高水平，我们必须要升级。”
莫雷是联盟中最为活跃的总经理，他急于进行各种交易来提升球队的实力，火箭队已经向联盟申请了一个伤病特例约合570万美元的工资空间，他把阿里扎630万美元和安德森的250万美元处理掉，布鲁克斯和巴蒂尔也是合同年，如果他们能够有机会得到安东尼，可能所有球员都可能被交易。
关于姚明的未来呢？他的伤病令未来充满了变数，火箭会继续支持他的，未来几周姚明将会选择手术，火箭会为他提供一切的帮助，帮助姚明恢复。明年7月1日姚明将会成为自由球员，莫雷也正在研究在下赛季续约姚明。“我们认为他和一般的球员不同，”莫雷说。“他是火箭重要的组成部分，我们希望他能继续留在这里，我们需要他在内线做出贡献，我们希望姚明会选择留下。”
随后马尼克斯在微博中透露，火箭不排除在赛季未结束前就会与姚明续，但合同的长度以及金额都不确定，但是莫雷已经表示他们不会放弃姚明的。姚明本赛季在5场比赛中场均上18分钟得10.2分5.4个篮板1.6次封盖，如果他还能继续上场打球，他得到800万的合同应该不是问题，合同时间约在三年左右。（流星）

description.hltext_display: Fomento licita el centro comercial de la nueva estación de Urzaiz
description.author: redaccion
description.content:
Adif busca un socio para poder invertir los más de 153 millones de euros de coste de la construcción de la obra
Menéame Chuza! Facebook Twitter
redaccion - vigo - 22-12-2010
Fomento acaba de dar el primer paso para la futura construcción de al menos la parte comercial del proyecto de la nueva estación de alta velocidad de Vigo, en Urzaiz.
Fomento acaba de dar el primer paso para la futura construcción de al menos la parte comercial del proyecto de la nueva estación de alta velocidad de Vigo, en Urzaiz. El Ministerio, a través del Administrador de Infraestructuras Ferroviarias (Adif), ha licitado la construcción y explotación del Centro Vialia y lo ha hecho mediante la creación de una sociedad participada por Adif. Vigo se convierte así en el segundo proyecto que licita Adif en el marco del Plan Extraordinario de Infraestructuras de colaboración público-privada, según informó ayer Fomento en un comunicado. El presupuesto estimado de construcción del Centro Vialia, ubicado en suelos pertenecientes al Adif, es de 153,5 millones de euros. De ellos, la entidad pública tiene comprometida la contratación de 33 millones para la realización de las obras necesarias. La restante inversión deberá ser aportada por la nueva sociedad, con un porcentaje de recursos propios de al menos el 30%. El adjudicatario deberá constituir la sociedad con Adif en un plazo máximo de 90 días desde la adjudicación del contrato. El capital social inicial de la nueva sociedad será de 36,2 millones de euros, con un desembolso previo del 25%, siendo la participación de Adif del 40% (14,5 millones). A partir de la constitución de la sociedad se abrirá un plazo para la redacción del proyecto y la obtención de licencias y, a continuación, se construirá el centro Vialia. El contrato fija en 50 años el plazo máximo de explotación del centro, a contar desde la firma del acta de recepción, se informa en el comunicado. El Centro Vialia de la estación de Vigo contará con una superficie de 208.624 metros cuadrados, de los que 108.957 estarán destinado
s a uso comercial, 58.715 corresponderán a viales y zonas verdes en la cubierta transitable del edificio y 40.952 se dedicarán a la construcción de un aparcamiento subterráneo. El recinto estará construido sobre el cajón ferroviario, por lo que este quedará cubierto. Vialia es el modelo de Adif para las grandes estaciones ferroviarias. Bajo esta marca comercial, en las estaciones el usuario encuentra servicios de transporte, ocio, cultura y comercio, aunados en grandes terminales ferroviarias humanas y funcionales. Fomento ha decidido de esta forma privatizar la explotación de la parte comercial de la nueva estación de tren, un política que está extendiendo a la mayoría de sus ámbitos de actuación y que también pondrá en marcha en el control aéreo de Peinador. De hecho, la nueva empresa que forme sociedad con Adif y que se adjudique el proyecto tendrá una participación mayoritaria, con el 60%, y se hará cargo por tanto de la principal inversión para este complejo. Los más de 155 millones de euros que costará este complejo Vialia son sólo una parte de la inversión que requiere la nueva estación para adaptarse a la llegada de la alta velocidad. En total, el presupuesto ascenderá a unos 250 millones, una inversión en la que se incluye la otra gran actuación, el soterramiento de los andenes, que deberán estar a 15 metros de profundidad respecto de los actuales, para poder acoger los trenes que circulen por los túneles que se están excavando en As Maceiras.

description.hltext_display: 52 Comments
description.content:
| 8:32 p.m.
Final, UNLV wins 63-59 KANSAS CITY, Mo. —� UNLV couldn't buy a 3-pointer for much of the night, and a short-handed Kansas State team held close and kept its sell-out crowd into the game until the closing minutes.
Then Oscar Bellfield delivered in a big game yet again.
The junior point guard preserved a late 3-point lead with a big open-court block from behind on 6-foot-8 Jamar Samuels, then leading by two, hit the team's second trey of the game with just over a minute to go.
UNLV held on for a 63-59 win, improving to 11-2 heading into an extended holiday break. The Rebels aren't back in action until Dec. 30 at home against Central Michigan.
Kansas State was without star seniors Jacob Pullen and Curtis Kelly, who just before the game were ruled ineligible by the NCAA for committing a secondary violation.
Without them, K-State got surprising performances early from reserves such as sophomore Nick Russell, whose half-court heave at the buzzer sent the Cats to the locker room with a 34-32 edge. But UNLV buckled down defensively after the break, Tre'Von Willis was big on both ends in helping the Rebels construct a 6-point lead, and Lon Kruger's club held on.
Willis led the Rebels with 16 points, while Bellfield had 13.
The Rebels were just 2-of-14 from 3-point range, but got just enough offense by attacking the rim aggressively in the second half, only attempting four threes after the break. As a team, UNLV was 21-of-55 from the floor and a solid 19-of-24 from the free throw line.
Russell and Samuels each had 11 for K-State, who dropped to 9-3 and will be without Pullen for three games. The punishment for Kelly is not yet determined.
For full postgame coverage, stay tuned to lasvegassun.com/rebels.
3:06, Second Half, UNLV leads 56-53
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — UNLV isn't just trying to cling to a 3-point lead late at the Sprint Center over No. 11 Kansas State, but also trying to keep a loud, wild sell-out crowd quiet in the process.
Oscar Bellfield was huge in that effort just before the timeout, after missing a 3-pointer that made the Rebels just 1-of-12 on the night from deep.
The outlet pass found 6-foot-8 Jamar Samuels open for a dunk with no one in front of him. Bellfield swooped in and swatted it away, as the Rebels protected a 56-53 lead heading into the game's final TV timeout.
Both teams are in the double bonus now as we head to the stretch, and UNLV is 6-of-9 since entering the bonus with 9:20 left. K-State has been strong, but, remember, on the year is a 54.5 percent free throw shooting team.
11:47, Second Half, UNLV leads 48-42
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — The Rebels have calmed down on the defensive end, quieted a sell-out crowd at the Sprint Center and strung up enough offense to take a 48-42 lead on No. 11 Kansas State with 11:47 left to play.
Willis has six points so far this half, and assisted a Quintrell Thomas layup just before a recent K-State timeout to help push a current Rebels lead that also saw him score on an aggressive drive. In the middle was a strong, reverse and-one finish by Derrick Jasper, as the Rebels have started attacking the rim more rather than settling for outside looks.
Meanwhile, Kansas State's young ballhandlers are starting to look the part. Will Spradling and Nick Russell are both seeing traps and double-teams, and while they're not turning it over frequently, the Wildcats offense is having a tough time getting set up.
Halftime, K-State leads 34-32
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — UNLV didn't score a field goal in almost eight minutes to close out the first half, while short-handed Kansas State came alive. The Cats capped their comeback with a half-court heave from Nick Russell at the halftime buzzer to give them a 34-32 lead at the break.
On the stat sheet, K-State has been far from spectacular, but the Rebels are having more than a tough time looking comfortable in front of a hostile crowd that is now alive.
UNLV was just 12-of-33 from the floor and 1-of-8 from deep in the first half. Meanwhile, K-State has 3 assists, 12 turnovers and is 6-of-12 from the free throw line. But Russell has been monstrous, filling in for the ineligible Jake Pullen.
The little-used sophomore has a game-high 11 points and three rebounds.
For UNLV, Tre'Von Willis has a team-high eight points, while Chace Stanback has struggled mightily from the outside, going 1-of-5 from the floor.
The most crucial stretch of this game for UNLV might be the first five minutes of the second half, because if Kansas State keeps this up, the crowd might swallow what's left of the Rebels' collective confidence.
7:50, Second Half, UNLV leads 23-17 KANSAS CITY, Mo. —� The Rebels have gone cold from long range at the Sprint Center, but now are starting to attack Kansas State at the rim and are holding on to a 23-17 lead.
UNLV is also staying somewhat strong on the defensive end as K-State is without two of its top scorers.
The Rebels are 10-of-22 from the floor and just 1-of-8 from deep, while the Cats are an efficient, conservative 7-of-15 overall.
UNLV is having some struggles defending the interior, as Lon Kruger is subbing out his three big men after every foul. It's hard to tell if its made them play any tighter, but it's certainly not helping.
Meanwhile, the Rebels have started attacking the rim hard as the outside shots aren't falling. Just before the latest TV timeout, Derrick Jasper dropped in a nice and-one finish off of a backdoor feed from Oscar Bellfield. Also coming on now is Anthony Marshall, who has made a couple of nice drives to the goal after missing an outside look after first coming in off of the bench.
15:49, First Half, UNLV leads 10-7
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — Early on, UNLV is attacking Kansas State where it is now the weakest.
First, the Rebels went inside to Quintrell Thomas, who slipped free for two buckets against an interior defense that is without Curtis Kelly. Then Tre'Von Willis, guarded by the inexperienced Nick Russell as opposed to Jake Pullen, drove for two more hoops.
Kansas State is keeping it close, though, by attacking the offensive glass. Even without Kelly, Frank Martin still has four big bodies to throw at UNLV, and on one key possession, the Cats grabbed three offensive caroms, ultimately getting a triple from Will Spradling at the end.
The Rebels definitely look like the more confident team, as K-State is going to have to have at least two or three unlikely suspects step up with its two senior leaders out.
Pregame (cont.)
KANSAS CITY, Mo. — UNLV just got its upper hand, and we're still 45 minutes from tip-off.
K-State seniors Jacob Pullen and Curtis Kelly, two of the team's three leading scorers, are both out for tonight's game.
The school put out a release that it is completing a review of a secondary violation of NCAA rules and is seeking reinstatement of both.
Both were declared ineligible on Monday by K-State after they were declared to have received impermissible benefits on the purchase of clothing at a local department store.
Pullen will be out for three games, while a final ruling on Kelly has yet to be made.
This puts that much more pressure on K-State guards Will Spradling and Rodney McGruder to handle the Rebels' heavy pressure defense.
Gotta also change my prediction. UNLV 75, K-State 60. KANSAS CITY, Mo. —� Well, if UNLV has one thing going its way here tonight that's already apparent, it's that the Rebels have already seen their share of hostile road environments. They've also gotten used to life on the road, playing six of their first 12 games outside of the 702 area code.
Yes, this is supposed to be a 'neutral court' game against No. 11 Kansas State, but as was the case last year when the Wildcats had to play at the Orleans Arena, the Rebels won't have many in their corner.
A sell-out crowd of nearly 19,000 is expected to fill the Sprint Center in downtown Kansas City tonight, and not many will be wearing red. That's already apparent by walking the revitalized area around the arena more than two hours before tip-off.
Both teams are still licking some pretty fresh wounds, though, which should add some fire to an already highly-anticipated showdown.
The Wildcats suffered a tough 57-44 loss at Florida on Saturday, going just 15-of-55 from the floor and completely shutting down offensively in the second half after starting it with a 23-20 edge.
As for UNLV, while a 72-50 romp over Southern Utah on Saturday felt nice, the Rebels still have to regain their edge and swagger from earlier this season that was somewhat lost during a two-game losing skid a week ago.
This game has already been analyzed from every possible angle, but as we narrow the scope nearing tip-off, here are three things to watch maybe closer than anything else during tonight's contest.
1) Taking the upper hand
Both teams play tough, physical defense, and UNLV will try to extend it into the full-court as it did against so many teams early this season. The Rebels have forced 217 turnovers this season, and K-State doesn't have quite the backcourt depth it did a year ago.
If the Rebels can assert themselves early and get into the kitchens of the Wildcats' younger guards —� freshman Will Spradling and sophomore Rodney McGruder — they could potentially take the upper hand and dictate the game much the same way K-State did last year in a 95-80 rout at the Orleans.
K-State, on the other hand, will need Spradling and Pullen to play as turnover-free as humanly possible.
2) Making some big noise
While the Rebels hold an edge in overall talent and depth in the backcourt, the Wildcats have it up front.
UNLV's 6-foot-8 sophomore Quintrell Thomas might be able to fare against K-State's bigs better than any of his teammates, but that will also involve him staying out of foul trouble
If he's not on the floor, it could potentially be a big night for K-State's top duo of big men in senior Curtis Kelly and junior Jamar Samuels. Frank Martin also has three other strong frontcourt options at his disposal in Freddy Asprilla, Jordan Henriquez-Roberts and Wally Judge.
However, both Kelly and Samuels killed the Rebels a year ago, combining for 27 points, and both are struggling so far this season for various reasons. This could be a big opportunity for both of them to get back on track with Big 12 play looming near.
3) The x-factors
For UNLV, it is sophomore guard Anthony Marshall, who goes back to his role as a reserve behind Tre'Von Willis following a spot start in place of Derrick Jasper on Saturday night.
While playing Jasper's part, Marshall got back to his roots, using his length, athleticism and finishing skills to break apart Southern Utah's defensive scheme and keep UNLV ahead.
After not relying on his struggling outside shot, Marshall torched SUU for a career-high 17 points on 6-of-9 shooting, also adding three assists, no turnovers, two steals and two rebounds.
On the other side, Spradling probably holds the key to everything.
He's taken over the point guard duties from Pullen, who is again being relied on to simply score. If UNLV can pressure Spradling — a one-time Rebels recruiting target — and force him into turnovers, it could keep the game at the chaotic pace it prefers. Plus, the Rebels could leave Spradling no choice but to adapt, because Martin doesn't really have a reliable point guard option behind the baby-faced frosh.
As for a prediction for tonight, I'm still leaning towards Kansas State, 73-71. I think UNLV has a better chance of winning here than it did at Louisville two weeks ago, as K-State appears to have some internal issues that could spill over badly onto the floor at any point. I'm predicting a two-point game mostly because absolutely nothing would surprise me in terms of an outcome.
For tonight's Pick to Click, I'm going with Tre'Von Willis, who is only shooting 42.7 percent this season (down from 47.8 a year ago), but is now rounding back into strong form. He has a knack for showing up in a big way for games like this in his UNLV career, and is well-rested after only playing 17 minutes on Saturday.
Stay tuned for updates as the action unfolds tonight, and, as always, join the conversation with me during the game by adding the #unlvmbb hashtag to your tweets. Or, you can give me a follow at twitter.com/ryanmgreene.
Talk to you shortly after tip-off.
Ryan Greene can be reached at ryan.greene@lasvegassun.com or 702-948-7844. Follow Ryan on Twitter at twitter.com/ryanmgreene.

description.hltext_display: 针对近期多起骚乱事件 俄软硬兼施打击极端势力
description.content:
“在俄罗斯，煽动民族冲突是最严重的罪行。”12月16日，梅德韦杰夫在一次会议上表示，俄罗斯将加大对极端主义分子的打击力度。同一天，俄罗斯总理普京在与国民进行直播连线交流时也强调，“虽然不可以用一杆子打死一船人的方式来对待任何人，但需要严厉制止任何极端的行为”。 针对俄罗斯近期连续发生的多起骚乱事件，从总统总理到莫斯科市市长索比亚宁再到多数俄罗斯民众，都纷纷表示了对极端势力的谴责，并声称应对极端分子予以严厉的打击。
普京批警方应对不力
俄总统梅德韦杰夫16日在有关实施额外执法措施的会议上说：“如果在现有刑法的框架内对民族极端势力惩罚力度不够，那么就向我呈报一份加大惩罚力度的提案。”他指出，在其他国家，可能会对这种情况视而不见，但在俄罗斯不会，“因为我们自己清楚，在我们国家有多少个民族”。梅德韦杰夫还责令俄联邦安全总局查明策划骚乱、煽动民族纷争和宗教仇恨的人。
俄罗斯总理普京当日也表示，俄罗斯需要从方方面面制止极端主义行为，不管在哪里出现。普京在与国民直播连线交流期间说：“激进主义的细菌永远都会存在，就象每个人的身体内都有病菌一样。但如果一个人的抵抗力好，那么这些病菌就不会扩散。社会也是一样，如果社会的抵抗力强大，是一个成熟的社会，那么那些民族主义和激进主义的病菌就会静悄悄躲在细胞层面，不会冒头。当社会整体抵抗力下降，疾病就会扩散。”
普京还对俄罗斯警方在球迷被欧致死后的处理方式提出了严厉批评，他称执法部门对这一案件没有给予足够的重视。
莫斯科实施严打
面对俄罗斯高层的责令和批评，莫斯科全方位加强了安保措施，并采取多种方式来遏制和打击极端主义势力。
莫斯科市长谢尔盖・索比亚宁发表声明说，市政府将尽一切努力防止再次发生类似骚乱事件的发生。据俄新社报道，莫斯科警方已于15日起加强了在基辅火车站旁边的“欧洲”商业中心广场的巡逻，“包括特警在内的警察支队将巡逻火车站附属广场”。此外，莫斯科市政府还要求关闭宣扬极端主义的网站。内务总局副局长亚历山大・梅利尼科夫表示，必须查明宣扬极端主义的网站，并予以关闭。
除了重拳打击外，莫斯科市政府还注重了“软实力”的运用。梅利尼科夫指出，应在青年当中进行打击非法集会的工作，并向民众宣传“非法群体性活动不被允许”的理念。而索比亚宁则责成教育局邀请参与马涅日广场骚乱事件以及基辅火车站广场集会学生的家长谈话。
虽然莫斯科市政府采取的软硬兼施的治理措施控制住了当前的安全局势，不过，对于极端势力的长远威胁，俄罗斯人并不感到乐观。俄罗斯第一副总检察长亚历山大・布克斯曼表示，民族冲突可能会在俄罗斯各地发生，“宣扬宗教、民族和种族至上思想的问题在青年人中间极其严重，极端主义犯罪率逐年提高，今年这类犯罪率上升20%以上”。本报记者/余水

description.hltext_display: Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content: A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said. West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.The spokesman said: "On arrival, firefighters were bringing the two patients out of the smoke-filled house."As further crews were only seconds away, the first (crew to arrive) decided to leave the scene immediately with the child to take him to University Hospital in Coventry."While the crew worked on the child, a firefighter drove the ambulance."Both victims were in cardiac arrest when they were rescued from the two-storey terrace house and fire crews also attempted to resuscitate the adult victim.The ambulance service spokesman said the second crew to arrive immediately took over efforts to revive the man before taking him to the same hospital."Sadly, despite the best efforts of fire, ambulance and hospital staff, it was not possible to save either the man or the boy and they were both confirmed dead shortly after arrival at hospital," the spokesman said.Copyright (c) Press Association Ltd. 2010, All Rights Reserved.

description.hltext_display: La quinteta celeste de Raptor´s de Querétaro obtuvo el título de la Categoría Clasificada del I Torneo NA del Circuito Amateur de SJR.
description.content:
San Juan del Río, Qro.- La quinteta celeste de Raptor´s de Querétaro obtuvo el título de la Categoría Clasificada del I Torneo NA del Circuito Amateur de SJR al vencer en el encuentro final al equipo sanjuanense de Maveric´s por marcador de 88-67.
Un total dominio de la situación tuvo el equipo queretano en esta final, principalmente en el marcador, donde a pesar de que dividieron victorias parciales en los cuatro periodos las mayores ventajas las saco Raptor´s y de ahí que se diera esta coronación, sino en forma fácil si tranquila.
Los Maveric´s dieron la impresión de que entregaron todo lo que tenían en su semifinal, para eliminar al Real Madrid, ya que ahora fueron una auténtica sombra de aquel aguerrido equipo y no tuvieron la menor oportunidad de llevarse la victoria.
Con un mejor empaque de equipo se vio a Raptor´s de Querétaro desde el primer cuarto y a partir de ahí tomó ventaja que ya nunca perdió al imponer marcador parcial de 28-11, para el segundo cuarto más que reacción de Maveric´s fue que Raptor´s entraron en confianza ganando el parcial el equipo sanjuanense por 22-20 y con ello la primera mitad vino a terminar favoreciendo a Raport´s por 48-33.
Para el segundo tiempo Raport´s volvió asumir el dominio del partido y del marcador, para afianzar la ventaja general sumaron otros 25 puntos a su favor, mientras que Maveric´s sumó a su cuenta otros 18 puntos y con ello el marcador general se puso 73-51 a favor de los queretanos.
No se veía por dónde Maveric´s pudiera poner en peligro el triunfo de Raptor´s, a pesar que los queretanos flojearon en el cuarto periodo pero fueron suficientes los 15 puntos encestados y ante esto los 16 puntos conseguidos por Maveric´s sirvieron solamente para adornar mejor su marcador y es que el marcador final favoreció claramente por 88-67 a los Raptor´s de Querétaro y con ello llevarse el título de la Categoría Clasificada Varonil del I Torneo NA del Circuito Amateur de Basketbol de SJR.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: 중화권 최고 갑부 리카싱, 최초 위안화 IPO 추진
description.content: [100억위안 규모 리� 내년 상반기 상장]중화권 최� 갑부인 리카싱 허치슨 왐포아 및 청쿵실업 회장이 홍콩에서 최초로 위안화를 이용한 기업공개(IPO)를 준비하� 있다� 블룸버그통� 이 22일 보도했다.복수의 관계자에 따르면 리 회장은 내년 상반기 중국 대형 쇼핑몰 오리엔탈 플라자의 부동산투자� 탁펀드(REIT)를 상장� 예� �이다. 주간사는 씨틱증권으로 � � �됐으며, 총 조달 규모는 100억위안(15억달러)에 이른다.관계자들은 HSBC 홀딩스도 리 회장의 위안화 IPO를 도울 예� �이라� � �했다.리 위 리앗 삼성증권 � 널리스트는 "만약 위안화 IPO의 반응이 좋다면 홍콩의 부동산업체들은 뒤따라 이를 추진� 것"이라� 말했다.또 그는 "향후 5~7년 내에 홍콩 대� 중국이 청쿵 실업의 성장을 이끄는 주요 동� �이 � 것"이라� 강조했다.지난해 발표한 보� 서에 따르면 리 회장이 소� 한 청쿵실업은 오리엔탈 플라자의 지분 33.4%를 보� 하� 있으며, 청쿵실업이 49.9%의 지분을 보� 힌 허치슨 왐포아는 18%의 지분을 가지� 있다.홍콩 증권거래소는 라 회장의 IPO 추진에 대해서는 답변을 거부했지만 이메일을 통해 "홍콩에서 위안화 IPO가 추진� 경우 � �극 지원� 준비가 돼 있다"� 밝혔다.앞서 찰스 리 홍콩증권거래소 최� 경영자(CEO)는 위안화를 이용한 IPO를 허용하자� � �안했다. 홍콩 은행들이 보� 한 위안화는 10월 기준 2171억위안 수준으로 � �차 증가하� 있기 때문이다.지난 10월 홍콩� 보는 홍콩 증권거래소가 내년부터 위안화를 이용한 IPO가 가능하도록 � �차를 밟� 있다� 보도하기도 했다.당시 찰스 리 CEO는 "이를 통해 위안화의 국� �� � 활용도를 높이� 달러 의존도를 줄일 수 있을 것"이라� 말했다.[김경원기자 damdadi@]� �작권자 ⓒ `돈이 보이는 리얼타임 뉴스` 머니투데이

description.hltext_display: “Kadınlar All Star 2011” Halk Oylaması Başladı
description.content:
Türkiye Kadınlar Basketbol Ligi’nin en eğlenceli ve coşkulu organizasyonu olan All Star, bu yıl Eskişehir’de…
Basketbol severlerin merakla beklediği All Star eğlencesi, 16 Ocak 2011 tarihinde Eskişehir Anadolu Üniversitesi Spor Salonu ev sahipliğinde düzenlenecek.
Türkiye Basketbol Federasyonu (TBF) resmi internet www.tbl.org.tr üzerinde başlayan halk oylaması, 9 Ocak 2011 tarihinde sona erecek. Basketbol severlerin vereceği oylarla oluşturulacak olan yıldızlar kadrosu, All Star gününe özel gösteri maçı çerçevesinde karşı karşıya gelecek. Yarışmalar, dans gösterileri, smaç şovlar ve sürprizlerle süslenen All Star’da halk oylamasına katılan basketbol severler aynı zamanda çeşitli hediyeler kazanma şansına da sahip olacak.
Kadınlar All Star 2011’de Kırmızı ve Beyaz takım mücadele edecek. Oylamaya katılan sporseverler her kategori için bir kez oy kullanabilecek ve oy verdikleri pozisyonun ilk sırasında yer alan oyuncuyu görebilecekler. Oylama sonrasında her kategoriden birinci sırada yer alan oyuncular Kırmızı veya Beyaz takımda forma giyecek. All Star kadrosunda yer alacak olan oyuncuların bir kısmı antrenör ve basının vereceği oylarla, bir kısmı ise TBF tarafından belirlenecek.
E-mail tabanlı üyelik sistemi üzerinden gerçekleştirilecek olan oylamaya katılan basketbol severler aynı zamanda çeşitli hediyeler kazanma şansını da yakalayacak. Halk oylamasında;
· 100. oyu kullanan katılımcı, 2 TKBL karşılaşması için maç başına 2’şer müsabaka bileti,
· 2100. oyu kullanan katılımcı DVD Player,
· 4100. oyu kullanan katılımcı Eskişehir’de 2 kişilik konaklama ve organizasyon süresince saha kenarında oyuncularla oturma hakkı kazanacak.
Oylamada birden fazla oy kullandığı tespit edilen katılımcılara ödül verilmeyecek ve numara sırası bir sonraki katılımcıya geçecek.
All Star 2011’de Eskişehir Anadolu Üniversitesi Spor Salonu’nda yerlerini alan basketbol tutkunları uzun süre hafızalardan çıkmayacak bir All Star şöleni yaşayacak. Kadınlar All Star’da sahne alacak gösteri grupları ve sanatçılar, ilerleyen günlerde kamuoyuna duyurulacak.
Oylama sayfasına ulaşmak için tıklayınız

description.hltext_display: [互动]安泰科技:公司发展还未到向上下游延伸阶段
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
全景网12月22日讯 安泰科技(000969,股吧)（000969）周三在深交所上市公司投资者关系互动平台上表示，公司在非晶产业的核心业务是非晶带材生产，也正在根据战略规划，布局考虑上游原材料和下游市场。但企业需要集中力量在自己擅长的方向，非晶产业方兴未艾、远没有到需要做全产业链来竞争的地步。
安泰科技以先进金属材料为主导产业，同时涉足“非晶、纳米晶材料、太阳能等先进能源材料”“粉末冶金制品”“金属磁性材料”“焊接材料”“金刚石工具”“高速工具钢”等6个产业领域。（全景网/周蓓）

description.hltext_display: Fultz is Ufema winner
description.content:
- By JEFF FISHBEIN, Sentinel sports editor, jfishbein@lewistownsentinel.com
Save |
HIGHLAND PARK - As a running back, Mitch Fultz's contributions to Indian Valley's football team were noteworthy. But Warrior coach Tom Shearer looked beyond what Fultz accomplished on the field when Shearer nominated Fultz for the Alex Ufema Award.
The voters must have seen it, too - Fultz was named today as the top football player in Mifflin County for 2010.
Shearer said there were plenty of candidates on his squad, but Fultz's leadership - not to mention his numbers - were enough to make him the one.
"His grade point average helped, his character, and he's team captain," Shearer said. "But mostly just because he's a great kid."
By the numbers, Fultz was a solid performer each of the past two seasons, but more so in 2010. His career total of 2,481 rushing yards include 1,330 this past fall, his second season over the 1,000-yard mark. He got the ball a whopping 220 times this season, averaging 6.0 yards per carry and 133 per game. His 14 rushing touchdowns were complemented by 20 catches for 281 yards - he also scored that way - and added a TD on a 93-yard kick return, the longest of his eight. He also averaged 19 yards coming back on nine punt returns. He finished with 525 receiving yards and 25 total touchdowns.
"I think a lot of that goes to our line," Shearer said. "All running backs are the same with no blocking, annd Mitch would be the first one to give them credit as well.
"He also played defense a lot for two years. We didn't use him too much this year, but for two years he played both sides of the ball all the time."
Shearer said among a solid senior corps, Fultz stood out for his attitude and work ethic.
"He didn't do it alone - it was all about 'we' and never about him," the coach said. "He always ran hard and wanted to do well, obviously, but it was more about winning the game than individual stats."
And that, Shearer said, is the real focus of the Indian Valley program.
"Football's what everybody sees. I really try with the coaches here to have a total program, try to act right and get good grades," he said. "Football's important but we're trying to build strong young men with some characer, and hopefully learn some things in football."

description.hltext_display: Sydkorea spiller igen med musklerne
description.content:
Det sydkoreanske forsvar siger, at det vil afholde den største militærøvelse nogensinde tæt på grænsen til ærkefjenden Nordkorea.
Der vil blive skudt med skarpt
Øvelsen skal efter planen finde sted torsdag og er formentlig udtryk for, at Sydkorea ønsker at vise sin styrke i kølvandet på Nordkoreas granatangreb på den sydkoreanske ø Yeonpyeong i november, hvor fire mennesker blev dræbt.
Både fly, artillerienheder og et rekordstort antal soldater deltager i øvelsen, hvor der vil blive skudt med skarpt. Sydkorea afholdt så sent som mandag en artilleriøvelse ved Yeonpyeong.
Beboere på fem sydkoreanske øer i et omstridt område i Det Gule Hav blev bedt om at søge ly i bunkere, da militæret frygtede et nyt nordkoreansk angreb.
Torsdagens militærøvelse bliver gennemført på det sydkoreanske fastland i Pocheon-regionen mindre end 50 kilometer fra hovedstaden Seoul.
Håb om forhandlinger
Nordkorea har i denne uge givet udtryk for, at landet igen ville tillade atominspektører fra FN at undersøge sine atominstallationer, hvilket har givet omverdenen håb om en genoptagelse af sekspartsforhandlingerne, der skal føre til nordkoreansk atomafvæbning.
Sydkoreanerne har dog et ønske om at vise sin styrke efter angrebet mod Yeonpyeong, antyder en unavngiven sydkoreansk officer.
- Ja, det bliver en styrkefremvisning, siger han.
De to Koreaer har været på kollisionskurs siden en international efterforskning slog fast, at det sydkoreanske krigsskib Cheonan formentlig var blevet sænket af en nordkoreansk torpedo tilbage i marts. 46 sømænd omkom i forliset.

description.hltext_display: Trafikken klarer op i Europas snekaos
description.author: Ritzau /ferie
description.content:
Luftfarten og togtrafikken forsøger onsdag at komme tilbage til normal drift i dele af Europa, men der er stadig forsinkelser på grund af sne og is.
I Heathrow i London, der er verdens mest travle internationale lufthavn, og i Frankfurt, som begge har haft store forstyrrelser i afgangene, er der onsdag meldinger om, at driften er ved at vende tilbage til normalen.
Håb til strandede passagerer
Heathrow genåbnede tirsdag sin anden landingsbane, hvilket giver håb til tusindvis af strandede passagerer.
- Den sydlige landingsbane er nu åben, men flyselskaberne opererer i øjeblikket med betydeligt reduceret skema, skriver lufthavnsoperatøren BAA på sin hjemmeside.
British Airways siger, at det kun vil gennemføre en tredjedel af sine normale flyvninger fra Heathrow frem til torsdag klokken 06.00.
Flyvningerne fra Frankfurt blev tirsdag genoptaget, efter lufthavnen havde været lukket i flere timer i løbet af natten.
Tilbage til normale tilstande
Flyselskabet Lufthansa siger, at situationen i Frankfurt 'gradvist nærmer sig det normale' og, at det 'ser gode muligheder for en tilbagevenden til normal flyveaktivitet'.
Eurostar, der driver højhastighedstogene mellem London, Bruxelles og Paris, vil onsdag genåbne sin normale check-in ved St. Pancras stationen i London, hvor tusindvis af mennesker har siddet i kø tirsdag.
Selskabet siger, at ni ud af 52 afgange kan blive aflyst onsdag.
Den svenske avis Expressen skriver, at E6-motorvejen, der forbinder Gøteborg og Oslo, var lukket natten til onsdag på grund af snefald. Der er meldinger om mange fastkørte biler.

description.hltext_display: Kirchenkunst aus uralter Eiche
description.content:
AUGUSTFEHN, 22. Dezember 2010
Advent Dreiteilige Krippe ist komplett – Attraktion in der Friedenskirche
Die neuen Krippenfiguren wurden pünktlich zur Adventszeit in der Friedenskirche aufgebaut. Viele Kirchenmitglieder haben gespendet, um die Finanzierung sicherzustellen.
Augustfehn - Die heilige Familie in Holz war schon Weihnachten vor einem Jahr ein echter Hingucker in der Augustfehner Friedenskirche. Jetzt ist das dreiteilige Ensemble komplett. Hinzu kam eine weitere Stele mit den drei heiligen Königen und eine dritte, auf der die Hirten abgebildet sind. Darüber freut sich nicht nur Pastor Hermann Schorling.
Die neuen Krippenfiguren wurden in der Adventszeit bereits von der Gemeinde bestaunt. „Viele sind nach dem Gottesdienst nach vorne gekommen, um sich die Figuren genauer anzusehen“, hat Küster Andreas Bruns beobachtet.
Denn vor allem aus der Nähe betrachtet, zeigt sich die Besonderheit der Schnitzkunst von Eberhard Rieber. Der Holzbildhauermeister aus Jestetten, unmittelbar vor der Schweizer Grenze, hat sich ganz nach den Wünschen der Augustfehner Auftraggeber gerichtet. „Die Gesichter sollten freundlich wirken, und alles sollte auf die heilige Familie hin ausgerichtet sein“, beschreibt Bruns die Vorgaben. Verzichtet werden sollte auch auf Farbe, damit die Figuren zur Umgebung in der Kirche passen und vor allem auch die Holzstruktur besser zur Geltung kommt.
Dafür hat der Künstler nämlich eine Rarität genutzt: uralte Eichenbalken, die aus einem Fachwerkhaus stammen, das 1660 erbaut wurde. Das Holz soll nach den Berechnungen des Handwerkers von einem Baum kommen, der im 16. Jahrhundert groß geworden ist. Daher war auch für den Holzbildhauermeister die Arbeit an dem Auftrag etwas Besonderes. „Jedes Holz erzählt eine Geschichte, und dieses ist so viele Jahre alt.“ Vom Entwurf bis zur Umsetzung habe es gedauert, erzählt Rieber. „Man muss das Holz genau betrachten und sehen, wo Risse sind oder Astlöcher. So gibt das Holz manchmal die Form vor.“
Es war mitunter auch mühsam, daran zu arbeiten“, erzählt Rieber weiter. Während der Arbeit hatte er mit manchen „Störenfrieden“ zu kämpfen: Im Balken verbargen sich Nägel. Und sogar die waren sehenswert, weil sie teilweise noch handgeschmiedet waren. Einige Ansichtsexemplare hat Rieber daher nach Augustfehn geschickt.
Die Gemeinde hat auf die Fertigstellung aller drei Stelen rund eineinhalb Jahre gewartet. Sie ersetzen die alten, nur 15 Zentimeter hohen Krippenfiguren, die nach etwa 30 Jahren beschädigt und unansehnlich waren. Die neuen Exemplare sind 1,50 Meter hoch und damit groß genug, um sie auch von den hinteren Plätzen gut zu erkennen.
Viele Kirchenmitglieder haben Geld gespendet, um die Finanzierung sicherzustellen. Jetzt können sich die Gottesdienstbesucher vom gelungenen Ergebnis überzeugen.

description.hltext_display: Kapica: Zwiększymy kontrolę e-handlu
description.content:
Od 2011 roku będziemy wnikliwiej kontrolować internetowe transakcje wyrobami akcyzowymi - zapowiada wiceminister odpowiedzialny za cło i akcyzę.
Jacek Kapica deklaruje, że w przyszłym roku powstanie telefoniczne Centrum Informacji Służby Celnej. W rozmowie z Dziennikiem Gazetą Prawną twierdzi, że będzie tam można uzyskać pomoc z zakresu prawa celnego. Będą też udzielane podstawowe informacje z zakresu spraw akcyzowych czy hazardowych.
Zostanie też stworzona grupa zadaniowa do spraw e-handlu, która zajmie się rozpoznaniem i analizą transakcji w internecie z punktu widzenia obrotu wyrobami akcyzowymi i innymi towarami podlegającymi ograniczeniom lub zakazom celnym.

Od lutego 2011 roku zostanie uruchomiona jedna jednostka - w Szczecinie - która będzie się zajmowała statystyką w obrocie wewnątrzwspólnotowym. Inne systemy, które są wykorzystywane w kontaktach ze Służbą Celną, przyjmą też formę rozliczeń elektronicznych. Elektroniczny system przemieszczania wyrobów akcyzowych EMCS zacznie funkcjonować od 1 stycznia 2011 roku.
Czytaj w Money.pl Czy rozliczenie za pośrednictwem Pay Pala, czy platnosci.pl to płatność bezgotówkowa, której nie wliczamy do limitu dotyczącego kas fiskalnych? Podwyżkę zapowiada wiceminister Jacek Kapica.O ile wzrośnie cena za paczkę zależy od producentów. Portale aukcyjne, sklepy internetowe i banki będą musiały ujawniać dane osób kupujących i sprzedających w sieci.

description.hltext_display: 'True Grit' a truly good remake
description.content:
Beaver County Times
Jeff Bridges looks very much at home on the range in Joel and Ethan Coen’s spirited “True Grit.”
In this painstakingly rendered version of Charles Portis’ acclaimed 1968 novel, the 61-year-old Bridges rides across the screen without ever losing our attention, interest or curiosity.
He delivers a dead-on performance as Reuben J. “Rooster” Cogburn, a seemingly laid-back lawman/bounty hunter/bodyguard whose bouts with the bottle give the impression that he’s not at the top of his game.
Any enemy who assumes that doesn’t recognize the cold blood running through the veins of Cogburn, who killed 23 men during his days as a U.S. Marshal.
One person who immediately recognizes it is Mattie Ross (gifted newcomer Hailee Steinfeld), a persnickety, straight-talking 14-year-old seeking revenge against Tom Chaney (Josh Brolin of “Jonah Hex”), who murdered and robbed her father. When given a choice between three applicants with the abilities to track Chaney, the revenge-seeking teen doesn’t hesitate to select Cogburn due to his normal operating procedure of killing the target and shrugging off any consequences, usually with the help of a bottle of whiskey.
“I intend to see papa’s killer hanged,” Mattie says in setting the tone for the PG-13 picture. The line reading registers as both rousing and chilling.
The West created by the gifted Coens, who shared an Oscar as best director for “No Country for Old Men,” is an unforgiving place where frigid nights, dangerous gunmen, and an indifferent universe tend to break the spirits of those not strong enough to fight back.
The ornery Rooster and Mattie are able to survive a hostile landscape and even thrive from it. They both possess killer instincts and don’t think much of forgiveness.
Going along with Rooster and Mattie in their quest is LaBoeuf (Matt Damon of the “Bourne” franchise), an annoyingly talkative Texas Ranger also seeking Chaney and willing to lend his skills to their hunt. Their enemies on the trek include Lucky Ned (Barry Pepper of “Saving Private Ryan”), a cagey fighter who is joined by two horse-riding cohorts in an open-range gun battle against the one-eyed Cogburn in a scene that’s the centerpiece of this gritty Western.
The Coens once again work with cinematographer Roger Deakins, who previously teamed with them on “No Country for Old Men,” “Fargo,” “The Man Who Wasn’t There” and “O Brother, Where Art Thou?” Deakins rewards them by creating memorable landscapes that capture both the beauty and danger of the great outdoors and creates a mood that perfectly underscores the bittersweet ending.
Postscript: Portis’ novel “True Grit” was originally turned into a 1969 film with John Wayne, who won a best-actor Oscar for his grizzled performance as Cogburn. The vintage version was directed by Henry Hathaway. Glen Campbell, Robert Duvall and Kim Darby co-starred.
The film inspired a 1975 sequel, “Rooster Cogburn,” with Wayne and Katharine Hepburn, and a 1978 TV movie with Warren Oates (“Bring Me the Head of Alfredo Garcia”) and Lisa Pelikan (“Swing Shift”).
FILM REVIEW
“True Grit”
Grade: A-
Starring: Jeff Bridges, Matt Damon, Josh Brolin, Barry Pepper and Hailee Steinfeld; screenplay by Joel and Ethan Coen, based on the novel by Charles Portis; cinematography by Roger Deakins; directed by the Coens.
Running Time: 113 minutes.
Parental Guide: PG-13 rating (Intense scenes of Western violence, disturbing images).

description.hltext_display: 美夫妇打造独特饮食书 从80份工作餐看全球饮食
description.content:
“吃了吗？”是很多老北京人见面后的第一句话。现在，有一对美国夫妇，不但关心你吃没吃，还想知道你吃的是什么。
据英国《每日邮报》近日报道，这对家住加利福尼亚州的美国夫妇是现年62岁的彼得・门泽尔和菲丝・德・阿鲁伊西奥，他们花了3年半时间，花费64万美元跑遍世界各地，采访了80位当地居民，只为弄清“你吃了吗”、“吃的是什么”。据报道，夫妇俩以前都是新闻工作者，两人不但会将受访者在一个普通工作日里吃喝的所有食物和饮料拍摄下来，还会询问他们的年龄、职业、健康水平，以及身高和体重状况，并以此分析受访者的热量摄入水平。最后，夫妻俩将他们收集的所有数据编成一本视角独特的饮食书籍《我吃的是什么？》。
书中记录了一位肯尼亚女牧人一天的伙食，她通常的食物包括浓汤、一根香蕉、茶、糖以及从蓄水池中打来再煮沸的白水，她的热量摄入是所有受访者中最低的，仅为800卡路里。相比之下，在美国芝加哥一座正在建造的摩天大楼里工作的39岁工人杰夫・迪瓦恩，摄入的热量则要高得多，达6600卡路里。书中还有一位中国人：在上海马戏城做职业杂技演员的16岁女孩曹晓丽(音译)，她每个工作日的热量摄入值为1700卡路里，书上特地提到她每天的训练时间为5个小时。(郑子游)

description.hltext_display: La ruptura de Adif con Riofisa deja en el aire el plan Thom Mayne
description.author: redaccion
description.content:
El diseño del prestigioso arquitecto fue adjudicado por Riofisa, que ya no es socio de Adif desde mayo
Menéame Chuza! Facebook Twitter
redaccion - vigo - 22-12-2010
El encargado de diseñar el complejo comercial que se acaba de licitar fue el prestigioso arquitecto Thom Mayne, que fue elegido por el alcalde para construir una estación con sello propio.
El encargado de diseñar el complejo comercial que se acaba de licitar fue el prestigioso arquitecto Thom Mayne, que fue elegido por el alcalde para construir una estación con sello propio. No obstante, el futuro de ese gran diseño está en estos momentos en el aire, ya que en su momento fue la empresa Riofisa, socia entonces de Adif, la que adjudicó a este arquitecto el estudio del proyecto. Hasta mayo de 2’, Adif contaba con Riofisa, del Grupo Colonial, como socia estable el desarrollo de las estaciones Vialia como grandes centros comerciales, una colaboración en la que la empresa privada contaba con el 60% de participación y Adif el 40%. Así, juntos realizaron las estaciones de Málaga, Salamanca, Pontevedra, Bilbao y Madrid, iniciaron la de Albacete pero se quedaron en el tintero los proyectos en Alicante, Barcelona, Cádiz y Vigo. La situación financiera del país obligó a la inmobiliaria a romper su colaboración con Adif al no poder hacer frente a las inversiones necesarias, tal y como aseguraba en su momento, lo que obligaba al ente público a financiar al 100% los proyectos previstos, entre ellos el de Vigo. Ahora, Fomento inicia una nueva etapa para buscar un nuevo socio con el que poder levantar la estación. Sin embargo, no está confirmado que la empresa que finalmente se adjudique la construcción y gestión de Vialia se quede con el proyecto realizado por el arquitecto Thom Mayne, que hizo las presentaciones pertinentes en Vigo acompañado por los responsables de Riofisa. Hay que recordar que Thom Mayne fue una apuesta decidida del propio alcalde, dispuesto a involucrar a grandes nombres de la arquitectura en los proyectos para la ciudad, que siguen todavía sin ver la
luz. Junto a Thom Mayne, quien ya anunció que su estación sería algo más que un simple complejo comercial y que daría a Vigo un espacio espectacular de ocio, Caballero ha barajado otros importantes nombres como Nouvel, escogido para una transformación portuaria que finalmente ha sido descartada, o Rafael Moneo, quien también llegó a presentar ante un nutrido grupo de personalidades viguesas su visión de una nueva Praza do Rei. De momento, esos proyectos están bloqueados, incluido el de la nueva estación, ya que tendrá que ser la nueva empresa adjudicataria quien decida si se queda con el diseño de Thom Mayne o por el contrario renuncia a este proyecto por otro. La búsqueda de socios por parte de Adif se extiende al resto de proyectos pendientes a nivel nacional, y que han quedado de momento en el aire tras la ruptura con su socio y colaborador actual. La licitación del Ministerio es el primer paso para encontrar inversor privado.

description.hltext_display: Crece 5.1% el personal de la industria manufacturera
description.content:
Organización Editorial Mexicana
Dolores Acosta / El Sol de México
Ciudad de México.- El personal ocupado en la industria manufacturera de transformación creció 5.1 por ciento, en octubre respecto al mismo mes de 2009, informó el Instituto Nacional de Estadística y Geografía (INEGI).
Por tipo de contratación, los obreros registraron un aumento de 6.5 por ciento y los empleados que realizan labores administrativas de 1.5 por ciento a tasa anual.
Por actividad económica, según el Sistema de Clasificación Industrial de América del Norte, el empleo en el sector manufacturero de transformación se incrementó en los subsectores de fabricación de equipo de transporte con un alza de 15.7 por ciento; maquinaria y equipo 12.8 por ciento; productos derivados del petróleo y del carbón 9.3 por ciento, y en el de la Industria del plástico y del hule con 9.1 por ciento.

description.hltext_display: Bomb threat in Maplewood shuts down NJ Transit service
description.content:
Published: Tuesday, December 21, 2010, 9:25 PM Updated: Tuesday, December 21, 2010, 10:51 PM By Follow Tweet Share 4 Share close Google Buzz Digg Stumble Upon Fark Share Email Print Google MapsMap view of Valley Street in Maplewood, where reported police activity shut down NJ Transit passing by for more than an hour. MAPLEWOOD A bomb threat at a residential unit along the Morris/Essex commuter rail line in Maplewood led to the shutdown of train traffic in both directions for more than an hour and the evacuation of a small number of residents, officials said.
The threat was called in to a multi-family dwelling on the north side of Valley Street at approximately 6:45 p.m. today, said Sgt. Craig Lahey, a Maplewood Police Department spokesman.
No bomb was found, and a small number of residents that had been evacuated were allowed back into the building at about 9:30 p.m., Lahey said.
The Essex County bomb squad and bomb technicians from the FBI responded to the scene, Lahey said.
The incident caused rail traffic to be halted beginning at 7:34 p.m., NJ Transit spokesman Dan Stessel said. A total of eleven trains between Maplewood and South Orange were held up, including express service to New York City.
Rail service resumed at 9 p.m., Stessel said.
The incident remains under investigation, Lahey said.

description.hltext_display: Дело об избиении Киркоровым режиссера закрыто
Asylum boat orphan relatives land in Australia (AFP)
description.content:
SYDNEY (AFP) Australian officials on Wednesday said they had found two aunts of a young refugee orphaned in last week's asylum boat sinking on later people-smuggling boats and arrangements were underway for a reunion.
The child, believed to be an Iranian boy aged about eight, was among three who lost both parents in last Wednesday's horrific boat smash off remote Christmas Island, killing an estimated 48 of the 90 refugees on board.
He was made a ward of Immigration Minister Chris Bowen after his status as an unaccompanied minor was established, but a department spokesman said two of his aunts had since been discovered on boats which arrived in the past week. "Now that we've identified family that he does have, two aunts who were aboard a vessel that subsequently has come in to Christmas Island, we'll work with psychologists now to facilitate a reunion," the spokesman told ABC radio. "That will be as advised by the psychologists when it is most appropriate." All three orphans were being kept in a low-security facility on Christmas Island -- home to Australia's main immigration detention centre -- with family members and social workers while officials assessed their plight.
Prime Minister Julia Gillard has said minors and families from the shipwreck will live in the community under a new policy announced in October in a bid to ease severe overcrowding in Australia's detention centres.
Three boats have been intercepted off Australia since last week's disaster, carrying more than 150 asylum seekers.
More than 6,500 people, mostly Iraqis, Afghans and Sri Lankans, have tried to reach Australia this year on rickety boats from Indonesia, prompting debate about Canberra's relaxation of the former conservative government's harsh refugee policies.
