description.hltext_display: Lastbil torpederede hus
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
Beboerne i et hus i Ansager mellem Varde og Ølgod fik sig i morges noget af en ubehagelig opvågning kort før kl. 5:30, skriver jv.dk.
I det glatte føre havde en lastbil torpederet deres hus. Ifølge Syd- og Sønderjyllands Politi er beboerne ikke kommet noget til ved uheldet, men chaufføren af lastbilen er kommet slemt til skade.
Han var ved bevidsthed i minutterne efter ulykken, men da han kom fri fra lastbilen, blev han i ambulance med fuld udrykning kørt til behandling på sygehuset i Esbjerg. Der er sket stor skade på husets ene gavl som følge af påkørslen.

description.hltext_display: DSB: Mange forsinkede tog i dag
description.author: David Andersen
description.content:
Togtrafikken er hårdt ramt af kulde, sne og is. . Omkring Københavns Hovedbanegård kan togene kun køre 20 km/t, hvilket medfører forsinkelser på alle afgange og ankomster.
Men forsinkelserne er ikke kun afgrænset til hovedstadsområdet.
Rejsetidsgarantien gælder stadig
Hele landet er påvirket af vejret, og DSB udelukker ikke, at der vil forekomme aflysninger i løbet af dagen.
Banedanmark oplyser, at mange InterCity og InterCityLyn kører med andre vogne end de plejer på grund af sne og is i koblingerne.
Statsorganet oplyser, at rejsetidsgarantien stadig gælder, og det er derfor en god idé at være , hvis man har bestilt billet.
S-togene i hovedstadsområdet er også ramt af forsinkelser og ændrede køreplaner. .

description.hltext_display: Kæmpebrand på Amager
description.author: Ritzau
description.content:
HJÆLP OS: Ved du noget om branden - tip os på 1224@eb.dk eller SMS/MMS til 1224 (alm. SMS/MMS-takst). HUSK at Ekstra Bladet beskytter sine kilder, hvis de har brug for anonymitet
Fire beboere er kørt på sygehuset til observation for røgforgiftning, men ellers er ingen kommet til skade ved en voldsom brand på Amager tidligt onsdag.
Politiet måtte evakuere 61 mennesker under branden i den fem etager store beboelsesejendom Maltagade 2 og 4, oplyser Københavns Politis centrale vagtleder.
13 af beboerne skal genhuses, efter at hele tagkonstruktionen over nr. 2 og 4 er udbrændt.
Brandårsag endnu ukendt
- Det er naturligvis meget ærgerligt for dem her op til jul. Men heldigvis er ingen kommet alvorligt til skade, siger Københavns Politis centrale vagtleder til ekstrabladet.dk.
Branden er formentligt opstået i øverste etage af Maltagade 2, men af hvilken årsag kan politiet først på fingerpeg om ved de forestående tekniske undersøgelser på stedet.
Der blev slået alarm om branden kl 01.35. Politiet evakuerede alle beboere i fire opgange og rekvirerede en varm bus til dem i den iskolde nat.

description.hltext_display: Desperate times make for remorseful robbers?
description.author: Suzanne Phan
description.content:
More Crime:
SACRAMENTO, CA - Desperate times make for desperate criminals. But two recent cases might have you scratching your head. In one case, a robber apologized for his crime. In another, a knife-wielding cab passenger actually paid for his ride and left a tip.
At the corner of 20th and Q Streets Saturday night, police said a male passenger pulled a knife on a cab driver. The man and driver were arguing over the destination when the man pulled out a knife. The driver took off on foot. The passenger also ran away, but not before leaving the fare and a tip in the car.
"That is actually strange. If if it really happened, it's strange," said Fekadu Siyong, a taxi cab driver parked along L street in front of the Hyatt Hotel, who learned of the news.
On Monday night, a robber held up Fred Lisanti and his grandmother while they were working at the Weimar Country Store.
"I thought it was a joke," said Lisanti. "He had a green bandana over his face with a hat and a beanie. I thought it was a friend playing a prank on me."
Lisanti then realized it was a real holdup. He and his grandmother handed over the money and the suspect apologized to the clerks.
"He said, 'I'm sorry. I don't want to have to do this. I was robbed for Christmas presents.' I opened the door and gave him the money," said Sharon Blackburn, a store clerk.
The suspect took off with the money after he bound the wrists of both clerks with electrical tape.
"He looked really scared and was shaking a lot," said Lisanti.
"On the way out, he dropped the clip to his gun. So his bullets were left here," said Blackburn. "It's sad, very sad that it has to come to this but times are hard and I understand."
Police haven't located the passenger in the taxi cab case nor the robber in the convenience store holdup.
By Suzanne Phan, sphan@news10.net
Twitter: @suzannephan

description.hltext_display: Raptor´s se lleva el título
description.content:
Fundamentalmente en el triunfo de Raptor´s fue el dominio de los tableros. Fotos: Luis Luévanos./El Sol de San Juan del Río.
El Sol de San Juan del Río
Rodolfo valencia
San Juan del Río, Qro.- La quinteta celeste de Raptor´s de Querétaro obtuvo el título de la Categoría Clasificada del I Torneo NA del Circuito Amateur de SJR al vencer en el encuentro final al equipo sanjuanense de Maveric´s por marcador de 88-67.
Un total dominio de la situación tuvo el equipo queretano en esta final, principalmente en el marcador, donde a pesar de que dividieron victorias parciales en los cuatro periodos las mayores ventajas las saco Raptor´s y de ahí que se diera esta coronación, sino en forma fácil si tranquila.
Los Maveric´s dieron la impresión de que entregaron todo lo que tenían en su semifinal, para eliminar al Real Madrid, ya que ahora fueron una auténtica sombra de aquel aguerrido equipo y no tuvieron la menor oportunidad de llevarse la victoria.
Con un mejor empaque de equipo se vio a Raptor´s de Querétaro desde el primer cuarto y a partir de ahí tomó ventaja que ya nunca perdió al imponer marcador parcial de 28-11, para el segundo cuarto más que reacción de Maveric´s fue que Raptor´s entraron en confianza ganando el parcial el equipo sanjuanense por 22-20 y con ello la primera mitad vino a terminar favoreciendo a Raport´s por 48-33.
Para el segundo tiempo Raport´s volvió asumir el dominio del partido y del marcador, para afianzar la ventaja general sumaron otros 25 puntos a su favor, mientras que Maveric´s sumó a su cuenta otros 18 puntos y con ello el marcador general se puso 73-51 a favor de los queretanos.
No se veía por dónde Maveric´s pudiera poner en peligro el triunfo de Raptor´s, a pesar que los queretanos flojearon en el cuarto periodo pero fueron suficientes los 15 puntos encestados y ante esto los 16 puntos conseguidos por Maveric´s sirvieron solamente para adornar mejor su marcador y es que el marcador final favoreció claramente por 88-67 a los Raptor´s de Querétaro y con ello llevarse el título de la Categoría Clasificada Varonil del I Torneo NA del Circuito Amateur de Basketbol de SJR.

article.source: El Sol de San Juan Del Río

description.hltext_display: Deltans Charged to Support Uduaghan
description.content:
Deltans have been urged to rally round, Dr. Emmanuel Uduaghan as he begins the race for the forth-coming governorship re-run election in Delta State.
Mr Paul Adingwupu, an Information and Communication Technology expert, made the call at the launch of a new website, an interactive session with media men and some indigenes of Delta State in Lagos State, weekend.
"The project seeks to highlight the achievements and educate the general public on the monumental stride of Uduaghan's three and half years as Governor," he said.
"In 2007 when Dr. Uduaghan took the mantle of leadership in Delta State, he came with a purpose and determination to make a mark. Unlike his predecessor, Uduaghan's resolve was borne out of the fact that he had functioned first, as a commissioner, then later as a Secretary to Government and Head of Service. In a way, these appointments sufficiently prepared him for positioning the state as a hub of development in the South South region of Nigeria," he said.
He praised Uduaghan for his purposeful leadership which took the state to greater height. "Like an actor in an ancient Greek drama, he went straight to the challenge of transforming Delta for the good of all.
There is therefore, no gain saying the fact that his works are undisputed testimonials in the over three years that he held sway as Governor. And his achievements are verifiable as they speak for themselves."
"There is hardly any area that Uduaghan left unaddressed. From health, public transportation, aviation, the environment and empowerment to security, peace, infrastructural development, information technology, education, agriculture and industrial revolution, Uduaghan acquitted himself as a seasoned administrator and lover of his people," he added.
This much is available for public scrutiny and verification on www.realuduaghan.com. Even his worst critics can attest to the quantum leap in development and social services that marked his tenure", he said.

Det vil vi - og andre læsere - gerne høre om.
Brug chatten herover til at fortælle om temperaturer, vejret og ikke mindst trafikken, hvor du er.
Spørg gerne andre læsere om råd, inden du tager ud i trafikken. Måske bor der nogen, hvor du er på vej hen til jul. - og se webcams fra

description.hltext_display: Gifter sig med 29 år yngre kvinde
description.author: Sola Kruchov Sørensen
description.content:
Det kunne meget passende være Lorenzo Lamas' datter, der bliver brudepige, når den tidligere 'Falcon Crest'-stjerne til april måned næste år skal giftes med 23-årige Shawna Craig.
Knap så passende er det måske, at Lorenzos datter, Shayne Lamas, rent faktisk er et år yngre end farmands forlovede.
Meget, meget specielt bryllup
Det umage par skal giftes den 30. april næste år i Mexico.
- Det bliver fantastisk. Vi har fundet et smukt hotel i Cabo, og vi er ved at aftale noget med hoteldirektøren for at gøre det meget, meget specielt, siger Lorenzo Lamas til UsMagazine.com.
- Det bliver småt - vi inviterer ikke mange mennesker. Det bliver bare familie og venner, uddyber han.
Det er Lorenzos femte ægteskab. Senest var han gift med Playboy-modellen Shauna Sand. Det ægteskab sluttede i 2002. LÆS OGSÅ:

description.hltext_display: Tax concessions for Vietnam shipbuilder Vinashin (AFP)
description.content:
HANOI (AFP) Vietnam has granted tax concessions to nearly-bankrupt shipbuilder Vinashin, a newspaper reported Wednesday, after speculation authorities would find a way to help the firm meet a debt deadline.
Among the concessions, the state-owned firm will get a grace period until December 31, 2011 for paying its taxes, Tuoi Tre reported, citing the Ministry of Finance.
State-linked Tuoi Tre did not give the amount of tax involved or the period it was due for.
The one-year delay coincides with a 12-month deferral Vinashin had reportedly sought for repayment of its international debts.
Vinashin (Vietnam Shipbuilding Industry Group) was due to pay on December 20 the initial 60 million dollar instalment on a 600 million dollar loan arranged by Credit Suisse in 2007.
Company chairman Nguyen Ngoc Su was quoted in official media on Monday as saying the firm had no way to immediately make the payment and was "still waiting for the final answer" on its deferral request.
Vinashin officials and creditors have refused comment to AFP.
The government has said Vinashin must settle its own debts -- which total at least 86 trillion dong (4.4 billion dollars).
Despite those comments, speculation has grown that the government would step in to help Vinashin.
One foreign analyst said Wednesday that he thought the tax concessions were the government's way of indirectly bailing out the firm. "I don't see any other explanation other than helping Vinashin," said the analyst, declining to be named.
With the tax concessions, "the money flows (that) you have in the meantime you can use for other things," he said. The Tuoi Tre report listed four separate tax concession measures, including a deferral of taxes on imported equipment, and the general one-year grace period.
Vinashin expects to secure capital to repay creditors through a restructuring of the group but this takes times, Su was quoted as saying in Monday's official media report.
Global ratings agency Moody's last week downgraded Vietnam's government bond rating to B1 -- an undesirable investment -- from Ba3 because of Vinashin's debts as well as other economic factors.

description.hltext_display: 为讨公道8次赴华府 墨西哥湾遇难者家属执着索赔
description.content:
据美国媒体近日报道，英国石油公司(BP)租赁的钻井平台“深水地平线”号今年4月发生剧烈爆炸，大量原油泄漏，给墨西哥湾的生态系统造成灭顶之灾。美国政府已起诉BP，并提出巨额索赔。
事故发生后，媒体的报道多集中在生态灾难和堵漏方式上，在爆炸中丧生的11名工人却少有人关注。根据相关法律，在海上遇难的石油工人，其家人很难获得陆上遇难者那样的赔偿。这种双重赔偿标准，就是遇难工人戈登・琼斯的父亲基斯・琼斯奔走呼号的原因。
1.“我已掌握了不愿知道的情况”
今年4月20日，在“深水地平线”号钻井平台爆炸前，泥浆如火山爆发一般喷涌而出，钻井开始剧烈晃动。负责安全监控的工作人员安德鲁・弗雷特斯发现控制台上的10多个红灯亮了起来，这表示最危险的时刻已经来临。 弗雷特斯接受过培训，知道该如何应对数盏指示灯亮起的情况。可这么多指示灯同时亮起的情况她从没见过，更别说应对了。
怔了一会儿，弗雷特斯才反应过来，连忙按下警报。在英国石油公司(BP)的大事记中，费雷特斯“犹豫”了一两分钟。
很快，震耳欲聋的大爆炸发生了，“深水地平线”钻井平台被彻底毁坏。几分钟内，钻井平台上一片混乱。当时共有126人在平台上，由于电力中断，火势迅速蔓延，工人在惊恐万分中跳进了漆黑的被原油覆盖的大海。船长柯特・库赫达和其他10名管理人员及员工，一起蜷缩在船桥上。
有11名工人在爆炸中丧生，其中包括28岁的戈登・琼斯。
“在一两分钟内，一个人可以走比较长的一段路了。”戈登的父亲基斯・琼斯说，“如果她(弗雷特斯)能早点儿反应，或许大家都会得救。”
不过基斯知道，“如果”从来不会成为现实。实际上他并没有责怪弗雷特斯的意思，他只想知道自己的儿子是怎么死的。在过去的几个月里，59岁的基斯一直在调查这件事。作为一名人身伤害索赔律师，他也是那些在此次事件中丧生的工人家人的主心骨，尽管他在海商法方面并没有什么经验。
“我不清楚遇难者的父母到底想知道哪些事情，不想知道哪些事情，”基斯说，“不过我已经掌握了我不愿知道的情况。”
2.现行海商法不保护工人权益
着手调查后，基斯仔细阅读了海商法，让他震惊的是，那些“已经老朽的法律条文只对石油公司有利”。“根据那些法律，在海上遇难的工人家庭将难以获得陆上遇难者那样的赔偿。”基斯说。他举了个例子：2005年，BP在美国得克萨斯州得克萨斯市发生了一次爆炸事故，15名工人在事故中丧生，170人受伤。BP前前后后共花了16亿美元。“但根据1920年制定的海商法，像戈登・琼斯这种在公海上遇难的石油工人，他们的家属虽可领取石油公司支付的赔偿，但数额比得州那次事故的赔付标准要低。”基斯说。
基斯还谈到了在此次事故中丧生的24岁钻工亚当・维泽，由于他没有结婚，也没有孩子，因此他的家人领取到的赔偿可能更低，其中丧葬费就要比别的遇难者少很多，因为他的尸体至今没有找到，下葬事宜也就无从谈起。
“这种法律规定是不公平的。”新奥尔良市海商法律师詹姆斯・科布说。
“深水地平线”钻井平台是BP从瑞士越洋钻探公司租来的。事发后，BP公司的律师在休斯顿的联邦法庭上，引用具有159年历史的“责任限制法案”，请求最多赔付2670万美元。基斯认为这一请求是“异想天开”。
这个案子让基斯成了一名不折不扣的争取权益的活动家。
为了讨回公道，他和几名遇难者的家人一起，出席众议院司法委员会的听证会，并给100多名立法者打电话，试图说服他们修改法律。此外，他还频频接受媒体采访，谈他对现行法律的看法。
“BP公司所能做的，就是不要想着走捷径。他们应该(向遇难者家属)赔付必须赔付的钱。”基斯说。
3.为修改法律8次赶赴华盛顿
在基斯等遇难者家属的努力下，美国众议院司法委员会主席、密歇根州民主党议员约翰・科尼尔斯提出议案，对两项已有数十年历史的法律进行修改，并要求废除1851年制定的“责任限制法案”。
不过，此次法律修改遇到了重重阻力――渔业公司、邮轮业和其他一些船运公司都对这一修改议论纷纷，认为改动太大。因此虽然在7月初众议院就通过了这一议案，提交到参议院那里却没获得通过。
随着时间的流逝，遇难者家属的心情越来越焦躁。作为其中的一员，基斯感同身受。为了给大家讨回公道，他已经8次赶赴华盛顿，将家属的呼声想方设法传递给参议员。基斯的行为引起了参议院司法委员会主席帕特里克・利希的重视，利希和参议院商务委员会主席杰伊・洛克菲勒一起重新审议了此提案，使其适用范围仅限于“深水地平线”遇难者家属。但即使如此，该提案还是没有通过。
屡遭失败，让基斯不免有些失望，不过他不是一个轻易被打倒的人。“我决不放弃，法律就应该公平。如果这次我们不努力，以后再发生此类事情该怎么办？”基斯说。
4.出事前，他说钻井平台“不正常”
戈登・琼斯是基斯的小儿子，从外表上看，父子俩简直是一个模子里刻出来的。戈登是3个孩子中和父亲基斯关系最亲近的。几年前，当基斯与前妻――3个孩子的母亲离婚再娶后，只有戈登参加了父亲的婚礼。
说起来，戈登加入石油行业纯属偶然。在路易斯安那州立大学读书时，戈登就展现了良好的口才，可他并不想以后像父亲那样当律师。大学毕业后，戈登干了一段时间的保险推销员。这是一份让戈登厌恶无比的工作。后来一个朋友建议他试着去推销钻井设备，因为“那个行业比较赚钱”。戈登听从了建议，报名参加了半年的培训，然后开始了推销工作。后来他又改了行，成为一名泥浆工程师。
两年前，戈登和“深水地平线”钻井平台签下了工作合同，开始在上面工作。很显然，这份工作很合他的心意，因为他经常向朋友谈起在平台上的工作，说“深水地平线”是一座“艺术的殿堂”、在所有钻井平台中有着“无与伦比的地位”，他们钻探的马康多油井是墨西哥湾最深的油井。他还用电子邮件给家人发回各种少见的海洋鱼类的照片。
不过当休假回家时，戈登很少和父亲谈论在井上工作的情况。他俩谈论最多的是橄榄球，他们分别支持不同的球队，经常为此争得面红耳赤。
只是有一次，戈登和父亲谈起了钻井的情况，并隐约透露了钻井平台“有点儿不正常”。
“戈登在家从不和我谈论他的工作，可那次他却对我说了很多钻井平台的事情，并说‘记住我跟你说的话’。”基斯说。
5.宝贵的10分钟，“我希望他选择逃跑”
走访了多名幸存者之后，基斯了解到，出事那天，儿子戈登本来应该晚点儿上班，那样他就会躲过爆炸。可不知为什么，他提前与另一名泥浆工程师换了班，因此不幸在爆炸中遇难。
在BP公司的大事记中，从最初的泥浆喷涌到爆炸发生大约10分钟。如果戈登他们能利用这10分钟逃生，还是有很大希望活下来的。
基斯说：“知道这些事后，我更加难过，可这又是我必须知道的。这10分钟对戈登和其他10名死者来说是极其宝贵的。他们没有用来逃命，而是去救火，尽最大可能去拯救BP的油井。我不知道他当时是怎么想的。如果事情能够重新来过，我希望他能选择逃跑。”
戈登死后，留下了怀孕8个月的妻子和两岁的儿子斯塔福德。他死后不到一个月，小儿子马克斯诞生了。如果争取不到相应的赔偿，孤儿寡母的日子必定很难过。因此基斯不辞劳苦地奔波，除了想为儿子讨个公道外，也是在为两个孙子的今后做打算。基斯说：“争取多一点的赔偿，他们今后的生活才会少一些困难。”(本报特约记者 晓露)

description.hltext_display: Grainger Sells Highsmith Brand - Analyst Blog
description.content:
W.W. Grainger Inc. (GWW) has announced that it is divesting all of the assets of library supplies provider Highsmith to Madison, WI-based library supplier DEMCO Inc. for an undisclosed amount.
The Highsmith brand was a part of Grainger’s U.S. Specialty Brands portfolio. Grainger's Specialty Brands provide targeted customer segments with products and services specific to their work or industries.
The company is undergoing a strategic review of the U.S. Specialty Brands portfolio, and in addition to Highsmith, Grainger is contemplating the possible divestiture of four additional brands viz. Professional Equipment, Construction Book Express, McFeely's and Rand.
The brands under contention along with Highsmith contribute a mere 1% of total Grainger revenue. Grainger plans to invest in the remaining Specialty Brands portfolio including: Lab Safety Supply, Imperial, Gempler's, Ben Meadows and AW Direct, and explore strategic acquisitions to grow the portfolio.
Highsmith, a direct marketing leader in the library equipment, furniture and supplies market, has been part of Grainger for two years. It was acquired by Grainger in July 2008 for $27.5 million in cash and $6.1 million in assumed liabilities. Highsmith had generated sales of $64 million in 2007.
The divestiture will not have a material impact on Grainger’s revenues and instead will help it focus on maintaining specialized brands in growing markets that are strategic to its core offering and leverage Grainger's distribution capabilities.
Grainger recently reported November sales growth of 14% year over year. Thus far, in December 2010, the company stated that the daily year-over-year percentage growth is tracking consistently with the 14% growth rate recorded in November with a higher mix of sales for products related to the oil spill clean-up than observed in November.
For the fiscal fourth quarter, the company expects EPS in a band $1.49 to $1.69. Grainger forecasts fiscal 2010 EPS in the range of $6.50 to $6.70 and for 2011 in the range of $7.15 to $7.90. The Zacks Consensus Estimates for the fourth quarter, fiscal 2010 and fiscal 2011 currently stand at $1.65, $6.66 and $7.66, respectively, all within the company’s targeted ranges.
Grainger remains focused on expanding its product offering and has the financial wherewithal to further invest in growth opportunities, increase dividends and reinvest capital through share repurchases. Gradually improving economic activity, market share gains, benefits from growth investments, share repurchases and acquisition accretion should lead to strong earnings growth in 2010 and 2011. We maintain an Outperform rating on the stock. The company retains a Zacks #3 Rank (short-term Hold recommendation) on the stock.
Based in Lake Forest, Illinois, Grainger is a distributor of facilities maintenance and other related products and services. The company distributes material handling equipment, safety and security supplies, lighting and electrical products, power and hand tools, pumps and plumbing supplies, cleaning and maintenance supplies, forestry and agriculture equipment, building and home inspection supplies, vehicle and fleet components, and various aftermarket components. Grainger competes with Applied Industrial Technologies Inc. (AIT) and WESCO International Inc. (WCC).

description.hltext_display: Spero Strategies Picks Adapt360 to Develop a Military-Themed, Goal Setting App for the iPhone
description.content:
Spero Strategies LLC selects Adapt360 to develop its new iPhone application. This military-themed app will help users achieve personal and career goals. Adapt360 will complete the design, development and publication within seven weeks.
Orange County, CA (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Spero Strategies' new iPhone app is based on a military theme using founder Ken Gryske’s experience as a Blackhawk pilot. Simply put, the application helps users set and achieve personal and career goals. Adapt360’s mobile app development team will initially launch the app for the iPhone, but Android, Blackberry and other smartphone platforms may follow. Adapt360’s iPhone app developers will complete the project within a 7-week timeframe.
This app will guide the user through Spero’s 4-step process: (1) Record a goal (2) Outline a step-by-step action plan (3) Set timelines (4) Communicate with a "Wingman"
The user first enters a personal or business-oriented goal and due date. The app then walks the user through the steps and due dates necessary to achieve the goal. As an example, the app would read: “To accomplish this goal, perform Step #1 by Date #1, then perform Steps 2, 3 and 4, respectively."
The user also inputs the email address and name of a "Wingman” tasked with keeping the user on track. Throughout the goal-achievement process, the Wingman is kept abreast of the user’s progress toward the goal, and made aware of any setbacks.
“We’re excited about the improvement this app can make in people’s lives,” said Ken Gryske. “The app actually walks people through the same set of steps that are identified in my book… making the book much more meaningful, and helping users stay on track to meet their goals.”
The project began in mid-December and has a February release date. The app must be scoped out, developed, tested, and approved by Apple all within 7 weeks. Adapt360 has the resources to expedite the mobile application development cycle and meet Spero’s deadline. Gryske adds, “I’m very impressed with Paul’s team and their ability to make my project happen on such a compressed time table. Adapt360 employs the kind of people I like to work with: Experts who are Mission Driven.”
“Spero’s goal setting app is a fun project,” said Paul Smith, President of Adapt360. “This is an app I’ll definitely use. In fact, my family is having a weight loss competition in 2011. I’ll be using the app to stay on course. With my wife as my ‘Wingman’, I’m sure to win.”
About Adapt360 Adapt360 is a web programming and mobile/iPhone app development company serving corporate clients nationwide, with emphasis on Southern California. Projects typically include custom web applications, mobile/smartphone apps, database development/migration and custom e-commerce solutions. Web-based projects involve ASP.Net, PHP and Java programming with MySQL, MsSQL and PostGreSql databases. Mobile App development projects ( http://www.adapt360.com/services/development/mobile-apps ) include iPad, iPhone, Blackberry and Android application development. Expertise includes custom Enterprise Solutions (ERP), Content Management (CMS), Customer Relationship (CRM), Point of Sale, eCommerce/Online Shopping, Inventory Management Systems and Mobile Apps all working together.
About Spero Strategies Spero Strategies llc was founded by Ken Gryske to help people find better jobs faster. Spero Strategies helps individuals and organizations unlock their Purpose, Vision, and Mission - Giving them a tangible and lasting competitive advantage. Ken is a Board member and Marketing & Communications Committee Chair for Professional Coaches, Mentors & Advisors and a member of International Coaches Federation, Orange County Chapter. He also serves on the Board of Directors for Community Health Charities of Arizona.
Press – http://www.adapt360.com
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebiphone-app/developers/prweb8031344.htm

description.content: The Senate is poised to approve a nuclear arms pact with Russia, handing President Barack Obama a huge victory on his top foreign policy priority.

description.hltext_display: La Secretaría de Economía (SE) entregará créditos especiales a las empresas afectadas por el estallido de un ducto de petróleo en San Martín Texmelucan.
description.content:
Ciudad de México.- La Secretaría de Economía (SE) entregará créditos especiales a las empresas afectadas por el estallido de un ducto de petróleo en San Martín Texmelucan, Puebla, como parte de las acciones para reactivar la economía en la región.
En ese sentido, el titular de la institución, Bruno Ferrari, informó que el Gobierno federal y las autoridades de Puebla levantarán un censo para identificar el número de empresas y magnitud de los daños para definir el monto de los recursos que se entregarán.
El funcionario dijo que el mecanismo para entregar los recursos será similar al implementado en catástrofes anteriores, como los ocasionados por huracanes e inundaciones en Tabasco, Nuevo León y Veracruz.
"Desde el primer momento estamos en coordinación con la Secretaría de Gobernación y ver, en el caso de las microempresas, pequeñas y medianas que hayan sufrido algún daño, y nosotros, como en otros casos de la República, vamos a poner de manera inmediata recursos para que no se detenga la actividad empresarial", comentó.
Bruno Ferrari, quien fue consultado en el marco de una gira de trabajo para verificar precios e instrumentos de peso en diversos establecimientos comerciales, agregó que los créditos serán para reparar maquinaria o equipo de las empresas o reconstrucción total del negocio.
En cuanto a los plazos y tasas de interés del crédito, el funcionario señaló que esos aspectos aún no se definen, aunque aseguró que los apoyos estarán listos en cuanto esté disponible el censo de las empresas afectadas.
"El monto que se otorgue no es de acuerdo a lo que tenemos sino a lo que se necesite; el censo se está procediendo de inmediato y se tiene que cotejar con el que están haciendo las autoridades locales", afirmó.
Fue el pasado domingo cuando se registró un incendio en un ducto en San Martín Texmelucan, Puebla, presumiblemente ocasionado por una toma clandestina y que ha dejado un saldo preliminar de 29 muertos, 32 casas y decenas de negocios afectados.

description.hltext_display: Taber-Thomas: Minus 28 kilo
description.author: Sola Kruchov Sørensen
description.content:
Entertaineren Thomas Eje må siges at være en af årets helt store tabere - på den imponerende måde.
Linie 3-manden har smidt hele 28 kilo på et år ved hjælp af kostomlægning.
Eje har været på diæt og har levet af konens kaloriefattige mad. Han har talt kalorier max 1.700 kalorier dagligt, lyder hans opskrift.
- Anskaf en køkkenvægt og læs på indpakningen, hvor mange kalorier fødevaren indeholder pr. 100 gram. Det er egentlig ret simpelt, når først man vænner sig til det, siger den 53-årige Thomas Eje til denne uges Se og Hør.

description.hltext_display: Japan's export growth sees boost in November (AFP)
description.content:
TOKYO (AFP) Japan's export growth accelerated for the first time in nine months in November, data showed Wednesday, but the reading came in short of expectations amid fears of a looming economic slowdown.
Exports in November rose 9.1 percent to 5.44 trillion yen on year, the 12th straight monthly increase, with strong overseas demand, particularly for Japanese steel and metal working machinery, the ministry said.
The growth rate rose for the first time since February, when exports grew 45.3 percent. The rate had dropped to 7.8 percent in October.
However, the November figure missed expectations for a 10.8 percent rise in a poll of economists by Dow Jones Newswires.
Analysts said the Japanese economy remains locked in a trend of shrinking exports due to a stronger yen, which makes Japanese products more expensive in overseas markets, and expectations that overseas demand will weaken. "Japan's exports are slowing, a trend that remains the same," said Taro Saito, senior economist at NLI Research Institute. "The economy continues to be pressured by the higher yen, although the strength of the currency is becoming moderate," he said. The unit has been relatively stable in recent weeks after hitting a 15-year high of 80.21 against the dollar in November, giving some respite to the export sector and easing pressure on the economy.
But it has stayed at a relatively high level, at 83.82 to the dollar in Wednesday trade.
On Tuesday the Bank of Japan held its key rate at between zero and 0.1 percent after a two-day meeting, warning that a fragile recovery from deep recession was "pausing". Economic growth in the July-September quarter was earlier this month revised up to an annualised 4.5 percent thanks to a rush to beat expiring government incentives, but expectations are for a contraction in the fourth quarter.
Japan last month passed an extra budget worth 58 billion dollars to cover a new stimulus package aimed at averting the threat of a "double-dip" recession. Prime Minister Naoto Kan's second stimulus package since he came to power is designed to ease concerns over deflation and a strong yen, and includes job programmes, welfare spending and assistance for small businesses.
Kan took office in June promising to slash spending and work towards cutting the country's massive public debt, accounting for nearly 200 percent of gross domestic product.
But the state of Japan's economy has complicated his ambitions. In November, Japan's exports to China jumped 18.3 percent while those to the United States rose 1.2 percent.
Exports to Europe expanded 10.1 percent, the first rise in two months, data showed. Japan's imports in November also jumped 14.2 percent to 5.28 trillion yen, the 11th consecutive rise, driven higher by demand for iron ore as well as audio and visual devices.
The larger imports almost halved the country's trade surplus in the month from a year earlier, marking the first decline in three months, the finance ministry said.
The overall surplus stood at 162.8 billion yen (1.94 billion dollars), 55.4 percent smaller than a year earlier, the ministry said, much lower than the market forecast of 446 billion yen.

event_or_fact.property: The economy continues to be pressured by the higher yen, although the strength of the currency is becoming moderate
Japan's exports are slowing, a trend that remains the same

description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
（12月22日）上证综指报收2877.90点，下跌0.90%，沪市成交1260.67亿元；深成指报收12766.95点，下跌0.82%，深市成交1117.28亿元。两市成交量持续下降。
从资金流量角度看，12月22日，沪深两市共流出资金135.78亿元，资金结束昨日的流入状态，转而流出。其中，沪市净流出66.43亿元，深市净流出69.35亿元。主力资金合计流出35.02亿元。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ 指数方面，上证180指数成份股合计资金流出18.06亿元，深证成指成份股资金流出7.73亿元，沪深300指数成份股资金流出37.12亿元。以股本规模计，流通盘中大盘股资金流出27.06亿元，中盘股资金流出32.99亿元，小盘股资金流出75.74亿元。
资金流量方面，今日有2个行业资金净流入，23个行业资金净流出。其中，黑色金属流入资金3.47亿，成为资金最关注的行业；机械设备流出资金21.67亿，有较明显的资金出逃现象。 黑色金属业已持续2个交易日净流入资金，共流入资金13.15亿，居今日行业连续流入天数榜首位。医药生物业已持续7个交易日净流出资金，共流出资金76.97亿，为今日行业连续流出天数榜第一。
盘江股份已持续9个交易日净流入资金，累计流入资金4.03亿，居今日个股连续流入天数榜首位。华海药业(600521,股吧)已持续23个交易日净流出资金，累计流出资金5.39亿，为今日个股连续流出天数榜第一。
股指期货方面，今日IF1101合约收报3243.60点，下跌1.46%；成交17.68万手，持仓量减2055手，收报2.27万手；资金共流出46.31亿。
更多数据，请见：http://data.stcn.com/statisticalData.shtml
（李勇）

description.hltext_display: vegetar over 50 år
description.author: Pernille Christensen
description.content:
2010 er ved at rinde ud og traditionen tro, skal der uddeles at hav er priser. Årets smukkeste model, årets babe, årets hotteste skuespiller, årets lækreste sangerinde og så videre og så videre skal kåres. Og nu er vinderen af prisen som årets mest sexede vegetar minsandten også fundet.
Valget er faldet på den 59-årige tidligere playboy-model Lillian Müller.
I over halvdelen af sit liv har hun levet som veganer og det er så rørende, mener dyreværnsorganisationen PETA, at de har valgt at belønne den norskfødte Müller med prisen.
Større end Miss Universe
- For mig står denne konkurrence i højere kurs end Miss Universe. Jeg har været veganer i over 32 år og har samtidig kæmpet for dyrenes rettigheder. Derfor er det godt at få bekræftet, at jeg har gjort noget rigtigt, siger hun ifølge den norske avis VG.
59-årige Lillian Müller bor i dag i Los Angeles med sin mand, der er fotograf.
- Siden jeg var 27 år, har jeg kun spist plantebaseret kost, og det har givet gode resultater. Det virker ikke som alderen bider på mig, og jeg håber, at jeg kan være et forbillede for andre kvinder. Man kan nemlig sagtens være sexet selvom man snart er 60 år, lyder det fra den grønt-spisende model.

description.hltext_display: Wildcats stave off challenge
description.content:
- By DREW PELLMAN, Sentinel sports reporter, dpellman@lewistownsentinel.com
Save |
MILLERSTOWN - After Tuesday's Tri-Valley League girls basketball game between regional rivals ended in just 67 combined points, both coaches claimed that their teams didn't have the best of nights.
But when the dust settled after four quarters in Millerstown, it was the team wearing home white that kept its record perfect at 5-0 as Greenwood held on for a 38-29 victory over East Juniata.
The Wildcats had the Juniata County squad doubled up at 34-17 moments into the final frame, but the Tigers battled back with 12 of the next 14 points - all coming from beyond the arc - to draw within seven with more than two minutes still to play. Greenwood didn't allow them to get any closer, but the subpar second half certainly will give coach T.J. Weller something to talk about as his team heads into its Christmas tournament games at Bermudian Springs High School.
"When they hit three threes in a row, I didn't think we were going to lose it, but at the same time that shouldn't be happening - not if we're going to try be at the top of our district and head into states," Weller said. "But I think we are also inexperienced right now with Maria (Rumberger) coming back (after a season lost last year due to injury). Bayley (Vohs) is a first-year starter and Kiana (Stephens) is a first-year starter even though she got a lot of time last year."
Tiger coach Travis Quici was pleased that his team fought back from a big deficit, but was disappointed at the same time with the number of turnovers that got the Tigers in a tough spot.
"We gave them a great run - I think we hit four threes in five possessions there. Anytime you have those threes it can be a great neutralizer," he said. "But we lost that game for ourselves tonight. Greenwood, don't get me wrong because they're a great team, but that's what it comes down to when you turn the ball over as many times as we did in the first half."
McKenzie Truitt opened the game with a three-ball for East Juniata, but Greenwood scored the next eight before the Tigers scored again. Autumn Pellman registered her first four of the game and Rumberger hit from downtown as the Wildcats completed the first with a 11-5 advantage.
It was about to get worse before it got better for East Juniata as the Tigers managed only one more field goal before the break - a bucket by Leah Jones. Pellman, however, went back to work and tallied six more in the second quarter, in addition to a three from Salene Shaffer and one score from Stephens. With Greenwood's second 11-point quarter, the Perry County school held a comfortble 22-8 lead when both teams hit the locker room for halftime.
East Juniata needed a complete reversal in the third quarter to even get back within striking distance and it got just that. This time, it was Greenwood that was held to a single field goal in a quarter while East Juniata put up nine points behind single buckets from Truitt, Jones, Katie Eichman and Miranda Sheaffer.
Still up by 10 at 27-17 as the final period got under way, Greenwood quickly extended the lead to its highest point of 17 before East Juniata fought back late in the quarter. Pellman capped off her night with six more points for a game-high 18 and Shaffer went 3-for-4 from the stripe down the stretch to secure the win. The fourth was Greenwood's third 11-point quarter of the night.
East Juniata (3-3) is back in action on Monday and Tuesday when it hosts the annual Juniata County Christmas tournament. The Tigers will battle Belleville Mennonite in first-round play at 7 p.m. Juniata and Bible Baptist will play in the other contest at 4 p.m.
Greenwood opens the Bermudian Springs tournament on Tuesday at 6:30 p.m. against Boiling Springs. The host Eagles with play Camp Hill in their semifinal.

description.hltext_display: 印度成功试射2枚可携带核弹头的短程弹道导弹
description.content:
中新网12月22日电 据外电报道，印度国防部官员说，印度军方12月22日成功试射了2枚可携带核弹头的短程导弹。
报道称，作为“例行训练”的内容，印度军方当天在该国东部奥里萨邦钱迪普尔(Chandipur-on-sea)综合试验场成功试射两枚国产的“大地”-2(Prithvi II)地对地短程导弹。
这一导弹的射程在350公里左右，既可携带核弹头，也可以携带常规弹头。
报道指出，今年9月24日，印度在同一试验场进行了“大地”-2型战术弹道导弹的试射，但试射因“技术问题”宣告失败。 不过，由于此次试射成功，印度媒体援引国防研究与发展组织官员的话说，“‘大地’-2型导弹在此前的多次试射中证明了其精准性和功能的健全”。

description.hltext_display: 新外援难登场原� 揭秘 专家解火箭内线最佳搭配
description.content:
搜狐体育讯 北京时间12月22日凌晨，《休斯顿纪事报》专栏作家乔纳森-费根在线与球迷展开互动，重点回答了关于火箭队的一些焦点问题：
问：在你看来，以下哪个阵容调整会对火箭队更有利？让布鲁克斯打先发还是替补？特伦斯－威廉姆斯或巴丁格谁应该更多担任替补小前？让身高更高的球员（希尔或米勒）担任先发中锋还是继续让海耶斯担任先发中锋？
费根：如果单论个人球员综合能力，可能有的现在打替补的球员要比打先发的球员强，但是只有火箭队的各个球员在一起能够产生更好化学反应的组合才是更好的组合。乔丹－希尔在与米勒联手时会打得更好一些，因为米勒能够帮助他落到合适的位置并且给他传球，他们两个人一个在低位一个在高位配合得不错。海耶斯和斯科拉之间的配合则会更好一些，因为海耶斯在低位的能力不错，虽然他不是一名个子够高的中锋。至于火箭队现在的两名控卫，我觉得他们两个人都可以和第一阵容或第二阵容配合，但是我更支持目前正在运作的模式，那就是让洛瑞打先发，布鲁克斯打替补。
问：特伦斯－威廉姆斯是不是和球队或教练之间有什么矛盾？我们什么时候可以看到他出场打比赛？
费根：他与球队和教练之间有矛盾的故事发生在他被交易至火箭队之前，此前火箭总经理莫雷已经说了既往不咎了。不过，在威廉姆斯被交易到火箭队之后，火箭队一直赢球，所以火箭队在调整人员轮换方面会比较谨慎。正如火箭队在宣布交易引进威廉姆斯那天说的，他在训练当中表现不错之后会赢得出场比赛时间的。
问：火箭队现在的更衣室氛围是不是联盟当中最好的？特伦斯－威廉姆斯的到来会不会埋下不定时炸弹？
费根：我不能说火箭队的更衣室氛围是联盟最好的，但是我感觉火箭队现在的整体氛围的确非常不错。
问：如果洛瑞继续保持目前不错的投篮手感，那他是不是会一直担任先发控卫？关于特伦斯－威廉姆斯有没有最新消息，他是否会有机会出场比赛？
费根：洛瑞最近的确打得非常不错，看上去在他继续保持这样不错状态的情况下，阿德尔曼主教练是不会忍心破坏目前这个氛围的。威廉姆斯还得需要通过训练证明自己，然后才有可能获得出场比赛时间。
问：火箭队现在有没有在考虑通过交易引进中锋球员，以帮助他们进一步冲击季后赛呢？
费根：他们现在正在观察，也正在想办法与其他球队联络，努力想得到一名中锋球员。我最近也一直在研究合同问题，以便较好地做出猜想。我知道火箭队现在有在考虑好几名球员，但是进行交易，尤其是在赛季中段通过交易引进大个球员通常会受到球队总体薪资因素考虑的影响。

description.hltext_display: Stort autoværksted udbrændt
description.author: David Andersen
description.content:
HJÆLP OS: Ved du noget om branden - tip os på 1224@eb.dk eller SMS/MMS til 1224 (alm. SMS/MMS-takst). HUSK at Ekstra Bladet beskytter sine kilder, hvis de har brug for anonymitet
Et større autoværksted på Sydmarken 35 i Søborg udbrændte i nat fuldstændig.
Sammen med bygningerne gik biler og motorcykler for millioner af kroner op i røg, siger politiet.
- Der er mange Harley Davidson-motorcykler og veteranbiler, som er brændt. Vi fik reddet køretøjer for ca. fire millioner kroner ud af lageret. Blandt andet en bil til en million. Der er endnu ikke præcist tal på, hvor mange millioner kroner, der er gået op i røg, siger vagtchefen hos Københavns Vestegns Politi til ekstrabladet.dk.
Værkstedet populært blandt rockere
Ifølge naboerne til værkstedet er der tale om et værksted, hvor rockere holder til. Det oplyser ekstrabladet.dk's fotograf, som var på stedet i nat. Stedet bruges dog også af mange andre motorcykelentusiaster.
Han fortæller også, at der var flere eksplosioner under branden. Der var mindst fem brandvæsener på stedet for at slukke branden, men lige lidt hjalp det.
Det vides endnu ikke, hvordan branden opstod. Det skal brandteknikere opklare henover julen.

description.hltext_display: Discontinuation of PTFE Flat Cables Creates Scramble for Replacements
description.content:
At least one major manufacturer of PTFE-jacketed flat cable has announced their plans to discontinue that product. There is an ideal replacement: silicone jacketed flat cables from Cicoil. We compare the performance, price and features of their high-flex silicone-jacketed flat cable versus PTFE-jacketed flat cable.
Valencia, CA (Vocus/PRWEB) December 21, 2010
According to customer sources, at least one major manufacturer of PTFE-jacketed flat cable has announced their plans to discontinue that product. As an aid to users affected by the disruption, and who may be sourcing alternatives, Cicoil has prepared a useful comparison of the performance, price and features of their high-flex silicone-jacketed flat cable versus PTFE-jacketed flat cable. A downloadable PDF review is found at Cicoil.com/cables/details/silicone-vs-ptfe.asp
The comparison includes a review of the method of manufacturing for each type of cable, and its impact on the cable’s durability, flexibility, environmental capabilities, strength and performance, versatility and cost. The company provides free samples of their silicone flat cable for examination and testing. Interested parties can request the sample here»
PTFE cable users looking for a more expedient solution to sourcing issues may speak with a Cicoil representative at 661-295-1295.
Cicoil has been a leader in designing and manufacturing high performance cable assemblies for over fifty years. The company's unique silicon coated flat cables provide high flexibility, extremely long life, and they can withstand temperature extremes from -65 degrees to +260 degrees Celsius. Cicoil's cables are used in thousands of demanding applications; including aircraft fuel control cells, semiconductor automation, and the Space Shuttle. Cicoil designs and manufactures its cable and cable assemblies in an automated facility in Valencia, California. Cicoil's quality assurance system is certified to the ISO 9001 (AS9100) standard.
# # #
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb8027797.htm

description.hltext_display: underbukser
description.author: Jan Kjeldtoft
description.content:
Det ser vanvittigt ud - men der er en mening med galskaben, når Mikkel Hansen spiller i tights indenfor.
I aftes luftede stjernen de lange sorte tights, da AG København . Ikke på grund af de minus 17 grader, der var udenfor hallen i Ballerup - men på grund af trætte ben.
De lange rør skulle nemlig kunne reducere risikoen for fiberskader i læg og lår med helt op til 40 procent. Jeg ville lige prøve dem, og de er altså ret fede. De sidder snorlige, så man overhovedet ikke er hæmmet i sine bevægelser, og jeg har på det seneste haft en lille en smule trætte ben, siger Mikkel Hansen, der døjede med en fiber i baglåret før turneringsstart.
Han er faktisk røget i lommen på en holdkammerat nemlig Lars Jørgensen. Jeg har fået agenturet på de her shorts sammen med Kristian Kjelling. Det er et Barcelona-mærke Colibri og ingen ringere end Andres Iniesta spillede i dem, da han scorede i VM-finalen i Sydafrika, fortæller Lars Jørgensen. Jeg kan jo ikke betale spillerne for at bruge bukserne, så når alle på nær en fire-fem stykker bruger dem, tager jeg det som et udtryk for, de er tilfredse, siger Lars Jørgensen.
AG København kunne i går fortælle, at man har indgået et nyt, rekordstort sponsorat.

description.hltext_display: i lange
description.author: Jan Kjeldtoft
description.content:
Det ser vanvittigt ud - men der er en mening med galskaben, når Mikkel Hansen spiller i tights indenfor.
I aftes luftede stjernen de lange sorte tights, da AG København . Ikke på grund af de minus 17 grader, der var udenfor hallen i Ballerup - men på grund af trætte ben.
De lange rør skulle nemlig kunne reducere risikoen for fiberskader i læg og lår med helt op til 40 procent. Jeg ville lige prøve dem, og de er altså ret fede. De sidder snorlige, så man overhovedet ikke er hæmmet i sine bevægelser, og jeg har på det seneste haft en lille en smule trætte ben, siger Mikkel Hansen, der døjede med en fiber i baglåret før turneringsstart.
Han er faktisk røget i lommen på en holdkammerat nemlig Lars Jørgensen. Jeg har fået agenturet på de her shorts sammen med Kristian Kjelling. Det er et Barcelona-mærke Colibri og ingen ringere end Andres Iniesta spillede i dem, da han scorede i VM-finalen i Sydafrika, fortæller Lars Jørgensen. Jeg kan jo ikke betale spillerne for at bruge bukserne, så når alle på nær en fire-fem stykker bruger dem, tager jeg det som et udtryk for, de er tilfredse, siger Lars Jørgensen.
AG København kunne i går fortælle, at man har indgået et nyt, rekordstort sponsorat.

description.hltext_display: El PP ya da por segura la vuelta de Corina Porro a la Alcaldía
description.author: redaccion
description.content:
redaccion - vigo - 22-12-2010
El Partido Popular ya da por segura la recuperación dentro de cinco meses de la Alcaldía de Vigo de la mano de Corina Porro, candidata por tercera vez, según reconoció ayer el presidente provincial del PP y de la Diputación, Rafael Louzán.
El Partido Popular ya da por segura la recuperación dentro de cinco meses de la Alcaldía de Vigo de la mano de Corina Porro, candidata por tercera vez, según reconoció ayer el presidente provincial del PP y de la Diputación, Rafael Louzán. Según aseguró en un encuentro con los medios con motivo de las fiestas, el PP estaría además ‘en las mejores condiciones’ para gobernar, después de las elecciones de 2011, en municipios en los que se han presentado mociones de censura, como los de Mos, O Porriño y Gondomar. Aunque no lo confirmó, es seguro que Nidia Arévalo, pese a dejar el PP al fichar a un tránsfuga del PSOE para acceder a la Alcaldía de Mos, volverá a ser cabeza de lista por este partido. Por su parte, Martín Urgal en Gondomar, ya ha reconocido que no optará a un segundo mandato y recientemente se reincorporó a su puesto en Novacaixagalicia. En cuanto a Nelson Santos, de Porriño, todo apunta a que repetirá sin más. En todo caso, Louzán señaló que todas las incógnitas se despejarán en ‘enero o febrero’, cuando se presenten las candidaturas del PP. Rafael Louzán defendió la presentación de las mociones de censura que permitieron cambios de gobierno en esos ayuntamientos y puso como ejemplo el caso de Gondomar, donde ‘había 12 ediles en la oposición y sólo cinco -del BNG en el gobierno’. ‘Se hicieron las cosas como el PP entendía, el partido cumplió lo establecido’. Más claro fue todavía sobre Vigo. A preguntas de los medios, el dirigente popular mostró su total convencimiento de que Corina Porro, actualmente presidenta de la Autoridad Portuaria, ‘tiene todas las posibilidades de volver a ser alcaldesa’, y elogió su trabajo al frente del organismo portuario por los cambios introducidos en la relación entre la ciudad y el mar. Claro que Louzán hizo estas declaraciones tras conocer el sondeo realizado hace unos días por su partido, y del que ya informó este diario, en el que Corina Porro conseguiría mayoría absoluta clara en Vigo en las elecciones que se celebrarán dentro de justamente cinco meses. Según el sondeo, podría lograr incluso 15 concejales, por los 13 actuales.

description.hltext_display: 寇牧師教唱：最美的藝術是感情
description.content:
六龜育幼院合唱團是國內知名的原住民合唱團，成員以青少年為主，由旅美20多年的佈道家、寇順舉牧師擔任指揮。八十多歲的寇牧師仍然精神奕奕，這一天，他教導原聲小朋友學習唱歌最重要的一課：「唱歌的技巧是裝備，感情是子彈，能夠穿透人心，最美的藝術是感情。」
原聲學校及原聲合唱團位在南投縣，六龜育幼院則地處在南部高雄縣，同樣為原住民合唱團體，
慈善音樂會的最後，預訂要由德高望重的寇牧師指揮，這次參與演出的4個團體進行大合唱；在排演時，4隊人馬大陣丈站在台上，個子最小的原聲小朋友站在舞台正中間，他們要合唱著名宗教詩歌《那雙看不見的手》，寇牧師不調整大家的發音，也不分一、二部，只見寇牧師提醒大家，「上帝怎麼感動你，你就怎麼唱！」
他說，技巧只是裝備，感情是子彈，會穿透人心，最美的藝術不在技巧，而是又真又活的感情。寇牧師感性地說，每次聆聽這首歌都感動，一邊指揮一邊掉眼淚，扮奏的也是，一邊彈琴一邊拭擦眼淚…音樂的能量是無可限量的，要用心靈詮釋一首歌。
「用感情唱歌」是寇牧師的信念，主持人是這麼介紹六龜育幼院合唱團的：2002年在高雄與維也納兒童合唱團同台演出，外界評維也納合唱兒童合唱團是用技巧唱歌，而六龜育幼院合唱團是用靈魂演唱。這無疑是對六龜育幼院合唱團的極高評價。
完美合唱，是技巧與感情的完全交融，用感情唱歌，一直是原聲小朋友演唱的課題。「你們要有表情，要更投入感情，就會很棒了！」在演出前，原聲一班學生、現就讀曉民女中音樂班的伊部特地來電，Bukut校長打開手機擴音器，讓所有小朋友聆聽伊部的提醒。
隔日，原聲小朋友受邀到新竹勝利堂教會進行一場小型演唱，這場合他們很熟悉，就同每周日上教會做禮拜一般。在這兒，小朋友再度演唱《那雙看不見的手》，歌聲溫柔，如柳樹般在風中飄洩，也猶如上帝那雙看不見的手親撫人們受傷的心，台下的教友們不禁頻頻拭淚；唱畢，小朋友走下台，瞥見佳恩抹去了眼淚。
只要用感情，歌唱或合唱，讓原本陌生的人們彷彿沒有了界線，有了共同的話語。

description.hltext_display: Passages Malibu Drug and Alcohol Treatment Center Announces Launch of Cutting-Edge 'Brain Paint' Neurofeedback Therapy
description.content:
The world-renowned Passages Malibu, the state-of-the-art one-on-one holistic drug and alcohol treatment center, today announced the launch of the "Brain Paint" Neurofeedback, scientifically proven to reduce relapse, as the latest cutting-edge therapy offered to its clients, who benefit from the fact that Passages now offers a more extensive array of therapies than any other treatment center in the nation. The introduction of "Brain Paint" elevates the Passages treatment experience to a new level by giving those fighting addiction a powerful new tool to achieve stability and the sought-after state of peak performance which athletes and musicians refer to as being "in the zone."
Los Angeles, CA (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Passages Malibu Drug and Alcohol Treatment Center Announces Launch of Cutting-Edge 'Brain Paint' Neurofeedback Therapy Scientifically Proven to Reduce Addiction Relapse Rate Into Pioneering Holistic Treatment Program
The world-renowned Passages Malibu , the state-of-the-art one-on-one holistic drug and alcohol treatment center, today announced the launch of the "Brain Paint" Neurofeedback, scientifically proven to reduce relapse, as the latest cutting-edge therapy offered to its clients, who benefit from the fact that Passages now offers a more extensive array of therapies than any other treatment center in the nation. The introduction of "Brain Paint" elevates the Passages treatment experience to a new level by giving those fighting addiction a powerful new tool to achieve stability and the sought-after state of peak performance which athletes and musicians refer to as being "in the zone."
Known for innovation, Passages Malibu pioneered the most individualized and comprehensive treatment approach the industry has ever seen with more than 65 hours of one-on-one therapy per month. As the leader in personalized treatment, Passages Malibu takes the next step forward by offering its patients one of the most individualized treatment approaches invented. "Brain Paint" represents a natural extension of Passages Malibu's philosophy of customizing a tailored treatment program, rather than the typical disease-focused, one-size-fits-all rehab model. By connecting directly to the patients' brains, the therapists at Passages Malibu are able to gain insights into the minds of their patients and help them achieve an unprecedented level of mental stability.
Passages Malibu's newest treatment, "Brain Paint," works by tapping into the body's mechanisms, including self-regulation, to teach the brain to be more efficient and effective. Studies have demonstrated that the brains of individuals combating addictions are often highly unstable in the early stages of rehab. "Brain Paint" helps patients bypass the typical "flight-or-fight" reaction which many experience and train the brain's cortex to engage and achieve a state of relaxed focus and attentiveness. This improves brain function and has been proven to reduce the rate of relapse and extend recovery. In just a few short weeks since therapists have introduced "Brain Paint" at Passages Malibu , clients are already showing improvement and demand for the therapy is strong. In an extensive study of over 9,400 patients, 47% experienced improvement in just 3 sessions, although more extensive treatment is recommended for the maximum long-term benefits.
"At Passages Malibu , we are constantly innovating and expanding to bring our patients the latest advances in science, technology and health to help them win the fight of their lives against drugs and alcohol," explains Pax Prentiss, Co-Founder of Passages Malibu. "Our clients who have taken amphetamines and other 'uppers' often find that their brains are literally running too fast. By contrast, through Brain Paint, we can see that our patients battling depression often have brains that are running too slowly. With the Brain Paint technology, our therapists teach our patients how to regulate their brains. Once we stabilize them, our patients' chances of remaining clean and sober increase dramatically."
Passages Malibu will be actively utilizing "Brain Paint" to treat a wide array of addictions since a 2005 UCLA study proved the effectiveness of EEG Biofeedback in improving the rates of maintaining sobriety and staying drug-free for a full year after treatment. The therapy has yielded dramatic life-changing results for acclaimed autistic musical genius Rex Lewis, an Olympic gold medalist and a patient with a traumatic head injury who could not walk or talk and was able to achieve both through the use of "Brain Paint."
Passages Malibu therapists apply sensors to the head to pick up the brain's electrical signals which are then amplified and displayed on a computer monitor which the patient can see. This gives the brain a unique opportunity to see itself in action. Neurofeedback works like a mirror for the brain – by magnifying the areas that are not working efficiently and giving the brain an opportunity to correct and adjust itself to achieve stability.
About Passages Malibu Passages Malibu was founded in 2000 by father and son team Chris and Pax Prentiss as a result of a father's unconditional love and ongoing concern for son Pax and his downward life spiral of addictions. Pax's personal journey in overcoming heroin and cocaine addiction was the foundation for Passages to pioneer the approach which has now become the new standard for the treatment of alcohol and drug dependency. Rather than simply following the basic one-size-fits all 12 step rehab model in which clients attend group meetings and receive little individual counseling, Passages Malibu provides 60-65 hours/month of concentrated one-on-one therapy to every client. These personalized sessions focus on determining the underlying causes of dependency on drugs and alcohol. At Passages, a consulting physician and skilled team of licensed therapists customize a treatment program for each individual in a naturally serene and beautiful setting. In 2010, a new Passages wellness center, Passages Ventura was established in Ventura, California.
To learn more about Passages Malibu please fan/follow us online on Twitter at http://www.twitter.com/passagesrehab , Facebook at http://facebook.com/passagesmaliburehab and YouTube at http://youtube.com/user/passages
Contact: Holly Taylor Rogers & Cowan 310-854-8115 hetaylor(at)rogersandcowan(dot)com
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebpassagesmalibu/brainpaint/prweb4915594.htm

event_or_fact.property: At Passages Malibu , we are constantly innovating and expanding to bring our patients the latest advances in science, technology and health to help them win the fight of their lives against drugs and alcohol

description.hltext_display: sexvideo mest set
description.author: Niklas Roar
description.content:
Den Victorianske ære er for alvor forbi. Englænderne er særdeles glade for sex og adskiller sig på den måde ikke væsentligt fra os danskere.
De er tilsyneladende også glade for den fagre Paris Hilton. For en er den mest sete video på netudgaven af Storbritanniens mest læste avis The Sun - for andet år i træk.
Hun efterfølges af en anden gammel kending - også her på sitet - nærmere bestemt den ligeledes festglade og ligeledes tidligere indsatte Lindsay Lohan, der i videoen kan ses topløs.
Ingen liste uden Kim K
Dernest den herhjemme knap så kendte glamourmodel Gemma Atkinson, der ... nåja, ligeledes er topløs, før turen går videre til den tidligere Baywatch-babe Pamela Anderson og naturligvis den aldeles yppige Kim Kardashian - sidstnævnte også i en sexvideo.
Sjettepladsen indtages af Maria Careys svulmende fortrin, før læserne undtagelsesvis gider at klikke flittigt på noget, der ikke har med sex at gøre. I stedet har mange fundet stor fornøjelse ved at se den amerikanske sangerinde, Pink, vælte under en optræden.
Mmmh... Megan
Der er dog ingen grund til at blive nervøs for læsernes evne til at skille skidt fra kanel, for med ottendepladsen er vi atter tilbage på kendt territorium med 'Kendras sex tape'. Blondinen er i øvrigt tidligere kæreste med den aldrende Playboy-konge Hugh Hefner.
Niende og tiendepladsen besættes af den underskønne Megan Fox, der byder ind med 'for sexede mobilbilleder' og en fræk reklamevideo for modehuset Armani.

description.hltext_display: Задержан 18-летний житель Орла, готовивший взрыв в кафе
Spejlglat i hele landet
description.author: David Andersen
description.content:
FORTÆL ANDRE OM VEJRET: Klik ind i chatten herover
Juletrafikken skøjter af sted på landets spejlglatte veje, og hos Vejdirektoratet lyder advarslen:
- Kør forsigtigt og tag af sted i god tid. Det er umuligt at salte vejene, fordi saltet er nytteløst, når temperaturen er under -5 grader. Hvilket den er i hele landet. Derfor er så godt som hver eneste vej i hele landet spejlglat.
Motorvej på halv kraft
Trafikken snegler sig af sted, og især i hovedstadsområdet bliver man nemt fanget i en længere bilkø. Man kan holde sig opdateret på trafikken.dk.
- På Fyn har vi på politiets opfordring spærret en vejbane i hver retning på motorvejen for at holde hastigheden nede og undgå flere ulykker. Det er mellem afkørsel 50 og 52. Hastighedsbegrænsningen er sat ned til 50 km/t, og det kan meget vel være sådan resten af dagen, siger vagtchef Torben Kristensen fra Vejdirektoratet til ekstrabladet.dk.
Lastbiler i problemer
Bilister, der skal tværs over Fyn, skal altså forberede sig på at bruge betydeligt mere tid på at krydse Fyn end normalt.
- Generelt går trafikken dog faktisk meget pænt. Men især lastbilerne har store problemer, og der er en ulykke mellem Herning og Viborg, hvor to lastbiler er stødt sammen, som forstyrrer trafikken. Jeg ved faktisk ikke, hvorfor det lige er lastbilerne, der har så mange problemer, siger vagtchefen.

description.hltext_display: Det er den koldeste morgen i 23 år
description.author: David Andersen
description.content:
FORTÆL ANDRE OM VEJRET: Klik ind i chatten herover
Vi oplever i dag ekstrem kulde, som vi ikke har set det siden 1987 - og vejrguderne sender for anden dag temperaturen ned under -20 grader. . Koldest er det på Sjælland, hvor temperaturen her på årets korteste dag - som i år er 22. og ikke 21. december - er kravlet ned på under -22 grader nogle steder.
I Holbæk er der målt -22,5 grader. . Senere på dagen bliver det lidt varmere - vi kommer over frysertemperatur - men til gengæld kommer der sne og hård vind, som medfører snefygning.
Overalt i landet er der sne- og isglatte veje, så pas på derude.

description.hltext_display: Brage rankas ned hos spelbolag
description.author: Per-Åke Granlund
description.content:
Detta om man får tro spelbolaget Betsafe.com som släppt vinnaroddsen för Superettan 2011.
Spelbolagets oddssättare André Nordberg är således inne på att Åtvidaberg är det bästa laget i nästa års Superettan.
?- Men Superettan 2011 kommer att bli en jämnare serie än 2010. Det finns sex-sju lag som har potential att kämpa om de tre-fyra första platserna så det blir inte lätt för Åtvidaberg, säger Andrè Nordberg.?
Åtvidaberg (4 i vinnarodds), Brommapojkarna (6), Assyriska (6), GIF Sundsvall (6), Hammarby (8) och Landskrona (8 i vinnarodds) räknas som givna topplag.? Medan Ljungskile (11) och Örgryte (12) är två heta outsiders.?
- Det är inte så mycket som skiljer lagen i mitten från de i toppen. Kolla bara på Degerfors ifjol. Under våren var de seriens bästa lag under hösten ett av de sämre. Och det mycket beroende av att bara två spelare lämnade klubben.
- Så det lag som hittar några nya klasspelare i vinter kan snabbt överraska rejält, avslutar Betsafes oddssättare.
Fakta: Vinnarodds Superettan:
Åtvidaberg 4,50, Brommapojkarna 6,00, Assyriska 6,00, GIF Sundsvall 6,00, Hammarby IF 8,00. Landskrona 8,00, Ljungskile 11,00. Örgryte 12,00, Falkenberg 12,00, Jönköpings Södra 45,00, Ängelholm 45,00, Degerfors 65,00, Brage 65,00, Västerås SK 100,00, Öster 100,00, IFK Värnamo 200,00.

description.hltext_display: Alla är välkomna till EFS i Ängelholm
description.content:
Det är en grådisig förmiddag och platsen är ett söndagsöde och charmlöst industriområde i utkanten av Ängelholm. Inget i omgivningen avslöjar att här finns en kreativ, utåtriktad församling.
Så fort man kommer innanför dörren till EFS-kyrkan vid Metallgatan jagas dock den dystra känslan bort. Värden Johan Eriksson, 16 år, tittar i ögonen, skakar hand och hälsar glatt välkommen. Från den stunden känner man sig hemma i kyrkan även om man aldrig satt sin fot där innan.
Det är inte bara människornas bemötande som skapar hemkänsla. Levande ljus står tända i ingången, belysningen är dämpad. Det känns nästan som att stega in i någons vardagsrum. Allt i inredningen är genomtänkt, från golvet till ljuskronorna i taket. Även den stora kyrksalen präglas av nytänkande, längst bak står soffor och fåtöljer i en avskild avdelning, där kan man lyssna på predikan eller få förbön.
På scenen finns ingen talarstol, i kyrksalen ingen orgel. Man skulle kunna tro att detta var hem åt en högljudd predikant uppbackad av lovsång på rockvolym. Så är det inte riktigt.
Traditionell manskör
Miljön är kanske annorlunda, men när gudstjänsten inleds är det en traditionell manskör som sjunger. Visst finns ett lovsångsband, men de spelar också traditionella sånger som "Löftena kunna ej svika". Och visst använder sig prästen Magnus av bilder för att illustrera sin predikan, men ämnet är traditionellt, om vikten av att ta emot tron som en gåva.
Det är överhuvudtaget ganska stillsamt. Under lovsången står någon upp, andra lyfter sina händer, men de flesta sitter ner och kanske blundar. Den som är van vid lågkyrkliga gudstjänster skulle känna sig helt hemma i liturgin.
Efter gudstjänsten är ett rejält kyrkfika uppdukat i samlingsrummet intill.
Vid ett av borden sitter Åsa Svedberg, som flyttat till Ängelholm bland annat för att EFS-kyrkan lockade.
-När vi kom hit fick vi fort vänner här, vi blev inbjudna att vara med i en hemgrupp och lärde känna människorna. Det är en väldigt välkomnande församling där det är lätt att få nya kontakter här, säger hon.
Hon är glad för att församlingen är så öppen mot omvärlden.
-Det känns verkligen okej att bjuda med vänner till kyrkan, jag skulle aldrig tveka att ta med någon på en gudstjänst.
En kreativ miljö
I ett annat rum har ett gäng ungdomar slagit sig ner. De är med av olika anledningar, några har föräldrar i kyrkan och då är det naturligt att följa med, men viktigt är också att kyrkan är en kreativ miljö. Någon har kommit med genom de musikaler som kyrkan arrangerar och som blivit populära att delta i.
-Jag kom hit när jag var tio, började i dansgruppen och så har jag blivit mer och mer involverad, säger en av tjejerna.
Prästen Magnus Lennartsson och ordförande Lennart Albertsson borde vara nöjda med hur långt de har kommit. EFS-föreningen har idag 175 medlemmar och lika många brukar också komma på söndagsgudstjänsterna. Annat var det i slutet av 1990-talet då det var runt 25 på gudstjänsterna i den gamla EFS-kyrkan inne i Ängelholm. Den lilla gruppen hade nämligen blivit kvar medan andra i EFS-föreningen gått in i samarbetskyrkan S:t Mikael.
-Det var ingen splittring, vi månade om varandra och välsignade varandra, säger Lennart.
Den lilla gruppen växte mer och mer, bland annat för att man satsade på att arrangera barnmusikaler som drog in många föräldrar.
-Innan var vi en livaktig men ganska traditionell församling som rymde de vanliga frivilliginsatserna. Med musikalerna så blev det en massa till uppgifter, som scripta och kostymör, och det gjorde att vår mentala värld vidgades, säger Lennart.
Kyrkan var för trång och efter mycket vånda köpte man till slut den gamla industrilokalen på Metall gatan. Efter ombyggnaden, som bland annat Carola hjälpt till att finansiera då hon gett konserter i kyrkan, har nu EFS-föreningen stora och moderna lokaler.
-Vi stör ingen om vi har ungdomsevent en sen kväll. Och det är lättare att ta sig hit med bil eftersom det finns parkering. Det vi såg som en nackdel, att det skulle bli svårare för äldre, har nästan blivit en fördel då vi kör kyrktaxi istället, säger Magnus.
Att EFS-föreningen nu känner sig hemma på Metallgatan betyder dock inte att man slagit sig till ro. Målsättningen är tydlig, att växa ytterligare. Under årsmötet beslöt föreningen för att sikta mot 600 medlemmar till 2015.
-Det är inte siffran det handlar om egentligen, utan om att vi ska försöka tänka och planera för att bli fler, säger Lennart.
Öppen inställning
Själva grunden för tillväxten är den öppna inställningen till andra människor och villigheten att dela med sig av evangeliet. Magnus menar att det är en gammal tradition som fanns långt innan han blev präst i Ängelholm, något som finns i EFS-föreningens DNA.
- Det finns den svensk-kyrkliga lågtröskelvarianten där alla kan komma in men som är ganska anonym, och det finns den församlingsvarianten där alla känner alla men där det kan vara svårt att komma in. Vi vill ha låg tröskel samtidigt som alla ska bli sedda, säger Lennart.

description.hltext_display: Oil rises above $90 amid US crude supply drop
description.author: ALEX KENNEDY
description.content:
SINGAPORE -- Oil prices rose above $90 a barrel Wednesday in Asia after a report showed U.S. crude supplies dropped more than expected for a second week, which suggests demand is improving.
Benchmark oil for February delivery was up 19 cents to $90.01 a barrel at late afternoon Singapore time in electronic trading on the New York Mercantile Exchange. The contract rose 45 cents to settle at $89.82 on Tuesday.
The American Petroleum Institute said late Tuesday that crude inventories fell 5.8 million barrels last week while analysts surveyed by Platts, the energy information arm of McGraw-Hill Cos., had forecast a drop of 2.4 million barrels. Inventories of gasoline decreased 2.9 million barrels and distillates rose slightly, the API said.
The Energy Department's Energy Information Administration reports its weekly supply data later Wednesday. The EIA said last week that supplies dropped 9.9 million barrels the previous week, the biggest drop in eight years.
Oil prices, which rose to a two-year high above $90 earlier this month, have been supported by rallying stock markets. Meanwhile, a strengthening U.S. dollar, which makes crude more expensive for investors with other currencies, has weighed on oil. "A steady-higher stock market continues to provide a major counter against a likely renewed weakening in the euro," Ritterbusch and Associates said in a report. "A choppy, sideways trade could persist through the balance of this year." In other Nymex trading in January contracts, heating oil rose 0.4 cent to $2.52 a gallon, gasoline futures added 1.5 cents to $2.41 a gallon and natural gas advanced 0.9 cent to $4.07 per 1,000 cubic feet.
In London, Brent crude rose 30 cents to $93.50 a barrel on the ICE Futures exchange.

description.hltext_display: 大连实德称李玮峰� 盟已成定局
description.content:
在主教练朴成华的运作下，李玮锋回归中超加盟大连实德的已经接近成功了。据知情人士透露，这次转会将在近期有结果，大连实德将如愿以偿引进李玮锋。
此前韩国媒体率先爆料水原三星俱乐部下赛季将清洗李玮锋，李玮锋即将加盟大连实德，之后水原三星的官网也转载了这条报道。回到韩国后，对于这个消息，李玮锋表现得很激动。他认为作为这起转会的当事人，之前俱乐部都没有跟他沟通过，对于转会俱乐部根本没有征求他的意见。之后又传出李玮锋的老东家深圳队也准备引进他，并打出了李玮锋的家人居住在深圳这样一个亲情牌，紧接着获得了下赛季亚冠资格的天津泰达也加入了李玮锋的争夺战。一时间，李玮锋花落谁家成为了一个很大的疑问。
在此期间，大连实德俱乐部的老板徐明下令，一定要得到李玮锋。大连实德也一直在跟李玮锋进行着谈判。在主动与水原三星俱乐部完成转会价格的谈判后，大连实德马上与李玮锋取得了联系，并希望他能够加盟大连实德，帮助大连队重新崛起。
在此次引进李玮锋的过程中，实德队韩国籍主教练朴成华扮演着重要的角色。来到中国之前，朴成华对李玮锋留下了深刻的印象，认为他是身高、力量、速度已经头球都很出色的中后卫，而且场上作风非常顽强。10赛季还没结束时，朴成华就向俱乐部建议引进李玮锋。
在得到实德俱乐部的认可后，朴成华利用自己的关系很快与水原俱乐部就引进李玮锋达成了协议。不过，韩国媒体还是得到了消息，把这个转会意向爆料了出来，这也导致了李玮锋的不满。在这样的情况下，朴成华亲自与李玮锋进行了面谈，表达了对李玮锋的器重以及实德俱乐部下赛季的展望。
在与朴成华的交流后，李玮锋看到了一个教练对于球员的器重和信任。这一次面谈也直接影响到了李玮锋的最终决定。为了确保这次转会的成功，朴成华一直留在韩国，仍然与李玮锋保持着联系。尽管实德队15号已经开始集训了，但朴成华还呆在韩国处理转会一事。
今天下午，朴成华返回了大连，这也暗示着李玮锋加盟大连实德一事基本确定。内部人士透露，本月内，大连实德俱乐部就会宣布李玮锋加盟。一位实德官员表示："现在已经没有任何问题了，这个事情现在很乐观。"

description.hltext_display: 欧债危机中瑞郎quot;被走高quot;未来还能走多远?
description.author: www.hexun.com
description.content:
美元/瑞郎周三(12月22日)欧市盘初触及2个月新低0.9532，而欧元/瑞郎也触及历史低点1.2524，因为投资者对欧元区主权债务危机的持续担忧推升瑞郎的避险买盘需求。各大机构纷纷表示瑞郎的强势仍将继续，甚至有消息传出连瑞士央行(SNB)行长也警告称欧元兑瑞郎将暴跌。
瑞士信贷(Credit Suisse)货币研究主管Marcus Hettinger 表示，欧元区主权债务问题将打压欧元/瑞郎跌至1.2000甚至更低水平。瑞郎作为避险币种，将吸引更多的资本流入，同时瑞士投资者将削减他们所持有的欧元区国家资产。 推荐阅读 多头机构强势出击 数十亿资金涌入地产股
[免费诊股] 基金成大涨幕后推手 地产金融给力 沪指重上2900点 明年还有很多靴子会落地 地产全面崛起 低迷格局能否打破 军工行业重组主题蕴含机会 [微博]箱体震荡 小散如何操作 [股吧]利好扎堆的A股杀跌为哪般 [和讯知道]什么是A股、B股？ Hettinger 还表示，美元/瑞郎维持在平价位下方可能成为常态，因汇价反弹的机会非常有限，尤其是在全球经济复苏的环境下。
他同时指出，若全球经济再次出现衰退，美元/瑞郎可能和2008年一样出现上涨。但是现在，鉴于美国和瑞士贸易帐数据差异巨大，且美元缺乏利率因素支持，美元/瑞郎无法实现上涨。
法国巴黎银行(BNP Paribas)也表示，由于欧元区外围国家债务问题仍未解决，资金持续流入瑞士，瑞郎兑欧元将继续受到支持。
摩根士丹利(Morgan Stanley)表示，由于投资者受欧洲主权债务危机影响而寻求瑞郎进行避险，欧元/瑞郎在创出历史低点以后或将延续跌势，2011年汇价或将跌至1.2000水平。
该行货币策略师Ronald Leven指出，主权债务问题将在2011年中期继续困扰欧元，这将导致投资者寻找替代资产。而瑞郎方面，目前尚无实际证据显示瑞郎走强已伤害到经济。
巴克莱资本(Barclays Capital)表示，欧元/瑞郎自10月份高点开始的大幅下跌行情是汇价的正常走势，未来可能将进一步走低。
丹麦丹斯克银行(Danske Bank)资深技术分析师Kasper Kirkegaard 认为，出于对欧元区经济状况的担忧，欧元/瑞郎在未来数周仍存在进一步下跌风险。
不过Kirkegaard 同时指出，随着欧元区外围国家形势的日趋明朗，欧元随后可能出现反弹，同时，瑞郎的走强可能在2011年削弱瑞士的经济基本面，因瑞郎的走强将对瑞士出口造成冲击。
某日本大型银行资深交易员也指出，怀疑瑞郎的强势能否得以延续，因为除了避险原因外，投资者找不到其他买入瑞郎的理由。他们警告称，如果美债收益率进一步上升，这势必增强投资者对美元的买盘需求，届时瑞郎将面临大的卖盘压力。
野村证券(Nomura Securities)下调欧元/瑞郎3个月汇率预期至1.3200，不过认为汇价可能在明年年底升至1.4400。
该机构分析师Geoffrey Kendrick 表示，尽管欧元区外围国家债务危机在近几周主导了欧元/瑞郎的走势，但市场价格回归正常化的风险将在新年推高欧元/瑞郎。
据国外媒体本周报导，瑞士央行行长希尔德布兰德在与政府官员的秘密讨论中警告，若欧元区债务危机持续恶化，欧元兑瑞郎汇价可能会暴跌至0.5000的水平。为防汇率大跌给瑞士出口带来的风险，希尔德布兰德要求当局敦促国会支持向国际货币基金组织(IMF)的提供165亿瑞郎信贷额。不过瑞士央行发言人拒绝就有关报道置评。
2

description.hltext_display: Census 2010: Slower population growth causes N.J. to lose seat in U.S. House
description.content:
Published: Tuesday, December 21, 2010, 9:45 PM Updated: Tuesday, December 21, 2010, 9:51 PM By Follow Tweet Share 16 Share close Google Buzz Digg Stumble Upon Fark Share Email Print The Star-LedgerStates likely to gain or lose seats in the House of Representatives, based on population shifts shown in new data from the 2010 Census.
The Census numbers are in, and it?s official: New Jersey will lose a seat in the House of Representatives, shrinking its congressional delegation from 13 to 12. Although New Jersey?s population grew 4.5 percent, to 8,791,894 over the last 10 years, it was not enough to keep pace with the population boom in the south and west, according to figures released today by the U.S. Census Bureau.
The news did not come as a surprise, as experts have predicted New Jersey would lose a seat. Even before it was confirmed, Gov. Chris Christie said he expected a highly charged, partisan battle as the state?s congressional districts are redrawn with one less seat. "When someone?s ox is being gored, it becomes personal," Christie said at a bill signing this morning in Wayne. "We have a redistricting process and we?ve dealt with this before ... We?ll deal with it in a responsible way."
The loss of a seat does not necessarily mean New Jersey will lose much clout or federal dollars, said Rutgers University political science professor Ross K. Baker, who studies Congress.
"It means probably less than many people think," Baker said. "It?s the quality of the delegation that matters more." What?s certain is that New Jersey will have one less vote on critical pieces of legislation, and one less electoral vote in presidential elections. But the seniority of the representatives and the committees on which they serve are major factors in how influential the state is, Baker said.
The fate of New Jersey?s 13 current House members will be decided during the redistricting process in the second half of next year, when a 13-member commission will eliminate one district, likely pitting two incumbents against each other in the 2012 election.
Twelve members of the commission are appointed by Legislature?s Democratic and Republican leaders, and by both parties? state chairs. They either agree on a 13th tie-breaking member, or the state Supreme Court picks one of their top two choices.
As of January, the state will have seven Democrats and six Republicans in the House. The two parties are already at odds over whether a Democratic or Republican district should be eliminated.
"New Jersey is a Democratic state. Clearly a majority of the representatives should be Democratic because that represents how people vote in the state over the long run," said Democratic State Chairman John Wisniewski, an assemblyman from Middlesex County. "You can take snapshots of individual elections ? but in the long run, New Jersey is Democratic."
Republican state Chairman Jay Webber said more New Jersey residents voted for Republicans in 2009, when Christie, a Republican, defeated former Democratic Gov. Jon Corzine, and also in 2010, a national Republican wave year.
"If I were the chairman of the Democratic Party, I?d be a little skittish about my prospects, too," said Webber, an assemblyman from Morris County. "We won more votes in the gubernatorial election in 2009 and more votes in the congressional election in 2010, and I?m sure that will play into how the map is drawn in 2011."
New York and Ohio each lost two House seats, while Pennsylvania, Illinois, Iowa, Louisiana, Massachusetts, Michigan and Missouri each lost one. Texas gained four seats, Florida got two more, and six states each gained one: Arizona, Georgia, Nevada, South Carolina, Utah and Washington.
Staff writers Frederick Kaimann and Ginger Gibson contributed to this report.
IFRAMES not supported
MORE 2010 CENSUS COVERAGE:

description.hltext_display: امين شؤون رئاسة حركة العدل والمساواة يرد على تصريحات بعض من مسؤولي النظام في الخرطوم
Management Team Acquires TEKLYNX International
description.content:
The TEKLYNX management team has acquired the TEKLYNX business unit from Brady Corporation.
Milwaukee, WI (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
TEKLYNX® International , the world’s leading developer of software products for the Automatic Identification & Data Collection (AIDC) marketplace, has acquired the TEKLYNX business unit from Brady Corporation.
“This change best positions us to support not only our growth but the growth of our business partners, while enabling us to better serve a wider range of customers, from small local startups to global corporations,” says Laura Henderson, Managing Director – Americas.
TEKLYNX Americas has been growing by 15% year-over-year and anticipates continued growth as new enterprise products are launched to the market in 2011.
“We will continue to apply the same rigor and best practices to our development process. Our independence will allow us to be flexible and agile in response to industry and customer needs,” says Alex Guderzo, Vice President of Research and Development.
About TEKLYNX
TEKLYNX International is the leading software developer of AIDC products including software for label design, host connectivity, and data collection. Its software products feature the widest range of device and driver support in the industry. TEKLYNX is a Microsoft Gold Certified Partner, Oracle Gold Partner and has connectivity relationships with multiple Enterprise Resource Planning (ERP) software providers. More than 600,000 companies in 120 countries rely on its integrated software solutions for supply chain automation, warehouse management, shipping and receiving, inventory control and asset management. The company is headquartered in Milwaukee with operations in the United States, Europe, Japan, China, and Singapore.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4914274.htm

description.hltext_display: S.Korea readies major military drill near tense border
description.content:
SEOUL, (AFP) - South Korea prepared Wednesday for a major live-fire drill involving fighter jets and tanks near the tense North Korean border, as Seoul and Washington reacted warily to overtures from Pyongyang.
South Korea's military said Thursday's ground and air firing exercise 20 kilometres (12 miles) south of the mainland border would also involve self-propelled guns and 800 soldiers.
Although similar drills have been held at the same firing range at Pocheon many times before, the latest exercise comes with Seoul on high alert for a possible attack from its wayward neighbour.
South Korea's navy meanwhile began a four-day firing drill Wednesday off the east coast, a relatively distant 100 kilometres (60 miles) south of the border with the North, mobilising six warships plus helicopters.
The military said it would practise responses to intrusions by North Korean submarines and patrol boats.
And South Korean marines were posted to guard a Christmas tree that was lit up Tuesday near the land border, reflecting fears that the North might fire on the display as a propaganda symbol.
Tensions have been high since the North shelled an island near the contested western maritime border last month in response to a live-fire drill by the South. The bombardment of Yeonpyeong killed four people including civilians.
The South staged a repeat drill on Yeonpyeong Monday but the North did not go through with threats to hit back, saying it "did not feel any need to retaliate against every despicable military provocation".
A senior South Korean military commander said Thursday's drill at the Pocheon range would "demonstrate our solid military preparedness".
"We will retaliate thoroughly if the North commits another provocative act like the shelling of Yeonpyeong," First Armoured Battalion commander Choo Eun-Sik told Yonhap news agency.
The North's comments late Monday eased fears of war on the peninsula, and it also reportedly offered nuclear concessions to visiting US politician Bill Richardson.
But Seoul and Washington have expressed scepticism about the apparent overtures, coming after an intense bout of sabre-rattling from Pyongyang, whose hardline communist regime is undergoing a generational power shift.
The United States said that North Korea was not even "remotely ready" to resume six-nation nuclear disarmament talks, despite the apparent concessions offered to New Mexico Governor Richardson on his private trip.
The White House made clear there was no change to US policy, despite Pyongyang's reported offer to re-admit UN nuclear inspectors and sell off fuel rods which could be used to produce plutonium.
President Barack Obama's spokesman Robert Gibbs said Pyongyang had, over many years and different US administrations, failed to match its words with actions.
"We're not going to get a table and a room and have six-party talks just for the feel-good notion of having six-party talks," he said.
"When and if the North Koreans are ever serious about living up to their obligations, then we can think about restarting six-party talks."
North Korea pulled out of the nuclear talks -- which involve the two Koreas, the United States, Russia, China, and Japan -- in April 2009 and ordered UN nuclear inspectors out of the country.
It staged a second nuclear test a month later.
Its disclosure last month of an advanced uranium enrichment plant -- purportedly to serve a peaceful nuclear power programme -- heightened regional security fears.
Richardson, a veteran troubleshooter with the North who was formerly a US ambassador to the UN, unveiled Pyongyang's apparent concessions after a visit that the White House stressed was unofficial and independent.

description.author: Paddy Hintz
description.content:
Ikea Family members get 30 per cent off outdoor furniture and umbrellas from today until January 7.
Go here if you want to join, it?s free. I am more than slightly excited about this APPLARO sunbed in acacia which normally sells for $119 and is $83.30 for Family.
