description.hltext_display: Mourinho đã 'lăng mạ' bóng đá Việt Nam?
description.content:
>Mourinho: Xem Việt Nam còn thích hơn Real
Không thể chấp nhận thái độ của HLV Real Madrid - Jose Mourinho khi mượn bóng đá Việt Nam để công kích trọng tài ở La Liga.
Bị loại khỏi AFF Cup 2010, bóng đá Việt Nam bỗng chốc nổi danh trên đấu trường bóng đá quốc tế sau khi “Người đặc biệt” Mourinho phát biểu một câu đại loại rằng: “Thà xem bóng đá Việt Nam trên kênh Eurosport còn hơn là xem trận đấu giữa Real Madrid và Seville" mới đây.
Thoạt nghe, có vẻ như bóng đá Việt Nam đã thu hút được sự quan tâm của dư luận quốc tế, có sức hút đến nỗi một HLV lừng danh như Mourinho cũng phải biết tiếng và thán phục.
Song để hiểu đúng ý nghĩa trong câu nói của Mourinho, cần phải gắn liền nó với nội dung mà nhà cầm quân người Bồ Đào Nha đề cập. Khi đó, Mourinho đang công kích trọng tài điều khiển trận đấu. Theo như Mourinho, đó là một trận cầu hơn cả tệ hại do sự yếu kém của trọng tài.
Như vậy, cách ví von của Mourinho thực sự là khen tặng hay là “đá đểu” nền bóng đá nước ta? Cần phải hiểu thế này: Trận đấu giữa Real và Sevilla vô cùng dở vì sai lầm của trọng tài. Để minh họa sự tệ hại của nó, Mourinho lấy một cột mốc nằm ở đáy để so sánh và trong trường hợp này cột mốc đó là các trận đấu ở Việt Nam.
Từ đó, có thể hình dung rằng trong mắt Mourinho, bóng đá Việt Nam đã ở tận đáy về sai lầm của trọng tài hoặc sự kém hấp dẫn. Cách phát biểu của Mourinho cũng tương tự câu nói: “Tao thà nói chuyện với cái đầu gối còn hơn là nói chuyện với mày”.
Cách đây không lâu, cũng có một trường hợp tương tự khi tờ AS ở Tây Ban Nha trong bài bình luận trận đại bại 1-4 của Tây Ban Nha trước Argentina đã mô tả rằng “trong 15 phút đầu, các nhà đương kim vô địch thế giới chơi không khác gì đội tuyển Việt Nam”. 15 phút đầu trận giao hữu ở Buenos Aires, Tây Ban Nha chơi vô cùng mờ nhạt.
Khi đọc bình luận đó, chúng ta không thể tự thuyết phục rằng tuyển Việt Nam được so sánh với cả quán quân thế giới. Rõ ràng, trong mắt tờ AS, tuyển Việt Nam là một đội tuyển cực kỳ yếu kém và họ muốn mượn hình ảnh này để chỉ trích tuyển Tây Ban Nha.
Mourinho hay người phóng viên của AS có quyền đưa ra nhận xét song việc họ công khai dè bĩu một nền bóng đá là điều không thể chấp nhận được. Một cách khách quan, bóng đá Việt Nam vẫn chưa thể vươn xa ra khỏi khu vực Đông Nam Á song nền bóng đá chúng ta không thể là đại diện cho những gì kém cỏi nhất.
Trên bảng xếp hạng FIFA, tuyển Việt Nam xếp trên rất nhiều nước và vùng lãnh thổ. Giải V-League của chúng ta cũng không thể là giải đấu tệ kém hấp dẫn nhất thế giới.
Nên chăng chúng ta, những người Việt Nam, phải có phản ứng trước thái độ của Mourinho? “Người đặc biệt” cần phải giải thích phát biểu của mình và nếu cần phải đưa ra lời xin lỗi vì lời dè bĩu đó.
Chúng ta nghiêm túc lắng nghe những lời phê bình nếu quả thật đó là những lời phê bình đúng đắn song không thể chấp nhận thái độ xem thường mang đầy định kiến.
Khiêm tốn và cầu thị không có nghĩa là chấp nhận tất cả những hành động tấn công vô căn cứ. Thái độ này cũng sẽ giúp ngăn chặn những sự việc tương tự diễn ra trong tương lai. Im lặng đồng nghĩa với việc chúng ta xóa bỏ công sức của những người đã, đang đầu tư tâm huyết và nỗ lực để đưa bóng đá Việt Nam đi lên.
Nền bóng đá Việt Nam vẫn còn chưa đủ thực lực để vươn tầm ra thế giới bóng đá đỉnh cao, đó là thực tế mà chúng ta hoàn toàn chấp nhận, nhưng không xứng đáng để được đem ra làm trò cười trong làng túc cầu thế giới.

description.hltext_display: 新年の気温 西は低めの見通し
MIC：平板電腦上 小筆電下
description.content:
(中央社記者吳佳穎台北22日電)資策會產業情報研究所預估明年平板電腦全球出貨量可突破3800萬台，而小筆電受到平板電腦侵蝕，成長率會衰退達12%左右。
資訊工業策進會產業情報研究所 (MIC)資深產業分析師兼組長魏傳虔表示，各界看好明年平板電子產品預估有3800萬到4000萬台出貨量，成長率為212%，如果把平板裝置也算入PC(個人電腦)市場，PC市場成長率將達14.9% 。
魏傳虔表示，預估明年全球整體PC出貨量有3.2億台規模，成長率為6.8%。其中，筆電 (NB)有15.8%成長、桌上型電腦成長4.9%、主機板微幅成長2.3%。
小筆電因受到平板電腦侵蝕，產量和產值預期會呈現兩位數衰退，從今年2900萬台降到明年2700萬台，衰退12%左右。
魏傳虔說，平板裝置產品成長將使品牌業者與 ODM(原廠委託設計)產業洗牌效應；2011年Apple可望躍升為全球行動運算的第2大品牌廠，富士康 (Foxconn)會擠入Mobile PC代工廠前 3大的地位。
另外，消費性電子及通訊普遍用的ARM架構，與Google Android作業系統將衝擊傳統的Wintel架構。
資策會今天舉行「前瞻2011高科技產業十大趨勢」記者會，魏傳虔在會中作以上表示。991222

description.hltext_display: Derby direkt i hockeyettan
description.author: Stefan Ericson
description.content:
Redan i premiäromgången spelas seriens första derby, Falu IF-Borlänge.
Hedemora börjar hemma mot Lindlöven.
De sex lagen i serien inleder med bonuspoäng baserade på placering i grundserien enligt följande: Borlänge 8, Tierp 6, Hedemora 4, Lindlöven 2, Valbo 1 och Falu IF 0.
Segraren kvalificerar sig för play off 1 till kvalserien för Hockeyallsvenskan. Lag två, tre och fyra säkrar kontraktet i division 1 medan de två sista lagen tvingas kvala.
- Det blir garanterat en jämn serie, där alla kommer att slå alla, säger Hedemoratränaren Patric Boqvist.
Han håller Borlänge som favorit till play off-platsen, men tror inte att laget går igenom serien utan poängförlust.
I andra omgången ställs för övrigt Boqvists HSK mot Borlänge på bortais. Borlänge, med nye tränaren Håkan Kornell, börjar således fortsättningsettan med två derbyn. Falu IF möter Valbo borta i den andra omgången.

description.hltext_display: 青岛双星不愿“惹事”：没有德比战只有生死战
description.content:
赛季前厉兵秣马，大肆引援的青岛双星将本赛季的目标定为打进季后赛，而“老大哥”黄金男篮就是其最现实的一个竞争对手。CBA齐鲁德比一触即发，不过青岛双星赛前却有意淡化这场德比大战，“对青岛队而言，要想冲进季后赛，每一场比赛都是生死战，必须全力以赴，山东队和其他对手没有什么两样，我们还是一拼到底！”双星俱乐部总经理生锡顺赛前如此表示。
表面风平浪静
上一轮比赛黄金男篮惨败新疆30分，而青岛双星虽然也输给过新疆，但只有12分的差距。之前山东和青岛两队在季前赛上曾经相遇过一次，双方在尽遣主力的情况下，笑到最后的是青岛双星。上一轮青岛队轮空，再加上此番主场作战，胜利的天平似乎已向主队倾斜。
不过青岛双星主教练王伟力却给黄金男篮戴起了高帽，“山东队永远是我们的老大哥，在实力上双方还有差距。上一场山东队虽然输给新疆队30分，但我感觉山东队没有尽全力去打，孙杰没有上场，曹振华上场时间也不多。”谈到这场比赛的胜算把握有多少时，王伟力则打起了太极，“其实谁输谁赢都不重要，我们希望不管是黄金男篮还是青岛双星，都能够为山东篮球争光。我们两队交手，最重要的是互相学习，共同提高，为广大山东球迷奉献精彩的比赛。我们两队不管哪支球队杀进八强，都是山东篮球的光荣。当然，如果两队都能进入季后赛那是再好不过了。”
实则暗藏杀机
尽管青岛双星嘴上淡看德比战，但实际上他们非常迫切能够战胜黄金男篮。据悉，在俱乐部内部已经将这场比赛的胜负上升到能否冲进季后赛的高度。由于上一轮轮空，青岛双星从上周日就开始投入到本场比赛的准备当中，队员们通过电视观看了黄金男篮与新疆队的比赛，王伟力也专门召集队员看会，让大家献计献策。
此外，拥有主场之利的青岛双星还耍了点小聪明。黄金男篮昨天凌晨才抵达青岛，连续的舟车劳顿让队员疲惫不堪，而青岛方面却将适应场馆训练安排在今天上午九点。中午简单吃完饭后，他们第一时间回宾馆休息。“太累了，腿都快迈不动步了”，很多队员无奈地表示。
青岛球迷也对这场比赛跃跃欲试，“赢谁不如赢山东”已经成为青岛球迷的心声，据负责售票的工作人员介绍，“齐鲁德比”的球票卖得相当火爆。可以预料，12月22日晚，等待黄金男篮的将会是一场苦战。

description.hltext_display: Boeing Ups 777 Production Again - Analyst Blog
description.content:
The Boeing Company (BA) decided to spur the production rate of its 777 airplanes again to cope up with the increasing demand for this variant. Boeing will increase the production rate to 8.3 airplanes per month in the first quarter of 2013.
Citing a hike in demand, Boeing has already increased the production rate of 777 airplanes once in March 2010. The production rate was upped from 5 airplanes per month to 7 airplanes per month from Mid-2011.
The 777 airlines model is popular among airline operators since its launch in 1995. The cause for its popularity is its light weight, almost 19% lighter than its closest peers, and low fuel consumption. This airplane is also environmentally friendly emitting 22% less carbon dioxide per seat, and is operationally cheaper by 20% than peers.
As of December 14, 2010, net orders received by Boeing for 777 stands at 46 airplanes. The biggest order came from Emirates Airlines for 30 airplanes. The delivery of 777 through the first eleven months of the year touched 66 airplanes, making it the company's second highest selling model.
The commercial market space is showing gradual signs of improvement and the recent survey of The International Air Transport Association (IATA) forecast 2010 global passenger traffic to grow by 8% year over year. To meet the increasing demand, going forward, Boeing, in September 2010, increased the production rate of its Next-Generation 737 to 38 airplanes per month from the second quarter of 2013.
As of December 14, 2010, total net orders received by Boeing for its commercial airplanes stands at 482 airplanes, with the highest orders received for 737 airplanes followed by 777 airplanes, while the net orders for 787 airliners are in the negative.
Increased production rate of 777 airplanes will not have any material impact on 2010 financial results. The Zacks Consensus Estimates for fourth quarter fiscal 2010, fiscal year 2010 and fiscal year 2011 are a respective $1.11, $3.99 and $4.62 per share.
Boeing currently retains a Zacks #3 Rank (short-term Hold rating). The positive catalysts for the company are its order backlog and strong booking. However, the delay in delivery of 787 airplanes continues to be a cause for concern. We maintain a Neutral rating on the company.
Based in Chicago, Boeing Company designs and produces commercial airplanes, defense systems and civil and defense space systems. The major competitors of the company are General Dynamics Corp. (GD), Lockheed Martin Corporation (LMT) and Northrop Grumman Corporation (NOC).

description.hltext_display: Bukarest kritisiert Vorbehalte gegen Schengen-Beitritt
description.content:
Die Führung in Bukarest hat den Vorschlag Deutschlands und Frankreichs heftig kritisiert, den Schengen-Beitritt Rumäniens und Bulgariens zu verschieben. Aus der bulgarischen Hauptstadt Sofia verlautete unterdessen, man wolle sich bemühen, die Zweifel von EU-Partnern auszuräumen.
Rumänien und Bulgarien streben 2011 den Schengen-Beitritt an. Rumäniens Staatspräsident Traian Basescu sagte, der Brief der Innenminister Deutschlands und Frankreichs sei diskriminierend. “Wir werden keinerlei Diskriminierung hinnehmen, selbst dann nicht, wenn sie von den stärksten EU-Ländern kommt”, fügte er hinzu. Paris und Berlin kritisierten in dem Brief an die EU-Kommission Schwachstellen bei der Bekämpfung der Korruption und der Organisierten Kriminalität. Zum Schengen-Raum zählen heute 25 Länder, darunter 22 EU-Staaten – alle außer Großbritannien, Irland, Zypern, Rumänien und Bulgarien. Die Nicht-EU-Staaten Norwegen, Island und die Schweiz sind dem Abkommen ebenfalls beigetreten. Im Wesentlichen sieht dieses die Abschaffung von Grenzkontrollen und die polizeiliche Zusammenarbeit vor.
Copyright © 2010 euronews
Tags: EU-Erweiterung, Reise, Rumänien

description.hltext_display: Stockholm. Tar farväl med "Drottningoffret"
description.author: webmaster@kuriren.com
description.content:
De kallar sig för ett kvinnligt A-team. Regissören, manusförfattarna och huvudrollsinnehavarna i "Drottningoffret" är alla kvinnor - en ovanlighet i en mansdominerad bransch. Men i en tv-serie som skildrar kvinnors förhållande till makt hade något annat varit otänkbart.
Genombrott
Det är sex år sedan tv-tittarna för första gången fick stifta bekantskap med den unga, idealistiska miljöministern Charlotte Ekeblad och hennes kollegor och politiska fiender. "Kronprinsessan" innebar ett genombrott för den danska regissören Kathrine Windfeld, liksom skådespelaren Alexandra Rapaport. I "Drottningoffret", som börjar sändas den 27 december, är det dags att knyta ihop trådarna och ta farväl av Charlotte Ekeblad och de andra karaktärerna.
Ordet "lyxproduktion" nämns ofta under mötet med Alexandra Rapaport, skådespelarkollegan Suzanne Reuter och regissören Kathrine Windfeld. SVT har satsat ordentligt på filmatiseringen av Hanne Vibeke Holsts tre romaner och inte prutat på kvaliteten.
Alzheimersjuk
I "Drottningoffret" är det Elizabeth Meyer, socialdemokraternas partiordförande, som står i centrum. Suzanne Reuters rollfigur får mitt under brinnande valrörelse veta att hon lider av Alzheimers sjukdom. Hon bestämmer sig dock för att dölja sin sjukdom och genomföra valrörelsen.
För de allra flesta är Suzanne Reuter mest känd för sina komiska roller. I "Drottningoffret" ger hon visserligen prov på sin komiska tajming, men får också spela ut hela sitt dramatiska register i en ångestladdad skildring av begynnande demens.
Reuters mamma
Tv-serien innebar också att Suzanne Reuter för första gången fick spela mot sin egen mamma, 84-åriga skådespelerskan Bojan Westin som gör rollen som Elisabeth Meyers moster. En upplevelse, inte minst för tv-tittarna, hävdar Kathrine Windfeld.
Även om det är svårt att skiljas från Hanne Vibeke Holst-trilogin gläder sig teamet åt det beröm som tv-filmatiseringen fått under årens lopp. Lovorden har kommit ända från Rosenbad.

description.hltext_display: Marketing to Boomers: Media Part of the Problem, Key to the Solution Says ICAA
description.content:
“It’s time to rebrand aging from ‘burden’ to ‘opportunity,’” declares Colin Milner, a leading expert in active-aging
Vancouver, BC (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
As the 78 million Boomers start turning 65 in 2011, conventional ideas of what it means to be 65 are increasingly untrue. It once was thought that a 65-yearold was a burden on the health care system and society. Today, many 65-year-olds are contributing to the success of society and enjoying good health. What’s more, Boomers and their parents have 2.1 trillion dollars (1) in their pockets and were expected to spend 72 billion dollars (2) in 2009 on products and services that claim to help them stay healthier, longer.
Yet, stereotypic portrayals of older adults persist—with the result that 71% of adults over age 55 feel advertising does not reflect their current lifestyle (3) and are turned off by the marketing messages that target them today.
“The media has contributed to negative perceptions of aging by frequently showing scenarios such as ‘granny in the rocking chair’ and ‘I’ve fallen and I can’t get up—but not the other side of the picture,’” says Colin Milner, CEO of the International Council on Active Aging, a membership organization that brings together professionals in the independent and assisted living, fitness, rehabilitation and wellness fields to dispel society's myths about aging.
“We’re asking the media to use its power to help change those false perceptions by starting in the new year to portray older adults as vital, engaged, and independent,” Milner says. “While it’s true not everyone over age 65 is in good health, the same could be said of other demographics. It’s time to stop making false assumptions and perpetuating false expectations based on age alone.”
When it comes to the Boomer demographic, Milner suggests the following:
Instead of illness, think wellness. Instead of anti-aging, think active aging. Instead of decline, think potential. Instead of “cared for,” think responsible and independent. Instead of promoting ageist concepts, promote ageless concepts.
“Positive messages in the media can empower the many Boomers who, right now, are overturning stereotypes largely on their own. Getting the word out will help everyone focus not on ‘we’re nearing the end,’ but rather on ‘what’s next,’” Milner stresses. “By focusing on anti-aging, the media has contributed to the idea that aging is something wrong…to be feared…and to be treated with pills and potions. In fact, we’re all getting older from the day we’re born. That’s reality.”
Equally, true, for most people, turning 65 is not the start of the end; it’s the start of their next chapter. “At this point in history, the media has the opportunity to influence the future health of our nation by helping to create a positive and motivating social environment,” Milner says. “Research has found that thinking positively about getting older can extend one's life by 7.5 years--more than the longevity gained from low blood pressure or low cholesterol or by maintaining a healthy weight, abstaining from smoking and exercising regularly.” (4)
About the International Council on Active Aging
The International Council on Active Aging® is the professional association that leads, connects and defines the active-aging industry. ICAA supports professionals who develop wellness facilities, programs and services for adults over 50. The association is focused on active aging—an approach to aging that helps older adults live as fully as possible within all dimensions of wellness—and provides its members with education, information, resources and tools. As an active-aging educator and advocate, ICAA has advised numerous organizations and governmental bodies, including the US Administration on Aging, the National Institute on Aging (one of the US National Institutes of Health), the US Department of Health and Human Services, Canada’s Special Senate Committee on Aging, and the British Columbia ministries of Health, and Healthy Living and Sport.
1. Met Life Mature Market Institute Met Life. Demographic Profile of American Baby Boomers 2. BCC Research. Antiaging Products and Services. 3. Datamonitor. Targeting Seniors Effectively. 4. Levy, et al. Longevity Increased by Positive Self-Perceptions of Aging. Journal of Personality and Social Psychology.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4915284.htm

description.hltext_display: Στραγγάλισε το αγοράκι της λόγω... Ιντερνετ
Chino Valley Ranchers Introduces New Soy Free Egg to Customers Throughout California
description.content:
Organic egg producer looks to help consumers with soy allergies enjoy eggs
Arcadia, CA (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
Chino Valley Ranchers, a producer of organic eggs located in Arcadia, has introduced its new soy free egg in select grocery stores throughout California. As part of its larger push to educate the general market about the merits of eggs from chickens raised on soy free diets, the company has also launched a website and blog on the topic. The company looks to connect with consumers who suffer from soy based allergies, which may prevent them from eating one of nature’s most balanced foods.
Regarding the new soy free egg, Chino Valley Ranchers owner Steve Nichols said, “We’re proud of our new soy free egg and excited that it will help those who suffer from soy based allergies enjoy eggs again.” Nichols continued, “Many who suffer from soy allergies have given up eggs, believing their allergic reaction stemmed from the egg itself, rather than the soy based diet of the chicken producing that egg.”
Chino Valley Ranchers is a family owned and operated company located in Arcadia, CA and has been producing quality eggs for over 50 years. During this time, the company has constantly improved its ability to achieve the highest quality organic and cage free eggs for its customers. Chino Valley Soy Free Eggs are available throughout California. More information about Chino Valley Ranchers and its soy free egg can be found on its corporate website at http://www.soyfreeegg.com or by calling 1.800.354.4503.
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prwebsoy-free-egg/12/prweb4914764.htm

description.hltext_display: Saudi king leaves hospital in good health - agency
description.content:
"King Abdullah left the Presbyterian Hospital on Tuesday evening...as God gave him good health," the Saudi Press Agency said.
"He moved to his place of residence in New York to recuperate and continue with physical therapy," the statement said but did not say when he might return to Saudi Arabia.
Earlier in December, the state news agency said the king, believed to be 86 or 87, had a successful second operation to stabilise vertebrae in his spinal column.
The second operation was the completion of earlier surgery after a blood clot complicated a slipped disc.
Crown Prince Sultan, who has health problems of his own, returned from abroad to govern the world's largest oil exporter while Abdullah is away.
King Abdullah, who came to power in 2005, is the sixth leader of the top OPEC exporter and U.S. ally, whose political stability is of regional and global concern.

description.hltext_display: Uyghur detainees caught between superpowers
Making Math Real with Moody's Mega Math Challenge
description.content:
As America strives to become more competitive in the global economy, many schools across the U.S. are increasing their focus on math and science education and pushing for higher standards in science, technology, engineering, and math courses. Of equal importance, however, is the students’ ability to apply their knowledge to real-world issues: a skill that will eventually allow them to translate their education to successful careers in research and industry.That is the idea behind Moody’s Mega Math (M3) Challenge, an applied math modeling contest for high school juniors and seniors funded by The Moody's Foundation and organized by the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM).
Philadelphia, PA (PRWEB) December 21, 2010
As America strives to become more competitive in the global economy, many schools across the U.S. are increasing their focus on math and science education and pushing for higher standards in science, technology, engineering, and math courses. Of equal importance, however, is the students’ ability to apply their knowledge to real-world issues: a skill that will eventually allow them to translate their education to successful careers in research and industry.
That is the idea behind Moody’s Mega Math (M3) Challenge, an applied math modeling contest for high school juniors and seniors funded by The Moody's Foundation and organized by the Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM) .
The realistic focus of the contest—which is different from what students routinely encounter in standard school curricula—spotlights math as a powerful problem solving tool and educates participants on its relevance to worldly issues. For instance, participating teams in past years have pondered the effectiveness of ethanol as biofuel and have proposed ideas to improve the U.S. Census count.
“Being involved in this project (the M3 Challenge), I saw how pertinent [math] is to the everyday life of the average American citizen,” said Scott Yu, whose team won the top prize in the 2010 Challenge. “Seeing the tremendous role statisticians and mathematicians can have on American society—that was tremendously valuable and important to me.”
The goal of the Challenge is to motivate students to study and pursue careers in applied mathematics, economics, finance, and related fields. Winners are judged based on their approach, methods, and creativity in problem solving and math modeling, and receive scholarships totaling $100,000 toward the pursuit of higher education.
The next Challenge is scheduled for March 5-6, 2011. Working in teams of three to five, students will have 14 hours to solve an open-ended, realistic problem with the help of any free, publicly available, and inanimate sources of information. Teams can select their preferred Challenge day to work: Saturday, March 5, or Sunday, March 6. The problem will be completely unknown to them until they log in on their selected day.
The contest also hones students’ skills in public speaking, as the top six teams are required to present their papers to a panel of professional PhD-level mathematicians at the final event at Moody’s Corporation headquarters in Manhattan. Student experiences often extend well beyond the Challenge, as past years have seen successful teams interviewed on cable news shows and winning papers published in peer-reviewed journals. The contest provides students with yet another real-world experience, which will no doubt prove useful to them throughout their professional careers: working together as a team on a complex project under a tight deadline.
Contests like Moody’s Mega Math Challenge, which introduce core subjects to students in novel ways, have become more relevant as they value unique approaches and creativity as much as technical accuracy. “Not all students want to learn math by cramming from a textbook or working endless formulaic expressions,” says M3 Challenge Project Director Michelle Montgomery. “Some learn better by using data to solve a complex problem. Others find more relevance to their mathematics education by recognizing its impact on other fields.”
There’s no better endeavor than Moody’s Mega Math Challenge to offer students that unique experience.
So register now! Go to http://m3challenge.siam.org/participate/
About the Sponsor
The Moody's Foundation is a charitable organization dedicated to supporting a variety of nonprofit education, health and human services, civic, and arts and culture programs. Established by Moody's Corporation in 2001, the Foundation's primary area of giving is secondary and higher education with a focus on mathematics, economics, and finance. Further information is available at philanthropy.moodys.com.
Moody's is an essential component of the global capital markets, providing credit ratings, research, tools and analysis that contribute to transparent and integrated financial markets. Moody's Corporation is the parent company of Moody's Investors Service and Moody's Analytics, which encompasses the growing array of Moody's non-ratings businesses. The Corporation, which reported revenue of $1.8 billion in 2009, employs approximately 4,100 people worldwide and maintains a presence in 26 countries. Further information is available at http://www.moodys.com .
About the Organizer
The Society for Industrial and Applied Mathematics (SIAM), headquartered in Philadelphia, serves and advances the disciplines of applied mathematics and computational science by publishing a variety of books and prestigious peer-reviewed research journals, by conducting conferences, and by hosting activity groups in various areas of mathematics. It is an international society of over 13,000 applied and computational mathematicians and computer scientists, as well as other scientists and engineers. Members are researchers, educators, students, and practitioners from 90 countries working in industry, government, laboratories, and academia. The Society, which also includes nearly 500 academic and corporate institutional members, SIAM provides many opportunities for students including regional sections and student chapters. Further information is available at http://www.siam.org .
###
For the original version on PRWeb visit: http://www.prweb.com/releases/prweb2010/12/prweb4913884.htm

description.hltext_display: 阪神 第3のマスコット誕生へ
蔡振华让国足倒车回90年代
description.content:
再过10几天，多哈亚洲杯就要开打了。这既是虎年中国足球最后一战，又是明年6月起的2014年世界杯预选赛前哨战，重要性不言而喻。基于此，我决定明天去趟广东，现场看看国家队的训练比赛，增加点感性认知，也积累些鲜活素材。
不料，机票都定好了，来自广东的消息却让我十分纠结：从12月19日起，国家队将全面封训，直至31日启程赴卡塔尔！如此，我去广东有什么意义呢？既看不了训练，也接触不到教练球员，难道就为了看22日与马其顿的一场注水比赛？这场比赛CCTV将实况转播，在中国任何地方都能收看。此外就是新闻发布会了，但在那种公开场合，可以得到多少高洪波的真实想法？何况所有的内容，各大网站会第一时间原汁原味地呈现到网上。
一开始我还不太相信这一消息，以为就是22日比赛前封个一、两次，这是正常的，也是必要的。但打电话到前方一问，才发觉还真倒退到了1997年戚务生时代——所有训练都不对外开放，既包括球迷更包括记者；除了公开安排的新闻发布会，所有教练球员都不得接受记者采访；此外，所有教练球员都不得更新微博，等等。遥想当年，戚务生也不过如此。1996年兵败奥运会预选赛后，根据上峰的命令，在其后的世界杯预选赛备战期，中国队厉行封闭，由武警+狼狗看管着驻地，然后一天一个万米跑。
对于高洪波，我还是有点了解的，虽然性格内向，也不算很大气，但绝不迂腐，更不糊涂，作为从那个时代过来人，完全清楚圈养的灾难性后果。因此，他会在海口搞沙滩长跑，也会适当封闭训练，或许还会封杀某些发表“不友好”、“不真实”消息的记者、媒体，不过断然不会搞这种全程封闭。
进一步了解之后，我才知道，这完全是蔡振华的意思。在不久前到海口视察国家队训练时，蔡除了进行一通“把伤心留给对手”之类励志动员外，还传授了一些乒乓球的经验，其中就有“奋战XX天、决战世界杯”强化措施。虽然蔡局并没有说足球队一定要照搬乒乓球经验，但在咱们这个官本位至上的国度，官大一级压死人，既然顶头上司说了这些话，韦迪等还不赶紧“领会贯彻”？再说，作为从同一个模式下出来的前水上中心负责人，韦迪对这一套既熟悉又笃信，搞起来一点都没有违心感，于是就有了上述“军管”措施。
对了，蔡振华不仅要求国家队实行封闭训练，还真提出要军训。记得在谢亚龙时期，杜伊国奥队也搞过军训，但在场上，经过一段时间军训、还曾到天安门广场观看升国旗仪式的杜家军不是变成一支忠勇铁军了，而简直就是一盘散沙；在场下，蔚少辉等中方教练搞杜伊，郑智等球员也搞杜伊，如此勾心斗角、犯上作乱比乌合之众还不如。
我相信那些体育官员和教育官员并不了解军-队内情，才会那么盲目崇拜军训，足球队搞，篮球队、田径队及乒乓球队等也要搞。难道区区10来天的军训真得能够产生脱胎换骨的神效？不妨去看看贾秀全、隋东亮和姜坤等那些原八一队球员的德性吧，他们可是日复一日地军训了10多年呢。至于光荣的乒乓球队，不是也出了马琳、王浩等人才么？
就中国足球来说，戚务生时期的国家队、沈祥福时期的国奥队是搞军事化管理最变态的两支国字号球队，史称圈养，结果如何就不必说了吧。反之，近10年来成绩最好的米卢国家队和克劳琛国青队都不搞三从一大，米卢甚至公开宣言快乐足球理念。但2002年世界杯后，秉承长官意志，足球界发起了声势浩大的清算米卢运动，而米卢和克劳琛也不曾再获足协任用，即使外界一再呼吁、他们自己积极请战。
18日是周末，可是中国对爱沙尼亚之战居然只吸引了1000名球迷，惨淡如斯，固然与爱队实在太水有关，但不可否认，中国足协和国家队种种自绝于球迷、媒体的行为让国人爱无所爱。对此，韦迪不是把精力放在对连续请来两支超级水货球队的福特宝公司的整顿上，而是热衷于搞封闭训练之类空对空把戏，这种本末倒置不仅严重影响了高家军备战，也让更多的人远离中国足球。明天我到了广州，不知还会遭遇什么二十年未睹之怪事。

description.hltext_display: Britischer Minister stolpert über unbedachte "Kriegs"-Erklärung
description.content:
Der britische Wirtschaftsminister Vince Cable ist mit unbedachten Äußerungen ins Fettnäpfchen getreten und hat damit die Koalition in Bedrängnis gebracht. Um Schlimmeres abzuwenden, entzog der Regierungschef dem Liberaldemokraten daraufhin einen Teil seiner Kompetenzen.
Ohne zu wissen, dass er zu verdeckt arbeitenden Reportern des “Daily Telegraph” sprach, hatte Cable sich gebrüstet, einen “Krieg” gegen den Medienmogul Murdoch zu führen und wohl zu gewinnen. Zur liberal-konservativen Koalition erklärte er, er habe immer den Rücktritt als “nukleare Option”, falls die Konservativen zu weit gingen.
Publik wurden die markigen Worte gerade, als Premierminister Cameron und sein Juniorpartner Clegg die Koalitionsarbeit preisen wollten. Cameron entzog Cable daraufhin die Kompetenz für Wettbewerbsfragen im Medien- und Telekom-Sektor.
Denn im Kern geht es um Rupert Murdochs Versuch, den Rest der Anteile am britischen Fernsehnetzwerk BSkyB zu übernehmen. Die Europäische Kommission hat dies just in dem Moment genehmigt, in dem Cables Äußerungen veröffentlicht wurden. Jetzt muss noch die britische Wettbewerbsbehörde zustimmen. Cable, der gegen die komplette Übernahme BSkyB’s durch Murdoch ist, hätte das letzte Wort gehabt. Nun nicht mehr.

description.hltext_display: 日11月貿易盈餘比去年減少
description.content:
日本財務省今天公佈日本11月貿易統計初值，日本11月的進出口貿易盈餘，是1628億日元，比去年同期減少55.4%，這是三個月來首次和去年相比，呈現減少狀況。
不過統計資料指出，日本的「鋼鐵」與「金屬加工機械」等出口旺盛。

description.hltext_display: 2011 Budget - Senators Worry Over Implementation
description.content:
Mixed reactions Tuesday trailed the 2011 budget from Senators as they commenced deliberation on the general principles of the 2011 appropriation bill. This is just as a rights group, Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project, SERAP, petitioned the UN Committee on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights over the jumbo pay of Nigerian lawmakers.
While some Senators commended the spirit of the budget, others expressed scepticism about the ability of the Federal Government to fully implement the N4.2 trillion 2011 federal budget.
Senators were particularly concerned about the proposed N50 billion budgeted for job creation, noting that throwing the lump-sum amount into job creation without sound economic footing will not yield the desired results.
Senator Ahmed Lawal, ANPP, Yobe while commending the budget said it had the potential of suffering power implementation just like the previous budgets, noting that the government in trying to tackle unemployment must first of all address the problem of infrastructure, and the economy.
He said: "Job creation is not about putting money in schools and appointing Special Advisers as enumerated by our President. It requires sustained economic environment that will support investment."
Senator Victor Ndoma-Egba , PDP, Cross River called for a review in the running cost of government, noting that the current trend where government's expenditure topples money for capital expenditure will only drag the country back.
His words: "The real issue confronting Nigeria is the cost of running government at every level. If you go to the local government, the cost of running government at that level is not different from state and Federal Government. The time has come to look at the not only the structure of government but also the cost of running it. We have to ensure that more money is put in capital budget so that Nigerians will enjoy the benefits.
Senator Omar Hambagda, ANPP, Bornu also believes the 2011 budget may perform poorly given that the N50 billion proposed for job creation is not backed by any model. Meanwhile, the Socio-Economic Rights and Accountability Project, SERAP, has petitioned the UN Committee on Economic, Social and Cultural Rights over the jumbo pay of Nigerian lawmakers, arguing that it "undermines the country's international obligations to use its maximum available resources to fulfil the economic and social rights of Nigerians."
In the petition signed by its Executive Director, Adetokunbo Mumuni, SERAP said it is "seriously concerned that the unreasonable pay increase and allocation of 25 per cent of the country's revenues for salaries and allowances of the members of the National Assembly flies in the face of the requirements by the UN obligating states to allocate at least 26 per cent of revenue for education as Nigeria is currently allocating less than 10 per cent.

description.hltext_display: Skepticism greets N. Korean nuclear offer
US-Senat vor START-Ratifizierung
description.content:
Nach langem Tauziehen rückt die Ratifizierung des Start-Vertrages zwischen Russland und den USA näher. US-Präsident Barack Obama ist es gelungen genügend republikanische Senatoren zur Zustimmung zu bewegen, darunter auch Senator Lamar Alexander. “Ich werde für den Vertrag stimmen, weil er unserem Land genügend Atomsprengköpfe läßt, um jeden möglichen Angreifer in die Hölle zu bomben, denn der Präsident hat 85 Milliarden Dollar in den nächsten zehn Jahren versprochen, um sicherzustellen, dass diese Waffen funktionieren”, sagte der Senator aus Tennessee.
Viele Republikaner finden es unmöglich wie der Vertrag durch den Senat gepaukt wird: “Ich halte es für einen monumentalen Fehler, diesen Vertrag in dieser üblen Form am Ende der Legislaturperiode zu ratifizieren”, klagte Senator Lindsay Graham aus South Carolina.
Den Demokraten gelang es am Dienstagabend mit Hilfe von elf Republikanern die Schließung der Debatte im Senat durchzusetzen. Deshalb gilt es als äußerst wahrscheinlich, dass die Zweidrittelmehrheit für die Ratifizierung des START-Abkommens steht.
Copyright © 2010 euronews
Tags: Atomwaffen, Russland, USA

description.hltext_display: 부산銀, '러브포인트'로 이웃돕기 성금 기탁
description.content:
롯데선수단, 복지시설 방문 봉사
(부산=연합뉴스) 롯데자이언츠의 송승준, 손아섭, 전준우 선수(왼쪽부터) 등이 부산 강서구의 복지시설인 베데스다원을 찾아 원생들과 즐거운 한때를 보내고 있다. < > 2010.12.22 joseph@yna.co.kr
(부산=연합뉴스) 김상현 기자 = 부산은행[005280]은 올 시즌 프로야구 롯데자이언츠 선수들의 성적에 따라 적립한 러브포인트 3천만원을 22일 부산 강서구의 중중장애인 시설인 베데스다원과 영도구 파랑새 아이들 집 등 부산지역 주요 복지시설 8곳에 전달했다.
부산은행 러브포인트는 롯데구단이 홈경기에서 승리하거나 특정 선수가 일정 성적을 올릴 경우 은행에서 기부금을 적립해 연말 이웃돕기 성금으로 활용하는 제도다.
올 시즌에는 롯데 홈경기 승리 33승으로 1천650만원을 적립했고, 조정훈 투수의 5승, 이대호 선수의 44홈런, 홍성흔 선수의 2루타 28개 등으로 모두 3천만원을 적립했다.
올해 적립된 러브포인트 3천만원은 8개 사회복지시설에 나눠져 겨울 난방비 등으로 쓰여질 예정이다.
한편 롯데자이언츠 송승준 투수와 손아섭, 전준우 선수와 부산은행 신입행원 50명은 이날 베데스다원을 찾아 중증장애인 원생들과 성탄절과 연말 분위기를 함께 나누며 즐거운 시간을 보냈다.
joseph@yna.co.kr
부산은행 러브포인트 기탁
(부산=연합뉴스) 부산은행과 프로야구 롯데 선수들이 올 시즌 성적에 따라 적립한 러브포인트 3천만원을 부산지역 8곳 복지시설에 전달했다. < > 2010.12.22. joseph@yna.co.kr

description.hltext_display: Dimitrè Dinev: „Wenn meine Bücher gelesen werden, dann gerade deswegen, weil sie nicht Migrationliteratur sind, sondern Literatur sind"
description.content:
"Seit einiger Zeit pochten die Herzen der Kinder im Kindergarten schneller, die Aufmerksamkeit wuchs, […] denn alles erwartete die baldige Ankunft eines Mannes, dessen Existenz für Iskren ein großes Rätsel war. Es war der Weihnachtsmann. Es gab zwar kein Weihnachten mehr, aber es gab einen Weihnachtsmann. Die Kommunisten hatten ihn nicht abgeschafft, allein der Farbe seines Gewandes wegen, die die Popularität der Partei steigerte. Also schaute er weiterhin aus wie ein russischer General aus dem bulgarischen Befreiungskrieg. Er hatte nur die Identität gewechselt und hieß nun Großvater Frost. In seinem Lebenslauf konnte keine Verbindung zu irgendeiner religiösen Organisation nachgewiesen werden. Er durfte aber seine Rentiere, seine Schlitten, seinen weißen Bart, sein Haus in Sibirien und das auf dem Nordpol behalten. In der Sowjetunion trat er gerne in Begleitung von Frauen auf, wie etwa Schneewittchen, blieb aber weiterhin ledig. Neben der Aufgabe, die Kinder zu beschenken, bekam er noch eine, nämlich Frieden in der Welt zu stiften, was ihn so sehr erschöpfte, dass er kurz nach Neujahrsbeginn spurlos verschwand."
Diese Zeilen, geschrieben in Deutsch, stammen von einem bulgarischen Schriftsteller. Dimitrè Dinev, geboren 1968 in Bulgarien, lebt seit 1990 in Wien. Damals floh er aus der hoffnungslosen Situation, die auch nach dem Zusammenbruch des Kommunismus in Bulgarien herrschte, und erlebte in Österreich ein typisches Flüchtlingsschicksal mit dem Flüchtlingslager Traiskirchen und alle möglichen Jobs in Wien. Ohne Aufenthaltserlaubnis finanzierte er sein Studium der Philosophie und Russischer Philologie. Dinevs erste Veröffentlichungen wurden 1986 in bulgarischer, russischer und deutscher Sprache publiziert. Seit 1992 erscheinen regelmäßig Drehbücher, Übersetzungen, Theaterstücke und Prosa in deutscher Sprache. Den Durchbruch schaffte er jedoch 2003 mit seinem ersten Roman "Engelszungen", aus dem der kurze Auszug stammt. Die gut 600 Seiten umfassende Familiensaga wurde von Kritikern und Lesern gleichermaßen begeistert aufgenommen. Dimitrè Dinev lebt heute als freier Schriftsteller in Wien. Seit geraumer Zeit arbeitet er an seinem nächsten Roman. Zum Inhalt will Dinev noch nichts verraten, da ist es zu abergläubisch. Vielleicht nur soviel – Europa werde sicher eine große Rolle spielen. Mit Dimitrè Dinev unterhielt sich unsere Kollegin Vessela Vladkova.
Dimitrè Dinev ist heute nicht gerade oft in Bulgarien, aber seine Vergangenheit und die Erinnerungen aus der Heimat waren möglicherweise die Anregung für seinen Roman "Engelszungen". Erzählt werden die Familiengeschichten von Svetljo und Iskren aus Plovdiw, wobei das Buch den Bogen über fast fünfzig Jahre spannt – die Schiwkow-Ära, das Verhältnis der Bulgaren zum Kommunismus, die großen Schwierigkeiten und kleinen Freuden der Landsleute. Iskrens Vater ist ein orthodoxer Parteikarrierist; Svetljos Vater hingegen schafft als Milizionär im Sumpf des realen Sozialismus. Eine schicksalhafte Begegnung der Väter sorgt für die Verflechtung der Familiengeschichten, ohne dass sich die Söhne begegnen – bis zum Ende des Romans, als sie beide, inzwischen gescheiterte Existenzen, auf dem Wiener Zentralfriedhof vor Miros Grab stehen, eines serbischen Verbrechers, der kurz vor seinem Tod zum Schutzheiligen für alle Einwanderer wurde, und bereits zuvor gehörigen Einfluss auf beider Leben hatte.
Die Geschichte in "Engelszungen" erweckt den Anschein, es handele sich um Erlebnisse des Autors. Gibt es autobiografische Elemente im Roman?
"Der Leser soll immer so denken. Das bedeutet, dass ich es so lebendig geschrieben habe, dass man das Gefühl hat, der Autor hat es selbst erlebt. Es ist so überzeugend und wahrhaftig, dass der Leser es glaubt. Das ist aber auch das Schöne, denn so weiß ich, dass ich meinen Job richtig gemacht habe. Wenn man diese Stufe der Lebendigkeit erreicht hat, dann hat man seinen Job gut gemacht. Aber autobiografisch zu schreiben... Keine der Figuren bin ich. Ich bin auch nicht der Mensch, der gern über sich schreibt. Ich interessiere mich mehr für die anderen und weiß, wenn man über sich selbst schreibt, dann kommt man zu einer Grenze, weil man selber endlich ist. Es ist auch langweilig, über sich selbst zu schreiben. Ich bevorzuge, über andere zu schreiben, weil ich dann auch viele andere Leben leben kann."
Der Roman wurde von Kritikern und Lesern begeistert aufgenommen. Ich persönlich habe diesen 600 Seiten dicken Wälzer in einem Atemzug verschlungen. Für mich liegt die Magie des Buches in Ihrem ironischen Erzählstil. Ist die so typisch bulgarische Selbstironie und der schwarze Humor Ihr Geheimnis?
"Das kann ich nicht beurteilen. Ich kann nicht beurteilen, ob genau das ist, was die Leser fesselt. Ich bin überzeugt, dass man bestimmte Ereignisse nur über Humor übermitteln kann, aber ob der Humor allein diese magische Funktion übernehmen kann, kann ich nicht sagen. Es ist schön, dass Sie es so empfinden und ich bin froh über jede Interpretation, die ich höre. Wenn ich es geschafft habe, viele möglichen Interpretationen hervorzurufen, also den Leiten das Gefühl zu vermitteln, sie stehen vor einem großen Reichtum und können durch das Lesen viel für sich gewinnen, dann bin ich glücklich. Aber selber kann ich es nicht entscheiden, ich entscheide es auch nicht während des Schreibens. Viele der Dinge passieren einfach, so wie in einem magischen Prozess des Schöpfens, des Erfindens dieser Welt."
Ein Kritiker hatte geschrieben, dass der Roman keine nostalgische Geschichte sei, sondern eine universelle und vor allem europäische Geschichte. Die Handlung findet in Bulgarien, in einem relativ unbekannten europäischen Land statt. War es daher eine Art Mission für Sie, dieses Land, Ihre Heimat, für die Leser verständlicher zu machen?
"Ja, vielleicht unbewusst, zu erzählen, dass jeder Mensch die große Geschichte seines Landes irgendwie in einem Kometenschwanz mit sich bringt und nicht nur das ist, was man sieht – nicht nur der Verkäufer von Zeitungen auf der Straße, nicht nur die Putzfrau in einer Putzerei. Es ist mehr ein Versuch gegen die schnelle Bildung von Vorurteilen, gegen dieses Unwissen, was ein Mensch in sich trägt, wie reich jeder an Geschichten ist. Und da meine Geschichte von Bulgarien untrennbar ist, habe ich über Bulgarien erzählt."
Wenn man Sie im Internet googelt, stößt man über kurz oder lang auf die Bezeichnung "Migrationsautor" und "Migrationliteratur". Ärgert Sie dieser Begriff und was versteckt sich dahinter?
"Ja, das ist ein sehr ärgerlicher Begriff, weil der Begriff in der politischen Diskussion negativ belegt ist, und das wird natürlich sofort übertragen. Was ist schon Migrationliteratur? Man redet nicht über Migrationsymphonie oder Migrationbilder oder was auch immer in den anderen Sparten der Kunst. So etwas, wie Migrationsprache gibt es auch nicht, was ja in der Literatur ausschlaggebend ist. Es ist ein sehr diskriminierender Begriff und es ist ein Verrat an jeder Idee der Integration. Wenn man die letzte Stufe der Integration erreicht hat und Literatur in dieser neuen Sprache schreibt, eine Literatur, die dann in der Rezeption aufgenommen wird und dann in der Schule unterrichtet wird, also Teil der Kultur eines Landes wird, dann wird man im selben Augenblick verraten, man wird isoliert und als Migrationsautor oder was auch immer behandelt. Wenn meine Bücher gelesen werden, dann gerade deswegen, weil sie nicht Migrationliteratur sind, sondern Literatur sind."
Bald ist Weihnachten. Wie feiert man Weihnachten im Hause Dinev – nach bulgarischer oder österreichischer Tradition?
"Wir nehmen das Beste aus beiden Traditionen und wir wollen eben auf nichts verzichten, was gut ist. Also werden wir nach beiden Traditionen feiern."
Was wünschen Sie sich vom Weihnachtsmann?
"Das ist eine schwierige Frage, weil alle meine Wünsche einen eher geistigen, abstrakten Charakter haben. Man kann sie nicht in ein Päckchen hinein geben, es ist jedenfalls nichts Materielles. Es sind eher die uralten Wünsche nach Gesundheit in der Familie und Glück und Liebe."
Das hört sich sehr schön an, denn Weihnachten ist sehr kommerziell geworden, meinen Sie nicht auch?
"Natürlich, es ist ein total kommerzielles Fest geworden. Nun gut – die Geschäfte machen natürlich das Geschäft des Jahres, aber es ist sehr belastend für den Einzelnen geworden. Man versucht, alles, was man im Jahr verpasst hat, in diesem einen Geschenk für all seine lieben Leuten irgendwie zu kompensieren, und das geht natürlich nicht."
Um das Interview zu hören, klicken Sie bitte auf den Titel neben dem Audiosymbol.

description.hltext_display: � � 대병원, 거� �도 3개 농협과 MOU체결
description.content:
고신대병원, 거제도 3개 농협과 MOU체결
(부산=연합뉴스) 김선호 기자 = 고신대병원이 거가대로 개통으로 보다 가까워진 거제도의 환자유치를 위해 적극적으로 나서고 있다.
고신대병원은 최근 거제도 장유, 하청, 연초 농협과 상호교류와 보건업무를 연계하는 양해각서를 체결했다고 22일 밝혔다.
양해각서에 따라 고신대병원은 농협 임직원 및 직계가족의 건강지킴이 역할은 물론 지역의 저소득, 다문화 가정을 위한 보건업무 연계 등을 약속했다.
양 기관은 또 거가대로 개통으로 ▲지역사회 발전을 위한 연구개발 ▲보건 전문성 제고를 위한 협력 ▲지역민의 건강지킴이 역할 수행 ▲보건의료, 복지 등에서의 상호교류 ▲기타 양 기관의 발전 및 우호 증진을 위한 협력 등을 공동추진할 예정이다.
고신대병원 관계자는 "거가대로에서 가장 가까운 부산쪽 대학병원으로서 종합전문병원이 없는 거제지역 주민들에게 앞으로 수준높은 보건의료 서비스를 제공할 수 있도록 노력하겠다"고 말했다.
고신대병원은 지난달 거제대우병원, 백병원, 센텀병원과 협력병원 협약을 체결한데 이어 거제수협, 신협과 지정진료병원 협약을 체결한 바 있다.

description.hltext_display: Hartz IV im Vermittlungsausschuss: Ohne Gesetz kein Schulessen
description.author: Kerstin Schwenn, Berlin
description.content: Leistungen aus dem Bildungspaket für bedürftige Kinder wird es vorerst nicht geben: Der Geschäftsführer des Deutschen Städte- und Gemeindebundes, Gerd Landsberg, sagte dieser Zeitung: „Die Jobcenter machen jetzt gar nichts, und wir Kommunen auch nicht. Ohne Gesetz gibt es keine Leistung. Denn wir können nicht sicher sein, dass wir das Geld auch zurückkriegen." Die Kommunen fordern daher eine schnelle Einigung über die Hartz-IV-Neuordnung im Vermittlungsausschuss. „Solange das Gesetz nicht beschlossen ist, können die Jobcenter weder den höheren Regelsatz zahlen noch den Kindern das versprochene Bildungspaket gewähren", sagte Landsberg am Dienstag in Berlin. Dass Nachhilfe- oder Musikstunden, auf die bedürftige Kinder nach dem Urteil des Bundesverfassungsgerichts von Anfang 2011 an eigentlich einen Anspruch haben, schon im Januar beginnen, schließt er damit aus. Landsberg weist auf ein Problem hin, dass bald die Sozialgerichte beschäftigen könnte: Der Aufschlag von 5 Euro kann rückwirkend gezahlt werden; bei der Nachhilfestunde oder dem Schulmittagessen geht das nicht. „Niemand kann im Februar nachträglich für Januar in der Schule Mittag essen." Derzeit liefen in Jobcentern und Kommunen nur die organisatorischen Vorbereitungen für das Bildungspakt von Arbeitsministerin Ursula von der Leyen (CDU). Die Eltern könnten für ihre Kinder Anträge auf Förderstunden oder andere Leistungen stellen. Die Städte und Gemeinden seien darauf vorbereitet. Diese Anträge würden auch bearbeitet, um die Zeit zu nutzen, aber noch nicht gewährt. Insgesamt geht es um rund 2,3 Millionen Kinder und Jugendliche, deren Eltern Hartz IV beziehen. Hinzu sollen nach dem Willen der Opposition noch rund 140 000 Kinder kommen, deren Eltern zwar keine Grundsicherung erhalten, deren Einkommen aber so niedrig ist, dass sie Anspruch auf Wohngeld haben. Für eine solche Erweiterung hat sich von der Leyen offen gezeigt. Das Vermittlungsverfahren sollte nach Auffassung des Städte- und Gemeindebundes außerdem dazu genutzt werden, Kosten und Bürokratie zu minimieren. „Wie von der Mehrheit der Länder gefordert, wäre es sinnvoll, den Städten und Gemeinen eine Pauschale zu zahlen, aus der sie das Paket für die Kinder in Eigenregie umsetzen", sagte Landsberg. „Der Bund will 750 Millionen Euro dafür ausgeben. Uns wäre es am liebsten, der Bund gäbe jeder Kommune eine Pauschale, errechnet aus dem anteiligen Betrag je Kind und der Zahl der Kinder im Hartz-Bezug. Dann könnten die Kommunen das Teilhabepaket und das Mittagessen organisieren. Das würde Bürokratiekosten und Personal sparen und das Verfahren beschleunigen. Und an dem individuellen Rechtsanspruch des einzelnen - wie ihn das Verfassungsgericht festgelegt hat - änderte diese Konstruktion nichts." Landsberg verweist darauf, dass die Leistungen für jedes einzelne Kind nicht gedeckelt sind und etwa die Nachhilfe bei Bedarf auch deutlich üppiger ausfallen kann, als der Durchschnittsbetrag es erlaubt. Auch die 750 Millionen Euro im Haushalt seien keine feste Obergrenze. Die Jobcenter in Eigenregie mit der ungewohnten Bildungsaufgabe zu betrauen, hält Landsberg für keine gute Idee. In der Praxis sollte es so ablaufen, dass die Kommunen im Auftrag des Jobcenters die Leistungen organisierten und abrechneten, da sie einen genauen Überblick über die Vereinsstruktur (Musikschulen, Sportvereine, Nachhilfeeinrichtungen) hätten. Von der Leyen will in den Jobcentern rund 1300 neue Stellen bewilligen, damit sie die neue Aufgabe erfüllen können. Dafür sind 135 Millionen Euro vorgesehen. Die Opposition kritisiert diesen Plan. Die Erhöhung des Hartz-IV-Regelsatzes um 5 Euro und dessen Berechnung hält der Deutsche Städte- und Gemeindebund dagegen für akzeptabel. „Wer einen Regelsatz von mehr als 400 Euro fordert, nimmt in Kauf, dass damit die Zahl der Leistungsempfänger um weitere 2 Millionen Personen steigt und erhebliche Belastungen für die Kommunen mit sich bringt." In der öffentlichen Debatte werde zu wenig beachtet, dass neben dem Grundbetrag auch die Kosten für Kranken- und Pflegeversicherung sowie die kompletten Unterkunftskosten übernommen würden. Text: F.A.Z.Bildmaterial: dapd, dpa

description.hltext_display: 校園報佳音 聖誕五禮祈福
description.content:
小朋友期待的聖誕節快到了，宜蘭縣一所國小今天中午辦理「聖誕節暨新年報佳音活動」，學校特別為每位小朋友準備意義深厚的聖誕五禮，包括「鉛筆、橡皮擦、尺、彩虹筆及OK繃」，由校長扮演耶誕老人發送，期待孩子們在未來一年當中學業進步、收穫滿滿。
宜蘭市南屏國小在音樂班及弦樂團悠揚的樂聲中，發送全校小朋友每人一份由「鉛筆、橡皮擦、尺、彩虹筆及OK繃」組合而成的聖誕禮物，代表著師長們對孩子的期許及鼓勵，校長陳正華指出：鉛筆代表學業進步、橡皮擦代表改過向善、尺期許做人正直、彩虹筆希望生活充實多采多姿，而OK繃則是勉勵勇往直前，克服挫折。學校希望藉著五樣用品讓孩子自省而能改過遷善，並帶著勇氣迎向新年。

description.hltext_display: الاسهم اليابانية تنخفض بعد بلوغها أعلى مستوى في سبعة أشهر
description.content:
طوكيو (رويترز) - تراجعت الاسهم اليابانية يوم الاربعاء بعدما سجلت أعلى مستوى في سبعة أشهر في التعاملات المبكرة اذا دفعت تعليقات متشائمة من جانت رئيس الوزراء المستثمرين لتعديل مراكزهم حول مستويات جديدة.
وقلصت الحكومة اليابانية توقعاتها للصادرات ومعنويات قطاع الاعمال يوم الأربعاء بسبب تباطؤ الانتعاش الاقتصادي في اسيا واستمرار قوة الين. وقالت أيضا ان الاقتصاد لا يبارح مكانه وفي موقف صعب في ظل نسبة بطالة مرتفعة.
وانخفض مؤشر نيكي القياسي لاسهم الشركات اليابانية الكبرى 0.2 بالمئة أي ما يعادل 24.05 نقطة ليصل الى 10346.48 نقطة. وكان قد سجل في وقت سابق يوم الأربعاء أعلى مستوى في سبعة أشهر عند 10394.22 نقطة.
ونزل مؤشر توبكس الاوسع نطاقا 0.1 بالمئة الى 905.78 نقطة.

description.hltext_display: "불교계 명예 실추됐다"..범어사, 경찰수사 항의
description.content:
재발방지와 함께 방화범 조속 검거 촉구
(부산=연합뉴스) 이종민 기자 = 부산 범어사 주지 정여스님은 22일 부산지방경찰청을 방문해 천왕문 방화사건 수사와 관련해 범어사의 명예가 실추됐다며 강력 항의했다.
정여스님은 경찰에 전달한 항의문을 통해 "속초에서 입적하신 스님이 범어사 스님이라는 이유만으로 화재사건과 마치 연관성이 있는 것처럼 수사내용을 언론에 발표해 당사자와 조계종 스님 전체의 명예를 실추시켰다"라며 재발 방지를 요구했다.
또 "경찰청의 공식 사과와 함께 담당자의 문책이 뒤따라야 한다"라며 "하루빨리 천왕문 방화범이 검거될 수 있도록 총력을 다 해줄 것"을 촉구했다.
경찰은 지난 20일 오후 2시 강원도 속초시 한 모텔에서 목을 매 숨진채 발견된 스님의 죽음이 범어사 방화사건과는 관련성이 없는 것으로 확인됐으나, 여타 관련성을 계속 수사 중이라고 밝힌 바 있다.
조사결과 이 스님은 천왕문 화재 당시 마산의 모 사찰에 있었던 것으로 확인돼 방화사건과는 관련이 없는 것으로 확인됐다.

description.hltext_display: Solidaritätsdemos für festgenommene Oppositionelle in Weißrussland
description.content:
Etwa hundert Regimegegner haben in Weißrussland vor einem Gefängnis eine Mahnwache für die weit über 600 Demonstranten abgehalten, die bei den Protesten nach der Präsidentschaftswahl festgenommen worden waren. Die meisten sind im Eilverfahren zu fünf bis fünfzehn Tagen Haft verurteilt worden. Auch fünf Gegenkandidaten des Amtsinhabers Alexander Lukaschenko sind weiter in Haft.
“Die Behörden testen, wieviel die Opposition aushält, was die Zivilgesellschaft aushält, und wie demokratische Länder reagieren. Es ist sehr wichtig für uns, zu zeigen, dass wir extrem negativ reagieren. Wir verlangen die Freilassung dieser Menschen, denn sie werden aus politischen Gründen festgehalten”, erklärt der Sacharow-Preisträger und frühere Präsidentschaftskandidat Alexander Milinkevich, der vor vier Jahren gegen Lukaschenko antrat.
Die Opposition klagt über Wahlfälschung.
Die Behörden bestätigten, dass bei den Protesten am Sonntag auch Ausländer festgenommen wurden, darunter russische Journalisten.
Auch in London demonstrierten Schauspieler vor Weißrusslands Botschaft aus Solidarität zu festgenommenen weißrussischen Kollegen. Die EU und die UN-Menschenrechtskommissarin verlangten die Freilassung der Oppositionellen. Ungeachtet aller Proteste erklärte Präsident Lukaschenko, es gebe keine Revolution in Weißrussland.
Copyright © 2010 euronews
Tags: Aljaksandr Lukaschenka, Demonstration, Wahlen, Weißrussland

description.hltext_display: Foodies fight with film school for space in LA
description.content: Fans of the Hollywood Farmers Market are hoping for a permanent resolution to the permitting dispute that's been threatening the weekly produce bazaar.

description.hltext_display: ２０１０年度10大匪夷所思进球（视频）
Johnson's swing stunned England: Pietersen
description.author: Greg Buckle
description.content:
Outspoken England batsman Kevin Pietersen says Australia's Mitchell Johnson caught the tourists by surprise in Perth but it won't happen again.
Dropped for the second Test and recalled for last week's third Ashes Test in Perth, Johnson took 6-38 and 3-44 to guide Australia to a 267-run win to level the five-match series at one-all.
"We knew he could swing it but we didn't realise he could swing it that much," Pietersen told reporters on Wednesday.
"He obviously did some really good work in the week that he had off, but we're going to be a lot better prepared for it here in Melbourne, so we'll play him a lot better."
Fierce rivals since the 2009 Ashes series, Pietersen and Johnson were at each other's throats in the Perth Test and the mood wasn't helped by Pietersen's apparently sarcastic attempt to repair the friendship by asking for the Australian's phone number.
Johnson later told a WACA press conference Pietersen was a "smart arse".
"I didn't give him my phone number, that's for sure," Johnson said.
"I don't think he was being friendly. I did say something to him but I can't say what."
Asked about his relationship with Johnson, Pietersen dead-panned: "I don't have a relationship with Mitchell Johnson."
As controversy rages over several incidents involving the Australian and England teams during last week's third Test in Perth, Pietersen says the verbal confrontations were nothing out of the ordinary.
Pietersen said he had faced some "pretty big verbal contests" from Shane Warne and Glenn McGrath during England's previous Ashes tour four years ago.
Australian pace bowler Peter Siddle clashed verbally with England batsman Matt Prior when Prior was dismissed during the Perth Test in one of several heated incidents during the match.
But Pietersen says the tension out on the field is no different to any other Ashes encounter.
"I think you guys feed them some good lines," Pietersen told reporters.
"They talk a lot. Nothing's different.
"There's not really any big chirpers or big sledgers, it's just England versus Australia. It's an Ashes series.
"Blokes get a bit red mist occasionally. You're allowed to do that on both teams.
"But there's nothing that's been overboard."
England can retain the urn with victory in Melbourne or the fifth Test in Sydney.
Pietersen said he had goose-bumps thinking about playing in front of a possible world-record crowd of 91,000 on Sunday at the MCG.
And he was confident pace bowler Jimmy Anderson would be fit to take his place in the England side despite picking up a side injury.
With Stuart Broad out of the tour with injury and young quick Steve Finn looking fatigued during the WACA Test, Anderson's withdrawal would cause a further shake-up of the touring side's attack.
Anderson bowled well in the opening two Tests in Brisbane and Adelaide before his form dipped in Perth after flying home to England for the birth of his second child.
Tim Bresnan or Ajmal Shahzad would come into the England side for their Ashes debut if Anderson was ruled out.

description.hltext_display: 老奶奶藏珠寶 忘了 子孫三十年後開箱 樂了
부산 체험형 부산교통테마공원 개관
description.content:
(부산=연합뉴스) 김선호 기자 = 어린이 교통안전 교육의 중심이 될 '서북부산권 교통안전교육 테마공원(이하 교통테마공원)'이 22일 오후 개관식을 갖고 본격적인 운영에 돌입했다.
개관식엔 허남식 부산시장을 비롯한 주요 인사와 시민 등 500여명이 참석해 4년여만에 이뤄진 교통테마공원 개관을 축하했다.
교통테마공원은 부산 북구 구포 근린공원 내 1만6천668㎡의 부지에 건립됐고, 주요 시설로는 지상 3층 규모의 실내체험관과 야외교육장, 산책로, 휴식 공간 등을 갖췄다.
실내체험관은 최첨단 영상시설인 4D입체영상관을 비롯해 3D 홍보 영상 관람시설, 교통수단과 자동차발달사를 보여주는 패널과 모형자동차, 안전벨트 착용체험 코너 등으로 구성됐다.
야외 체험장은 시가지를 축소해 놓은 형태로, 도로와 건널목, 육교, 신호등, 모형버스 등의 시설을 갖추고 대중교통 이용, 교차로·육교.건널목 통행방법 체험이 가능하도록 꾸며졌다.
특히 미니 전동차를 타고 직접 도로를 주행하면서 신호등에 맞춘 통행방법 등을 체험시설을 갖춰 지난 11월 시범교육기간 유치원.어린이집 교사들의 좋은 평가를 얻었다.
교통안전교육은 실내체험과 야외체험 순서로 총 140분 정도 소요되도록 했다.
개관시간은 평일 오전 9시~오후 6시(토요일 오전 9시~오후 1시)이며, 일요일과 법정공휴일은 휴관하고, 입장료는 무료다.
북구청 관계자는 "공원의 주제를 자연과 함께 하는 건강한 공원, 과학적 사고와 미래 지향적인 상상력을 키우는 공원, 직접 느끼고 체험할 수 있는 놀이형 교육으로 잡고 어린이의 눈높이에 맞춘 전국 최고의 시설을 도입했다"고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: 冯仁亮被曝涉嫌改年龄 或� 缘布帅国奥名单
description.content:
北京时间12月21日，上海足坛再次爆出一条惊人的消息：上赛季在中超联赛中表现出色的申花小将冯仁亮涉嫌更改年龄，足协正在对此事进行调查，并且有可能处罚上海申花和火车头两家俱乐部。
无论是媒体还是球迷都一直在质疑，为什么1989年出生的冯仁亮从来没有入选过国奥队，也没有参加亚运会的比赛。昨天足球运动管理中心副主任于洪臣终于证实，“冯仁亮年龄涉嫌造假，足协正在派专人调查此事”。
根据今年中超联赛的秩序册，冯仁亮的年龄是1989年1月8日，按此年龄计算，冯仁亮属于参加伦敦奥运会的适龄球员。不过，在国家队有着突出表现的冯仁亮之前却无缘国奥队，这样的怪事情一度引发球迷和媒体的疑惑。昨天上海媒体披露，为了让冯仁亮代表火车头体协参加全运会，1988年出生的冯仁亮年龄被改成了1989年。这一说法随后得到了于洪臣的证实，“足协已经派专人展开调查，一旦问题属实，将进行严厉处罚”。

description.hltext_display: Sample Preparation and Library Preparation for DNA Sequencers (Results of The Kalorama Survey of Labs)
description.content:
Sample preparation and library preparation are important steps in the DNA sequencing process with specialty products and companies. Based on a survey of labs worldwide conducted by Kalorama biotech analyst Justin Saeks, this report provides detailed information on the current state of the DNA sequencing sample preparation and library preparation steps for next-generation systems as well as sample preparation, cycle sequencing and sequencing reaction cleanup with capillary systems. The report's perspective is demand-side, focusing on what labs are doing today.
The information in the report from survey results includes:
Number of Sequencers Owned and Model Owned
Typical Applications and Libraries Run (by percentage)
How often or How many samples (runs, samples, slides, flow cells, plates, multiplexed or not) and Typical Output (reads, read length).
Changes Sought in Sequencer features, or steps in the Sequencing Process
Main bottlenecks in your sequencing process
Sources of the samples (human, bacteria, plant)
Types of Targeted Enrichment Products do you use?
Systems Used for Checking Concentration, Size, and/ or Quality
Importance of Cost, Throughput, Flexibility, Reproducibility, Robustness, User-friendliness; Accuracy and other factors.
Brands Used for DNA or RNA extraction and purification?
Brands Used for Fragmentation and Library Preparation?
Brands Used for the Amplification/ Polymerases, Dyes, and Sequencing Cleanup
Third Party Liquid Handlers Used
Barriers to 2nd- and 3rd-generation sequencers Use
Analyst Findings
The study focuses on a survey of 120 laboratories which was carried out from July to September of 2010, with the majority in the latter portion. Along with questions about the specific sequencers used in the labs, the respondents were asked about the sample preparation and library preparation kits, reagents, and other consumables used for sequencing.
The survey effort targeted any lab that uses sequencing for any application, but with the goal of achieving as close as possible to a representative breadth of labs. Due to the increasing importance of 2nd and 3rd-generation systems in the market, the scope leans towards these types of sequencers.
However, the market inevitably includes both, as 47 of the 87 surveyed labs with next-generation systems also have capillary sequencers. Around a third of the systems in the respondents’ labs overall are capillary systems. The mix of labs reached in the surveys provides both diverse industry segments as well as groups of labs with both types of systems, only capillary systems, or only next-generation systems.

description.hltext_display: The Andersons Hikes Dividend - Analyst Blog
description.content:
The board of directors of The Andersons Inc. (ANDE), in its effort to increase value to its shareholders, has approved a 22% increase in its quarterly dividend. Andersons will now pay a quarterly dividend of 11 cents per share, up from 9 cents paid on October 22, 2010. The increased dividend will be paid on January 24, 2011, to shareholders of record as of January 3, 2011.
Andersons has had a consistent track record of paying quarterly dividends, as exemplified by its latest hike that marked the 57th consecutive quarterly dividend as well as approval of the company’s first quarter 2011 dividend. Andersons has an annualized dividend yield of 1.03%. The company ended the third quarter with a cash balance of $28.6 million.
The previous dividend hike was in February 2010 when the board approved of a 2.9% increase.
Andersons reported its third quarter earnings of 8 cents a share, a penny ahead of prior-year results due to strong operating results at the Plant Nutrient Group. Given the Plant Nutrient Group’s performance so far in 2010, it seems to be gearing up to deliver its second best performance after record results in 2008. Historically, the segment registers little or no income during the third quarter, a trend that was overwhelmingly reversed in this reported quarter.
The Zacks Consensus Estimate for fourth-quarter 2010 is 91 cents per share. For full years 2010 and 2011, the Zacks Consensus Estimates are, respectively, $3.02 per share and $3.43 per share.
The quantitative Zacks #3 Rank (short-term Neutral rating) for the company indicates no clear directional pressure on the stock over the near term.
Maumee, Ohio-based Andersons is a diversified company operating in five different business segments ranging from buying, selling and storing grain to leasing railcars and running retail stores catering to the latest home hardware needs.

description.hltext_display: WEATHER: EU slams airports for ‘unacceptable’ disruptions caused by snow
description.author: Jade BARKER
description.content:
AFP - The EU lashed out at airports Tuesday for the "unacceptable" disruption caused by freezing weather across Europe as fresh snowfall added to the woes of thousands of stranded Christmas travellers.
Britain said it could use troops to end the disruption at London Heathrow, where passengers have been sleeping in terminals throughout four days of chaos, while Frankfurt and Dublin airports faced severe disruption. The cold snap chaos also hit Europe's rail network with long queues snaking outside the London terminal for the Eurostar train link between Britain, France and Belgium. WINTER TRAVEL GUIDE TRAVEL In Brussels, the European Commission warned snowbound airports they could face regulation unless they "get serious" and provide airlines with enough support during severe weather in future. "I am extremely concerned about the level of disruption to travel across Europe caused by severe snow. It is unacceptable and should not happen again," European transport commissioner Siim Kallas said. Eurocontrol, the continent's air traffic supervisory body, said about 3,000 flights had been cancelled across Europe on Tuesday, with similar numbers of cancellations for each of the past four days. At Heathrow, Europe's busiest airport, around two-thirds of flights were cancelled but the air hub's second runway reopened late Tuesday, prompting hopes an end to the crisis was in sight. British Prime Minister David Cameron said he had offered to use the military to help Spanish-owned British airports operator BAA, but this offer had been refused. "The people stuck there are having an incredibly difficult time, especially just a few days from Christmas, and everything must be done to either get them on holiday or get them home safely," Cameron told a press conference. Despite the opening of the second runway, BAA chief executive Colin Matthews warned people not to expect the situation to return to normal immediately. "It is good news to see aircraft taking off and landing from two runways but it's really important that passengers understand that doesn't mean the full schedule is going to be restored instantly," he told Sky News television. Anger was meanwhile mounting among passengers queuing in the cold outside the terminal buildings at Heathrow. "I think this hurts the reputation of the whole country. The airport is the first experience you have and this is not a good experience," Gustaf Malmstrom, 23, told AFP as he tried for a fifth day to get a flight to Stockholm. Most of Heathrow's five terminals were only letting in people who were flying on Tuesday morning, mainly on flights to Asia, while others had to queue outside. Workers handed out silver foil blankets and set up two heated tents. Eurostar said it was running a restricted service and asked all customers booked to travel before Christmas to refund or exchange their tickets free of charge if their journey was not essential. The queue of passengers stretched for more than a kilometre around the imposing St Pancras station, and Eurostar warned the chaos looked set to continue. "It's too early at the moment to say when we will get back to normal," a spokeswoman told AFP. In Germany fresh snowfall caused gridlock at the country's main airport Frankfurt with no flights taking off or landing for around three and a half hours in the morning. By the time it reopened at around 0800 GMT, 300 of the 1,300 daily flights at Europe's third-largest airport were cancelled, while others were diverted to Munich. More than 1,000 travellers spent the night at Frankfurt airport, which laid out camp beds and distributed drinks, sandwiches and soft buttered pretzels. Many internal flights were cancelled because of the arctic conditions, prompting German train company Deutsche Bahn to announce additional services on major routes across the country to help stranded travellers. Dublin airport grounded all flights until 0800 GMT on Wednesday after Ireland was hit by more than 15 centimetres (six inches) of snow. In France authorities allowed the two main airports in Paris, Charles de Gaulle and Orly, to remain open around the clock to clear the backlog of delayed flights. One hundred civil security personnel had been sent on Monday evening with 300 beds and 2,500 blankets for those still stranded at Charles de Gaulle.

description.hltext_display: Are symptoms indicating grand-mal seizures?
description.content:
Bucks County Courier Times
Dear Dr. Gott: I am writing about someone I know. He is 40 years old and has had the following symptoms for at least the past 10 years: fits of rage, seizure-like episodes (unconscious, body goes rigid, convulses, wets self, confusion, weakness and vomiting), hand tremors, neck and shoulder pain, and self-confessed fainting spells (although these may have been seizures). Two times following seizures, tests gave no indication of having had a seizure.
Dear Reader: This individual has most of the symptoms of grand-mal seizures. This type of seizure is dramatic and is what most people picture when they hear the word "seizure."
His symptoms of fits of rage, hand tremors and neck and shoulder pain may be related brain damage caused by the seizures or the result of head trauma caused by falling or flailing around during the seizure.
Another type of seizure, known as a frontal-lobe seizure, can cause emotional symptoms, such as rage, depression and euphoria.
I strongly recommend that a neurologist see this gentleman for a complete examination and extensive testing. The specialist will need to know what testing he has had in the past, whether he is on any medication, how much alcohol he drinks, whether he uses illicit drugs, how often the seizures occur, when his first seizure occurred and whether it directly followed anything, such as head trauma, and more.
Your brief note doesn't say whether he is under the care of a neurologist. If he is, why isn't he on medication (which I assume is the case, since you don't mention it) to help control the seizures? Untreated seizure disorders can be life-threatening, not only to the sufferer but to others. For instance, if he has a seizure while driving, he will lose control of his car, and if others are also on the road with him (or in the car), they are in danger as well.
As for the normal testing, many people with seizure disorders can have normal MRIs, so this may not be indicative of anything.
Unless he is ignoring the condition and refusing medical treatment, there is no good reason for him to have gone undiagnosed and untreated for 10-plus years. He needs to get to a doctor before he does permanent/further damage to himself or harms those around him.
Dear Dr. Gott: Two things. First, do you have any help for hair loss (secondary to hypothyroidism)? Second, in nurse's training, we learned that castor oil applied carefully on the eyelids at night and washed off with baby shampoo in the morning grew beautiful, thick lashes. A few weeks ago, I decided to wipe the extra on my dry cuticles, and it helped.
Dear Reader: Thank you for the tip about castor oil. I hope my readers will benefit from it.
Now to your hair-loss question. If your thyroid hormones are not within normal limits, this may be contributing to your problem. If they are, you may be experiencing hair loss for a number of other reasons, such as a vitamin deficiency, genetics or a scalp condition. If you have itching, scaling or other issues with your scalp, make an appointment with a dermatologist.
There are several types of shampoo purported to promote hair growth with various B vitamins and/or biotin. My readers have had success in the past with the Tresemme line. Rogaine is the other over-the-counter product shown to work in studies, but it can be expensive, and results reverse when the product is discontinued. You may wish to try adding a B multivitamin to your diet.

description.hltext_display: 동명대 공용장비센터, 기� 지원 � �문기관 '우뚝'
description.content:
동명대 공용장비센터, 기술지원 전문기관 '우뚝'
(부산=연합뉴스) 김상현 기자 = 동명대 산학협력단의 공용장비센터가 지역 중소기업의 기술지원 전문기관으로 자리매김하고 있다.
동명대는 산학협력중심대학 2단계 사업을 시작한 이후 지난해 하반기부터 최근까지 모두 145개 지역 업체에서 공용장비센터를 이용해 442건의 기술개발 성과를 거뒀다고 22일 밝혔다.
특히 지난 3월 중소기업청에서 지원하는 '연구장비공동이용사업' 주관기관으로 선정되면서 2개월만에 7개 업체에서 참여하는 24건의 대형수주를 기록하는 실적을 거두기도 했다.
동명대 공용장비센터는 또 정밀측정기사 국가검정자격증 취득을 위한 특강을 연 2차례 실시해 수강생의 90%가 자격증을 취득하는 성과를 올렸다.
이와 함께 중소기업진흥공단 부산경남연수원과 공동 교육과정을 운영하면서 정밀측정실무 일반 및 고급과정을 개설해 운영하고 있다.
동명대 신동석 산학협력중심대학사업단장은 "동명대 공용장비센터는 대학 안에 위치한 일반 장비센터와 달리 수요자인 기업이 모여 있는 녹산공단에 위치해 지역의 중소기업들이 손쉽게 이용할 수 있는 장점이 있다"며 "신뢰성 있는 기술전문기관으로 도약하기 위해 KOLAS 인증도 추진하고 있다"고 말했다.

description.hltext_display: HAITI: French families fetch adopted Haitians in time for Christmas
description.author: Nicolas Germain
description.content: AFP - French families arrived in Haiti late Tuesday to fetch a group of Haitian children they adopted in the wake of a devastating earthquake that ravaged the impoverished country nearly a year ago. "What a relief. These families have waited for a year after the earthquake and some no longer believed it would happen," French Ambassador Didier Le Bret said as he welcomed the adoptive parents arriving aboard a government-chartered plane in Port-au-Prince. "They have shown patience and respect for the Haitian government." Did change in French foreign minstry speed up process? //!-- jQuery.extend(true, Drupal.settings, } } } }); //--! By Maeva BAMBUCK in Port-au-Prince The group of 105 parents is due to return to Paris later Tuesday with a first batch of 113 children, in time for Christmas. A second flight was due to make the same trip on Thursday. A total of 318 adopted Haitian children are included in a special program to bring them to France after disruptions caused by the earthquake. The children were all in the process of being adopted when a massive quake struck on January 12, killing over 250,000 people and causing the parents' adoptions to be delayed with some of their records lost in the rubble. They were given special consular documents allowing them to go to France, despite not yet having French passports. About 700 other children whose files were found to be in order have already been brought to France. Rui Pereira, who came to fetch his six-year-old son Woodson, said he had suffered during the many months of waiting. "The wait was difficult, but we are proud to be able to bring them back home with us and hope they will lead accomplished lives. We will give them lots of love," he told AFP. Doctors and a crisis management team also traveled to Port-au-Prince to accompany the adopted children. The children and their parents were led to the French ambassador's residence in the capital, where tents were erected. Doctors will then examine the children, especially in light of the deadly cholera outbreak that has swept through Haiti in recent months, killing 2,500 people. France took a leading role in the international aid effort after the earthquake, but associations representing adoptive families accused the government of being slow to act for the adopted children. Parents said the process moved forward after the French foreign minister at the time of the earthquake, Bernard Kouchner, was replaced last month by Michele Alliot-Marie in a government reshuffle. One of the parents, Valerie Damilleville, said she was caught by surprise when the government suddenly told her she would be flying out to pick up her 19-month-old adoptive son, Jean, after months of delay. "I have prepared warm clothes, a cozy jacket, woolly socks, little shoes, dungarees, toys, biscuits and a baby bottle," she said. "I've put it all in a little rucksack" for the trip.

description.hltext_display: 能登島リゾート開発株式会社
description.content:
TDB企業コード：380036600
「石川」 能登島リゾート開発（株）（資本金1億円、七尾市能登島半浦町7-1、代表不嶋豊和氏ほか1名、従業員62名）は、12月21日に金沢地裁へ民事再生法の適用を申請した。
申請代理人は越島久弥弁護士（金沢市尾張町1-9-11、電話076-222-1213）。監督委員には木梨松嗣弁護士（金沢市大手町7-34、電話076-222-2820）が選任されている。
当社は、1987年（昭和62年）7月に、旧能登島町（現七尾市）などの出資を得て第3セクター方式で設立されたゴルフ場経営業者。民間活力による地域振興をめざして、能登半島国定公園内に位置する能登島に、「観光石川」の保養地づくり第1号モデル事業（石川県観光余暇資源開発公団第1号出資事業）として、89年11月に約60億円の開発資金を投じて「能登島ゴルフアンドカントリークラブ」（丘陵コース・18Ｈ）をオープン。官民協力による事業推進により雇用創出等、地域の活性化を図ることを標榜し、バブル崩壊前のオープンと第3セクター方式とあって会員の募集は堅調に行われ、約1550名の会員でスタート。ピークとなる93年3月期には約10億2400万円の年収入高を計上していた。
しかし、バブル崩壊以降は長引く景気低迷に加え、企業のゴルフ接待などの自粛ムードが強まったことから業績は低迷。そのため、当時主流となりつつあったセルフプレーを96年以降導入するなど顧客ニーズに応え、集客に努めたものの、設立時からの筆頭株主企業が97年12月に東京地裁へ和議を申請するなど、業界環境は厳しさを増していた。
こうしたなか、98年以降預託金の返還が開始され、資金繰りを圧迫。預託金の返還方法を変更して厳しい資金繰りの緩和を行うとともに、従業員の給与体系を見直すことで経費削減を図ったが、低価格プレーが可能なゴルフ場が台頭し客単価が低下する一方で退会者も増加。2010年3月期の年収入高は約2億3000万円まで低下し、大幅な欠損計上に加え、退会者の預かり保証金総額も増加したことから、支え切れず今回の措置となった。
負債額は約53億7800万円が見込まれる。

description.hltext_display: Fighting may be the easy part for US in Afghan war
株式会社シーエーエム
description.content:
TDB企業コード：500486323
「東京」 （株）シーエーエム（旧商号：（株）シスコ・アセット・マネージメント（資本金1億円、東京都千代田区内神田1-18-11、代表平山貴雄氏）は、11月26日に東京地裁へ民事再生法の適用を申請した。
申請代理人は小野聡弁護士（東京都千代田区神田小川町1-1、電話03-3518-4591）ほか3名。なお、12月10日に三村藤明弁護士（東京都港区虎ノ門4-3-13、電話03-6721-3111）が監督委員に選任されている。
当社は、2001年（平成13年）7月に設立し、不動産投資や資産運用に関わる各種事業を手がけていた。東京、金沢、福岡、名古屋などに営業拠点を開設し、不動産証券化などの手法を用いて、従来は大手のディベロッパーやゼネコンが主体であった大規模開発プロジェクトに、個人投資家や中小事業者が共同して開発に参画できるような資金スキーム、利益配分スキームを提案、実行していた。
京都･名古屋･東京での不動産流動化事業が進み、プロジェクトの売却が進んだ2007年3月期には、年収入高約101億7500万円を計上していたが、サブプライムローン問題以降の国内不動産市況の急激な悪化で不動産流動化事業が急速に縮小し、プロジェクトの中断なども重なり、2010年3月期は年収入高約20億円に落ち込んでいた。さらに、2009年6月以降、所有不動産に複数の差押えが設定されるなど信用不安が表面化。その後も新たなプロジェクトには着手できず、今年10月1日に本店を京都市から旧･東京営業所であった現在地に移転し、11月1日付けで現商号に変更したうえで、今回の措置となった。
負債は保証債務約40億円を含めて約142億円。

description.hltext_display: Kohle und Gas: Konjunktur und Winter befeuern Nachfrage
description.author: Andreas Mihm, Berlin
description.content: Die starke Wirtschaftserholung und das kalte Winterwetter haben den Energieverbrauch in Deutschland 2010 stark anziehen lassen. Nach Berechnungen der Arbeitsgemeinschaft Energiebilanzen liegt er um 4 Prozent über dem Vorjahresniveau. Trotz des Anstiegs ist der Primärenergieverbrauch der zweitniedrigste seit der Wiedervereinigung. Vor allem die Nachfrage nach Steinkohle zog stark an. Die insgesamt höhere Energienachfrage führte zu wachsenden Kohlendioxidemissionen. Sie stiegen um 4 Prozent. Damit dürfte der CO2-Ausstoß in diesem Jahr bei rund 725 Millionen Tonnen liegen. Das wäre aber immer noch deutlich weniger als jene 752 Millionen Tonnen aus dem Jahr 2008. Wirtschaftsminister Rainer Brüderle (FDP) sah in den Zahlen einen Beleg dafür, das sich der langfristige Trend zur Energieeinsparung fortsetze. „Gleichwohl können wir beim Thema Energieeffizienz noch besser werden", fügt er hinzu. Die Schwankungen des Energieverbrauchs in den letzten drei Jahren zeigten allerdings auch, dass der Staat keine starren Verbrauchsziele vorgeben dürfe. Denn es könne nicht das Ziel sein, dass die Industrie ihre Produktion drosseln müsse, nur weil es einen strengen Winter gebe. „Darum plädiere ich für energiewirtschaftliche Ziele, die flexibel genug sind, um solche Effekte zu berücksichtigen", sagte Brüderle. Der Energieverbrauch wird 2010 in Deutschland vermutlich auf 14.012 Petajoule (PJ) steigen, das wären 549 PJ mehr als im Vorjahr. Doch bleibe der Verbrauch unter dem Niveau vor Ausbruch der Wirtschafts- und Finanzkrise 2008. Den größten Anteil an der deutschen Energieversorgung hält mit einem Drittel weiter das Mineralöl. Allerdings zog die Nachfrage nur verhalten an. Hier schlägt sich der Beitrag der (bei erneuerbaren Energien bilanzierten) Biokraftstoffe nieder. Ansonsten wäre der Mineralölabsatz um 4 statt 1 Prozent gestiegen. Die Nachfrage nach Diesel erhöhte sich 2010 um 4, nach Ottokraftstoff um 2 und nach leichtem Heizöl um 3 Prozent. Der Erdgasverbrauch legte um 3,7 Prozent zu. Als Grund dafür nennen die Experten auch die in der ersten Jahreshälfte belebte Nachfrage nach Erdgas zur Stromerzeugung. Es trägt zu gut einem Fünftel zur Energieversorgung bei. Um gleich 15 Prozent sprang die Nachfrage nach Steinkohle. Ihr Anteil im Energiemix liegt bei 12,1 Prozent. In der Verstromung wurden 7 Prozent mehr als im Vorjahr eingesetzt, in der Eisen- und Stahlherstellung waren es 37 Prozent mehr. Dennoch wurden mehr als zwei Drittel des inländischen Steinkohleverbrauchs zur Stromerzeugung eingesetzt. Die fast nur zur Stromproduktion verwandte heimische Braunkohle konnte ihren Anteil kaum ausdehnen. Sie liegt mit der Kernenergie und einem Anteil von jeweils 10,8 Prozent am Energieverbrauch gleichauf. Auch die erneuerbaren Energien wachsen weiter und decken 2010 den Energieverbrauch zu 9,4 (Vorjahr 9,1) Prozent. Die Stromerzeugung aus Wasserkraft nahm um 2 Prozent zu, die der Windkraft schrumpfte trotz Zubaus dagegen um knapp 3 Prozent. Die Photovoltaik legte kräftig um mehr als 80 Prozent zu. Auch Biogas und Biokraftstoffe wurden etwas stärker nachgefragt. Text: F.A.Z.Bildmaterial: F.A.Z.

description.hltext_display: 泰國解除曼谷的緊急狀態
Man and boy killed in house blaze
description.content:
A man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left unattended on a cooker, emergency services said.
West Midlands Ambulance Service said both victims were confirmed dead shortly after their arrival at hospital following the blaze in the Lower Stoke area of Coventry.
An ambulance service spokesman said three ambulances and a paramedic officer were sent to the property in Hollis Road after several 999 calls.
The spokesman said: "On arrival, firefighters were bringing the two patients out of the smoke-filled house.
"As further crews were only seconds away, the first (crew to arrive) decided to leave the scene immediately with the child to take him to University Hospital in Coventry.
"While the crew worked on the child, a firefighter drove the ambulance."
Both victims were in cardiac arrest when they were rescued from the two-storey terrace house and fire crews also attempted to resuscitate the adult victim.
The ambulance service spokesman said the second crew to arrive immediately took over efforts to revive the man before taking him to the same hospital.
"Sadly, despite the best efforts of fire, ambulance and hospital staff, it was not possible to save either the man or the boy and they were both confirmed dead shortly after arrival at hospital," the spokesman said.

event_or_fact.property: Man and boy killed; man and a young boy have died after a house fire caused by a chip pan left
